;===================================================================================
;--- Military Education from Books -------------------------------------------------

;--------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_Edu_MilitaryBook
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and not FactionReligion pagan 
	   and HasAncType MilitaryBook
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Military_Edu < 4
	   and Trait Sane > 0
	   
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 3

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_Edu_Scholar_MilitaryBook
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and not FactionReligion pagan 
	   and HasAncType MilitaryBook
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Military_Edu < 4
	   and Trait Sane > 0
       and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 3
 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_Edu_FurtheringEducation_MilitaryBook
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and not FactionReligion pagan 
	   and HasAncType MilitaryBook
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait NaturalMilitarySkill > 0
       and Trait Military_Edu < 4
	   and Trait Sane > 0
	   
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 3

;===================================================================================
;--- Regress of Military Education due to psychological traits ---------------------
  
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_Edu_Regress_Deranged
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= wooden_castle
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait Military_Edu > 0
       and Trait Deranged > 1	   

 Affects Military_Edu -1 Chance 3 
 Affects PoorLogistics 1 Chance 2
 Affects Scout -1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_Edu_Regress_Slothful
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= wooden_castle
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait Military_Edu > 0
       and Trait Slothful > 1	   

 Affects Military_Edu -1 Chance 2 
 Affects PoorLogistics 1 Chance 2
 Affects Scout -1 Chance 2
 
;===================================================================================
;-- Other Traits Gained during Young Military Education -
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_Edu_castle_secondary_good
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= wooden_castle
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait Military_Edu > 0

 Affects Sane 1 Chance 10
 Affects Energetic 1 Chance 5
 Affects HaleAndHearty 1 Chance 10
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 5
 Affects GoodInfantryGeneral 1 Chance 3
 Affects GoodCavalryGeneral 1 Chance 3
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Military_Edu_castle_secondary_bad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= castle
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait Military_Edu > 0

 Affects Drink 1 Chance 3
 Affects Feck 1 Chance 3
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 Affects Girls 1 Chance 3

;===================================================================================
;-------- Logistical Skill, Scout & Military Education -----------------------------
;----- Logistic skill is essential for lowering costs of campaigning abroad
;-- in other places: many triggers of low value at beginnign of life
;-- any age on the trip at home and abroad

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Every_NonStupid_nonpagan_Sailing
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and AtSea
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 4
       and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 5
 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 Affects Scout 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Every_NonStupid_nonpagan_InWild_Home
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not EndedInSettlement
       and RemainingMPPercentage < 50
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 4
       and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 5
 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 Affects Scout 1 Chance 2

;-------------------------------------------- cumulative with the previous, besieging included
Trigger Every_NonStupid_nonpagan_InWild_EnemyLands
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not EndedInSettlement
       and RemainingMPPercentage < 50
	   and InEnemyLands
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 4
       and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 5
 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 Affects Scout 1 Chance 2
 
;-------------------------------------------- these triggers are usually cumulative with the previous
Trigger NMS_nonpagan_Sailing
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and AtSea
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait NaturalMilitarySkill > 0
       and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 5
 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 Affects Scout 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger NMS_nonpagan_InWild_Home
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not EndedInSettlement
       and RemainingMPPercentage < 50
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait NaturalMilitarySkill > 0
       and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 5
 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 Affects Scout 1 Chance 2

;-------------------------------------------- cumulative with the previous, besieging included
Trigger NMS_nonpagan_InWild_EnemyLands
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not EndedInSettlement
       and RemainingMPPercentage < 50
	   and InEnemyLands
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait NaturalMilitarySkill > 0
       and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 10
 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 Affects Scout 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Every_Intelligent_InWild_GeographyBook
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not EndedInSettlement
       and RemainingMPPercentage < 50
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
       and HasAncType GeographyBook
	   and RandomPercent > 80
	   
 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 5
 Affects Scout 1 Chance 5
 
;========================================================


;------------------------------------------
Trigger Logistics_Good_Moving_Abroad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and InEnemyLands
	   and RemainingMPPercentage < 5
	   and Trait NaturalMilitarySkill > 0

 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Logistics_Good_PracticisingWithExpert
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
	   and RemainingMPPercentage < 5
	   and HasAncType MilitaryEngineer

 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Logistics_Poor_StayingAbroad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
	   and not IsBesieging
       and InEnemyLands
       and TimeInRegion > 3
	   and Trait NaturalMilitarySkill < 1

 Affects PoorLogistics 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Logistics_Poor_StayingAtHome
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
	   and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and TimeInRegion > 10
	   and Trait NaturalMilitarySkill < 2

 Affects PoorLogistics 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Logistics_Slothful_Max
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait LogisticalSkill > 2
       and Trait Slothful > 0
	   
 Affects LogisticalSkill -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Logistics_Drink_Max
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait LogisticalSkill > 2
       and Trait Drink > 2
	   
 Affects LogisticalSkill -1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Logistics_ClearingHouse2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait LogisticalSkill > 1
       and Trait PoorLogistics > 1
	   
 Affects LogisticalSkill -2 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalMilitarySkill -2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Logistics_ClearingHouse1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait LogisticalSkill > 0
       and Trait PoorLogistics > 0
	   
 Affects LogisticalSkill -1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalMilitarySkill -1 Chance 100 

 
;==================================================================================== Western Administrative Education
;----- Western Administrative Education ---------------------------------------------
;====================================================================================


;====================================================================================
;--- Western Administrative Education for Young AdminMinded -------------------------

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_school
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
       and SettlementBuildingExists = school

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 10
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_school_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4     ; so that they can lose education in the old age
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 10

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
       and SettlementBuildingExists = university

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 20
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_great_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 20
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_great_university_great_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 10
 
 
;====================================================================================
;--- Western Administrative Education for Young AdminMinded Intelligent -------------

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_Intelligent_school
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 1
       and SettlementBuildingExists = school

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_Intelligent_school_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1	   
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_Intelligent_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and SettlementBuildingExists = university

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_Intelligent_great_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_Intelligent_great_university_great_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2

;====================================================================================
;--- Western Administrative Education for Young AdminMinded with Tutor / Academic Advisor ---
; Education Ancillaries: Tutor (acquired at CoA) and Academic Advisor (acquired at university)
; enable schooling without school, eduction of not-Intelligent(5) in the same way as Intelligent(6), one more trigger for university

;-------------------------------------------- Tutor replaces need for school for basic schooling, no intelligence needed, but studying time yes
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 1
       and HasAncType Education

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 10
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_school_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent < 6                ; meant to be for not-Intellingent to make up for this lack
	   and HasAncType Education
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2

;-------------------------------------------- exceptional trigger: for every body (simulate the impact of Academic Advisor)
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and HasAncType Education
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and SettlementBuildingExists = university

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_great_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent < 6
	   and HasAncType Education
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_great_university_great_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent < 6
	   and HasAncType Education
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2


;====================================================================================
;---Western Administrative Education for Young MilitaryMinded Intelligent -----------

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Military_Mind_Intelligent_school
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 1
       and SettlementBuildingExists = school

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 10
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Military_Mind_Intelligent_school_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 3    ; MilitaryMind cannot get PhD
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 10

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Military_Mind_Intelligent_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 3
       and SettlementBuildingExists = university

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 10
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Military_Mind_Intelligent_great_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 3
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 10
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Military_Mind_Intelligent_great_university_great_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 3
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 10
 

;====================================================================================
;--- Western Administrative Education for adults ------------------------------------

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Adult_Intelligent_On_The_Job_School
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition GovernorLoyaltyLevel >= loyalty_happy
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and TimeInRegion >= 4
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 1
       and CharacterAge < 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Adult_Intelligent_On_The_Job_University
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition GovernorLoyaltyLevel >= loyalty_happy
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and TimeInRegion >= 4
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 2
       and CharacterAge < 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= university
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Scholar_school
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 1
       and CharacterAge < 60
       and SettlementBuildingExists = school

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Scholar_school_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and CharacterAge < 60
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Scholar_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and CharacterAge < 60
       and SettlementBuildingExists = university

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Scholar_great_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and CharacterAge < 60
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Scholar_great_university_great_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 4
       and CharacterAge < 60
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library

 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2
 
 
;===================================================================================
;--- Western Administrative Education from Books -----------------------------------

;--------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Book_Wantschool
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Sane > 0
	   and HasAncType LegalBook
	   
 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Book_adult
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 3
	   and Trait Sane > 0
	   and HasAncType LegalBook
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Book_adult_scholar
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists > school
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Sane > 0
	   and HasAncType LegalBook
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Western_Edu 1 Chance 2

;===================================================================================
;--- Regress of Western Administrative Education due to psychological traits -------
  
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Regress_Deranged
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait Western_Edu > 0
       and Trait Deranged > 1	   

 Affects Western_Edu -1 Chance 3 

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_Regress_Slothful
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait Western_Edu > 0
       and Trait Slothful > 1	   

 Affects Military_Edu -1 Chance 2 


;====================================================================================
;--- Other Traits Gained during Young Western Administrative Education --------------

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_secondary_goodbad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait Western_Edu > 0
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school

 Affects Sane 1 Chance 10
 Affects InspiringSpeaker 1 Chance 5
 Affects BoringSpeaker 1 Chance 5
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 5
 Affects Rabblerouser 1 Chance 5

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Western_Edu_secondary_bad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait Western_Edu > 0
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school

 Affects Drink 1 Chance 8
 Affects Girls 1 Chance 5

 
;========================================================
;----- Muslim Administrative Education ------------------
;========================================================


;====================================================================================
;--- Eastern Administrative Education for Young AdminMinded -------------------------

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Admin_Mind_school
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists = school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 1

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 10
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Admin_Mind_school_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4     ; so that they can lose education in the old age
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 10

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Admin_Mind_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists = university
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 20
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 10
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Admin_Mind_great_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 20
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 10
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Admin_Mind_great_university_great_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 10

       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 1

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

       and CharacterReligion islam

       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5

       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1

	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam

       and SettlementBuildingExists > university
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5

	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2

;====================================================================================
;--- Eastern Administrative Education for Young AdminMinded with Tutor  -------------
;====================================================================================
;--- Administrative Education for Young AdminMinded with Tutor / Academic Advisor ---
; Education Ancillaries: Tutor (acquired at CoA) and Academic Advisor (acquired at university)
; enable schooling without school, eduction of not-Intelligent(5) in the same way as Intelligent(6), one more trigger for university
 
;-------------------------------------------- Tutor instead of school for basic schooling, no intelligence needed, but studying time yes
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 1
       and HasAncType Education

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 10
 

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_school_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent < 6
	   and HasAncType Education
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_university      ; exeptionally for everybody to simulate Academic Advisor
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and HasAncType Education
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4
       and SettlementBuildingExists = university

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_great_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent < 6
	   and HasAncType Education
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_great_university_great_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent < 6
	   and HasAncType Education
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 1
       and SettlementBuildingExists = school

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 10

       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95

       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 3    ; MilitaryMind cannot get PhD
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 10

       and SettlementBuildingExists = university

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 10
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5

       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 3
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 10
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 3
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 10
 

;====================================================================================
;--- Eastern Administrative Education for adults ------------------------------------

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Adult_Intelligent_On_The_Job_School
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition GovernorLoyaltyLevel >= loyalty_happy
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and TimeInRegion >= 4
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 1
       and CharacterAge < 50
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 1
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Adult_Intelligent_On_The_Job_University
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition GovernorLoyaltyLevel >= loyalty_happy
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and TimeInRegion >= 4
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 2
       and CharacterAge < 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= university
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Scholar_school
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 1
       and CharacterAge < 60
       and SettlementBuildingExists = school

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Scholar_school_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4
       and CharacterAge < 60
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Scholar_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4
       and CharacterAge < 60
       and SettlementBuildingExists = university

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Scholar_great_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4
       and CharacterAge < 60
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Scholar_great_university_great_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 4
       and CharacterAge < 60
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library

 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2
 
 
;===================================================================================
;--- Eastern Administrative Education from Books -----------------------------------

;--------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Book_Wantschool
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Sane > 0
	   and HasAncType LegalBook
	   
 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Book_adult
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Sane > 0
	   and Trait Eastern_Edu < 3
	   and HasAncType LegalBook
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Book_adult_scholar
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists > school
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Sane > 0
	   and HasAncType LegalBook
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Eastern_Edu 1 Chance 2
 
;===================================================================================
;--- Regress of Eastern Administrative Education due to psychological traits -------
  
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Regress_Deranged
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait Eastern_Edu > 0
       and Trait Deranged > 1	   

 Affects Eastern_Edu -1 Chance 3 

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_Regress_Slothful
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait Eastern_Edu > 0
       and Trait Slothful > 1	   

 Affects Military_Edu -1 Chance 2 


;====================================================================================
;--- Other Traits Gained during Young Eastern Administrative Education --------------

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_secondary_goodbad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait Eastern_Edu > 0

 Affects Sane 1 Chance 10
 Affects InspiringSpeaker 1 Chance 5
 Affects BoringSpeaker 1 Chance 5
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 5
 Affects Rabblerouser 1 Chance 5

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Eastern_Edu_secondary_bad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait Eastern_Edu > 0

 Affects Drink 1 Chance 8
 Affects Girls 1 Chance 5

 

;========================================================
;----- Orthodox Administrative Education ----------------
;========================================================
 
;====================================================================================
;--- Orthodox Administrative Education for Young AdminMinded -------------------------

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Admin_Mind_school
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists = school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 1

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 10
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Admin_Mind_school_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 4     ; so that they can lose education in the old age
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 10

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Admin_Mind_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 4
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
       and SettlementBuildingExists = university

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 20
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Admin_Mind_great_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 4
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 20
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Admin_Mind_great_university_great_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 4
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 10

       and CharacterReligion orthodox

       and SettlementBuildingExists > library
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 4

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 2


;====================================================================================
;--- Orthodox Administrative Education for Young AdminMinded with Tutor -------------

;--- Administrative Education for Young AdminMinded with Tutor / Academic Advisor ---
; Education Ancillaries: Tutor (acquired at CoA) and Academic Advisor (acquired at university)
; enable schooling without school, eduction of not-Intelligent(5) in the same way as Intelligent(6), one more trigger for university
 
;-------------------------------------------- Tutor instead of school for basic schooling, no intelligence needed, but studying time yes
Trigger Greek_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and HasAncType Education
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 1

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 10
  
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_school_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and HasAncType Education
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent < 6
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 4

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 2

;-------------------------------------------- for everybody to simulate impact of Academic Advisor
Trigger Greek_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and HasAncType Education
       and SettlementBuildingExists = university
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 4

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_great_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and HasAncType Education
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent < 6
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 4

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 2
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_great_university_great_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and HasAncType Education
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent < 6
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 4

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Admin_Mind_Tutor_university_ForAll
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and HasAncType Education
       and SettlementBuildingExists = university
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 4

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 3

;---Orthodox Administrative Education for Young MilitaryMinded Intelligent -----------

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Military_Mind_Intelligent_school
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists = school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 1

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 10
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Military_Mind_Intelligent_school_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 3    ; MilitaryMind cannot get PhD

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 10

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Military_Mind_Intelligent_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists = university
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 3

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 10
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Military_Mind_Intelligent_great_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 3

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 10
 Affects WellGroomed 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Military_Mind_Intelligent_great_university_great_library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 3

 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 10

Trigger Greek_Edu_Adult_Intelligent_On_The_Job_School
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition GovernorLoyaltyLevel >= loyalty_happy
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and TimeInRegion >= 4
       and CharacterAge < 50
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 1
	   and Trait Western_Edu < 1
	     
 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Adult_Intelligent_On_The_Job_University
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition GovernorLoyaltyLevel >= loyalty_happy
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and TimeInRegion >= 4
       and CharacterAge < 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= university
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 2
	     
 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 2

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and HasAncType LegalBook
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Sane > 0
	   
 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Book_adult
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and HasAncType LegalBook
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Greek_Edu < 3
	   and Trait Sane > 0
	     
 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 2

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

       and CharacterReligion orthodox

	   and HasAncType LegalBook
       and SettlementBuildingExists > school
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and Trait Sane > 0
	     
 Affects Greek_Edu 1 Chance 2

;--- Regress of Orthodox Administrative Education due to psychological traits -------
  
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Regress_Deranged
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait Greek_Edu > 0
       and Trait Deranged > 1	   

 Affects Greek_Edu -1 Chance 3 

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_Regress_Slothful
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait Greek_Edu > 0
       and Trait Slothful > 1	   

 Affects Military_Edu -1 Chance 2 


;====================================================================================
;--- Other Traits Gained during Young Orthodox Administrative Education --------------

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Edu_secondary_goodbad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait Greek_Edu > 0
 
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 10
 Affects InspiringSpeaker 1 Chance 5
 Affects BoringSpeaker 1 Chance 5
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 5
 Affects Rabblerouser 1 Chance 5

;--------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
       and Trait Greek_Edu > 0

 Affects Drink 1 Chance 8
 Affects Girls 1 Chance 5


;==================================================================================
;----- Educational Buildings impact on adults -----------   
;========================================================
;- keep in mind that these trigers are for all religions
;- while adding other traits


;======================================================== Sitting Around - Intelligent Adult
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_SCHOOL
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 6
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	       
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_UNIVERSITY
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists > school
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent > 5
       and Trait Intelligent < 8
	   and RandomPercent > 50

 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 Affects MathematicsSkill 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_LIBRARY
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	        
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 Affects MathematicsSkill 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_CASTLELIBRARY
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= castle_library
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	        
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 Affects MathematicsSkill 1 Chance 2 

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_ALCHEMISTLAB
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= alchemists_lab
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	        
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_NAVAL_ACADEMY
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= naval_academy
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
       and RandomPercent > 50

 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2 
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_paper3a_parchment
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= paper3a_parchment
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
       and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 

 
;========================================================
;-------- MedicalSkill & Poet ---------------
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Medical_Skill_Edu_bimaristan
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= bimaristan
       and Trait Intelligent > 5
       and Trait Sane > 0
	   
 Affects MedicalSkill 1 Chance 2
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Medical_Skill_Edu_great_university
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists > university
       and Trait Intelligent > 5
       and Trait Sane > 0
	   
 Affects MedicalSkill 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Medical_Skill_Edu_Knight_Hospitallers
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists > st_johns_major_ch
       and Trait Intelligent > 5
       and Trait Sane > 0
	   and RandomPercent > 80
	   
 Affects MedicalSkill 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Medical_Skill_Book
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and HasAncType MedicalBook
       and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and RandomPercent > 80
	   
 Affects MedicalSkill 1 Chance 5

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Poet_Book
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and HasAncType PoetryBook
       and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and RandomPercent > 80
	   
 Affects Poet 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Poet_Edu_Great_Library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists > library
       and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and RandomPercent > 80
	          
 Affects Poet 1 Chance 5

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Poet_Edu_Military_Academy
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= castle_library
       and Trait Intelligent > 5
	   and RandomPercent > 80
	          
 Affects Poet 1 Chance 5

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Poetry_and_Intelligent
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and Trait Poet > 0
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
       and Trait Sane > 0
	   and RandomPercent > 80
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 5

;========================================================
;----- Educational Clearing House ----------------  
;----- just-in-case of a bug ---------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MedicalSkill_Intelligent_ClearingHouse
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Intelligent < 5
       and Trait MedicalSkill > 0
	   
 Affects MedicalSkill -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MathematicsSkill_Intelligent_ClearingHouse
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Intelligent < 5
       and Trait MathematicsSkill > 0
	   
 Affects MathematicsSkill -1 Chance 100
 

;========================================================
;----- Loss of Education due to Health and Age ----------
;========================================================
;--- version made in 2016

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BrainInjury_Worsens_Education
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait SeverelyWounded > 0

 Affects Military_Edu -1 Chance 30
 Affects Pagan_Edu -2 Chance 30
 Affects Western_Edu -2 Chance 30
 Affects Eastern_Edu -2 Chance 30
 Affects Greek_Edu -2 Chance 30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Disease_Worsens_Education
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait Diseased > 1

 Affects Military_Edu -1 Chance 2
 Affects Pagan_Edu -1 Chance 2
 Affects Western_Edu -1 Chance 2
 Affects Eastern_Edu -1 Chance 2
 Affects Greek_Edu -1 Chance 2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Insanity_Worsens_Education
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait Insane > 1
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Military_Edu -1 Chance 2
 Affects Pagan_Edu -1 Chance 2
 Affects Western_Edu -1 Chance 2
 Affects Eastern_Edu -1 Chance 2
 Affects Greek_Edu -1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Senile_Education_Old_Age_loss
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait Senile > 1

 Affects Military_Edu -1 Chance 5
 Affects Pagan_Edu -1 Chance 5
 Affects Western_Edu -1 Chance 5
 Affects Eastern_Edu -1 Chance 5
 Affects Greek_Edu -1 Chance 5

;--------------------------------------------
;-- FL is intentionally exempted as he's got always officeholder 1 or 2
Trigger Senile_Education_Old_Age_loss_No_Office
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait Officeholder < 1
       and Trait Senile > 1

 Affects Military_Edu -1 Chance 5
 Affects Pagan_Edu -1 Chance 5
 Affects Western_Edu -1 Chance 5
 Affects Eastern_Edu -1 Chance 5
 Affects Greek_Edu -1 Chance 5

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger BeyondBattle_Old_Age_loss
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait TooOldToFight > 0

 Affects Military_Edu -1 Chance 10


;========================================================
;----- Guilds impact on Teenagers -----------------------
;========================================================
;- one may add more traits here, once they're reviewed
;- keep in mind that it's for all religions

;------- THIEVES ---------------------------
Trigger Education_Guild_Thieves
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= thieves_guild
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   
 Affects HighPersonalSecurity 1 Chance 4
 Affects Liar 1 Chance 2
 Affects Gregarious 1 Chance 2
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Education_Guild_Thieves_master
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists > thieves_guild
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   
 Affects HighPersonalSecurity 1 Chance 4
 Affects Liar 1 Chance 2
 Affects Gregarious 1 Chance 2
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 2
 

;-------- ASSASSINS --------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= assassins_guild
       and Trait Wantschool >= 1
	   
 Affects HighPersonalSecurity 1 Chance 4
 Affects Paranoia 1 Chance 2
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 2
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 2

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists > assassins_guild
       and Trait Wantschool > 0
	   
 Affects HighPersonalSecurity 1 Chance 4
 Affects Paranoia 1 Chance 2
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 2
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 2

;========================================================================================= just countdown
;----------------------------------------------
Trigger GovernorExperience_Counter
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and not AtSea
	   and not Trait Wantschool > 0
	   
 Affects GovernorExperience 1 Chance 100
 

;========================================================================================= fit for office
;----- fit for office -----------------------------------
;--------------------------------------------------------
;- this trait is used in plethora of triggers where the overal physical and psychological health is a pre-requisit
;- always visible to the players
;- the starter is earlier in the EDCT file - precisely for the trait be visible instantly to the player (otherwise it could have been defined here)
;- remember that also teenagers are fit (it's a condition in triggers for education)
 
;------------------------------------------- 
Trigger FitForOffice_AI_Increase
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
    and not FactionIsLocal
    and Trait FitForOffice < 2
	
 Affects FitForOffice 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 
Trigger FitForOffice_Downgrade_NotAIAnymore
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
    and FactionIsLocal
    and Trait AI_Boost_Difficulty > 0
    and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	
 Affects FitForOffice -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 
Trigger FitForOffice_Downgrade_on_Ignorance
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
    and Trait Intelligent < 3
    and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	
 Affects FitForOffice -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 
Trigger FitForOffice_Downgrade_on_Senility
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
    and Trait Senile > 1
    and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	
 Affects FitForOffice -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 
Trigger FitForOffice_Downgrade_on_Insane
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
    and FactionIsLocal
    and Trait Insane > 1
    and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	
 Affects FitForOffice -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 
Trigger FitForOffice_Downgrade_on_Paranoia
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
    and Trait Paranoia > 3
    and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	
 Affects FitForOffice -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 
Trigger FitForOffice_Downgrade_on_Slothful
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
    and Trait Slothful > 2
    and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	
 Affects FitForOffice -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 
Trigger FitForOffice_Downgrade_on_AbsentMinded
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
    and FactionIsLocal
    and Trait AbsentMinded > 1
    and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	
 Affects FitForOffice -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 
Trigger FitForOffice_Downgrade_on_AbsentMinded_General
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
	and not IsFactionLeader
    and FactionIsLocal
    and Trait AbsentMindedGeneral > 0
    and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	
 Affects FitForOffice -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 
Trigger FitForOffice_Downgrade_on_HaleAndHearty
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
    and FactionIsLocal
    and Trait HaleAndHearty < 3
    and Trait FitForOffice > 1
	
 Affects FitForOffice -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- for the new generals and in case it dropped to 0
Trigger FitForOffice_SafetyValve
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
    and Trait FitForOffice < 1
	
 Affects FitForOffice 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- increase to 2
Trigger FitForOffice_upgrade_FactionLeader
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
    and FactionIsLocal
    and Trait FitForOffice < 2
    and Trait Intelligent > 2
    and Trait Senile < 2
    and Trait Insane < 2
    and Trait Paranoia < 4
    and Trait Slothful < 3
    and Trait AbsentMinded < 1
    and Trait Diseased < 1
    and Trait HaleAndHearty > 2
	
 Affects FitForOffice 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- increase to 2
Trigger FitForOffice_upgrade_General
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
	and not IsFactionLeader
    and FactionIsLocal
    and Trait FitForOffice < 2
    and Trait Intelligent > 2
    and Trait Senile < 2
    and Trait Insane < 2
    and Trait Paranoia < 4
    and Trait Slothful < 3
    and Trait AbsentMindedGeneral < 1
    and Trait Diseased < 1
    and Trait HaleAndHearty > 2
	
 Affects FitForOffice 1 Chance 100

;========================================================================================= provincial titles
;----- provincial titles --------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PT_Titled_Removed
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not HasAncType dearmad_her
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Titled > 0

 Affects Titled -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger PT_Untitled_Added
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not HasAncType dearmad_her
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Untitled < 1
	   and IsGeneral

 Affects Untitled 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PT_Untitled_Removed
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition HasAncType dearmad_her
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Untitled > 0

 Affects Untitled -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger PT_Titled_Added
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition HasAncType dearmad_her
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Titled < 1

 Affects Titled 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PT_Titled_Count_Stripped_FirstTime
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition HasAncType dearmad_her
       and Trait Titled > 0
       and Trait Stripped > 0

 Affects Titled_Count 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PT_Titled_Count_Stripped_SecondTime
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not HasAncType dearmad_her
       and Trait Titled > 0
       and Trait Stripped > 0

 Affects Titled_Count -10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PT_Titled_Count_Remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait Titled_Count > 0
       and Trait Stripped < 1

 Affects Titled_Count -10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PT_Titled_Stripped
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not HasAncType dearmad_her
       and Trait Titled > 0
       and not IsFactionLeader

 Affects Stripped 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PT_Titled_Stripped_Remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition HasAncType dearmad_her
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Titled_Count > 0
       and Trait Stripped > 0

 Affects Stripped -1 Chance 100
 
;========================================================================================= offices
;----- offices ------------------------------------------
;-------------------------------------------------------- 
; one office per general, FL shouldn't have any office
; teenagers cannot benefit from the trait, but they do from the ancillary itself
; office might be taken away without any consequence (although this might be changed in the future modding)
; also Byzantine offices are taken into account, but not analysed much

;------------------------------------------- triggers for generals
Trigger Office_acquired_general
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition HasAncType office
       and not IsFactionLeader
	   and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait Officeholder < 1
 
 Affects Officeholder 1 Chance 100

 ;-------------------------------------------
Trigger Office_ByzantineCBUR_acquired_general
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition HasAncType office_01
    and not IsFactionLeader
	and Trait Wantschool < 1
    and Trait FitForOffice > 1
    and Trait Officeholder < 1

 Affects Officeholder 1 Chance 100
 
 ;-------------------------------------------
Trigger Office_ByzantineSealCBUR_acquired_general
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition HasAncType byzantine_seal
    and not IsFactionLeader
	and Trait Wantschool < 1
    and Trait FitForOffice > 1
    and Trait Officeholder < 1

 Affects Officeholder 1 Chance 100

;-------------------------------------------
Trigger Office_lost_general
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not HasAncType office
       and not HasAncType office_01      
	   and not HasAncType byzantine_seal
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Officeholder > 0

 Affects Officeholder -1 Chance 100

;----------------------------------------------- triggers for FL (only player)
Trigger Office_info_available_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not HasAncType office
       and IsFactionLeader
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Officeholder < 1
	   and I_TurnNumber < 200

 Affects Officeholder 3 Chance 100
 
;-------------------------------------------
Trigger Office_get_rid_of_it_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition HasAncType office
       and IsFactionLeader
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Officeholder < 1
	   and I_TurnNumber < 200
	   
 Affects Officeholder 2 Chance 100
 
;-------------------------------------------
Trigger Office_get_rid_of_it_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition HasAncType office
       and IsFactionLeader
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Officeholder > 2
	   
 Affects Officeholder -1 Chance 100
 
;-------------------------------------------
Trigger Office_info_available_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not HasAncType office
       and IsFactionLeader
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Officeholder > 1
       and Trait Officeholder < 3
	   and I_TurnNumber < 200
	   
 Affects Officeholder 1 Chance 100

 ;-------------------------------------------
Trigger Office_no_more_info
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not HasAncType office
       and IsFactionLeader
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Officeholder > 1
       and Trait Officeholder < 3
	   and I_TurnNumber >= 200
	   
 Affects Officeholder -2 Chance 100

;----------------------------------------------- Office Impact On Personality
Trigger Office_Impact_On_Personality
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Officeholder > 0
	   and RandomPercent > 50

 Affects Anger 1 Chance 2
 Affects Upright -1 Chance 3
 Affects Liar 1 Chance 3
 Affects Drink 1 Chance 3
 Affects Gambling 1 Chance 3

;-----------------------------------------------
Trigger Office_Impact_On_Personality_Drinker
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Officeholder > 0
	   and Trait Drink > 2
	   and RandomPercent > 50

 Affects Liar 1 Chance 3
 Affects Drink 1 Chance 3
 
;-----------------------------------------------
Trigger Office_Impact_On_Personality_No_Office_Drink
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Officeholder < 1
	   and Trait Drink > 2
	   and RandomPercent > 50

 Affects Slothful 1 Chance 3
 Affects Drink 1 Chance 3
