;----- byzantine career   ------------------------------- 
;----------- JoC: not reviewed, not sure if working -----
;--------------------------------------------------------

Trigger Career_start
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition not EndedInSettlement
and IsGeneral
and FactionType byzantium
and not IsFactionLeader
and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 0

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 8

;----------------------------------------------------

Trigger Comes_to_Hiliarches
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition not EndedInSettlement
       and IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 1

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------

Trigger Hiliarches_to_Taxiarches
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition not EndedInSettlement
       and IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 2

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------

Trigger Taxiarches_to_Droungarios
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition not EndedInSettlement
       and IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 3
 
Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------

Trigger Droungarios_to_Merarches
WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition not EndedInSettlement
       and IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 4
       and Trait GoodCommander >= 1

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Merarches_to_Tourmarches
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 5
       and Trait GoodCommander >= 2

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Tourmarches_to_Strategos
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 6
       and Trait GoodCommander > 2


Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Strategos_to_Sevastos
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 7
       and Trait GoodCommander >= 4
 

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Sevastos_to_Magistrus
WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium = 8
       and Trait GoodCommander >= 5
 

Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100

;----------------------------------------------------
;Trigger Career_Get
;WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;
;Condition IsGeneral
;and FactionType byzantium
;and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium >= 1
;and not IsFactionLeader
;
;Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium 1 Chance 100

;---------------------------------------------------
Trigger Heir_Become_Emperor_Remove_Rank
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType byzantium
       and AgentType = family
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium <= 8
       and Trait Military_Career_In_Byzantium > 0
 
 
Affects Military_Career_In_Byzantium -8 Chance 100

 

;========================================================================================= Crowns
;----- Crowns  ------------------------------------------
; The mechanism employs three files: EDCT, EDA and script.txt.
; EDCT: eligibility for crowning (trait Fit_Crown_FACTION) and related crowns
; EDA: checks against list of provinces and then gives the ancillary
; script.txt: the costs of the crown ceremony are paid and then each turn upkeep is paid
;
; AI is excluded from the intricacies of the mechanism, but has a simple triggers here in EDCT
; and then it has a shortened list of provinces in EDA - thus it's likely to get crowns


;-------------------------------------------------------- (A) unfit for crown

;------------------------------------------- 2->1
Trigger UnFit_Lands_Conquered_UnFitForOffice
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
    and Trait Crownholder > 1
    and Trait Crownholder < 3
    and Trait FitForOffice < 2
	
 Affects Crownholder -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 2->1
Trigger UnFit_Lands_Conquered_Excommunicated
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
    and Trait Crownholder > 1
    and Trait Crownholder < 3
    and FactionExcommunicated 
	
 Affects Crownholder -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 3->1
Trigger UnFit_Legacy_UnFitForOffice
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
	and Trait Crownholder > 2
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
    and Trait FitForOffice < 2
	
 Affects Crownholder -2 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 3->1
Trigger UnFit_Legacy_Excommunicated
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
	and Trait Crownholder > 2
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
    and FactionExcommunicated 
	
 Affects Crownholder -2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 0->1
 Trigger Fit_for_crown_Starter
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and Trait Crownholder < 1

 Affects Crownholder 1 Chance 100
 
;-------------------------------------------------------- (B) fit for a crown - for all
;------------------------------------------- 1->3
Trigger Fit_for_crown_Legacy
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
    and FactionIsLocal
	and Trait Crownholder > 0
	and Trait Crownholder < 2
	and Trait FathersLegacy > 1
    and Trait Usurper < 1
    and Trait FactionRegent < 1
    and not FactionExcommunicated 
	
 Affects Crownholder 2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 1->2
Trigger Fit_for_crown_Lands_Conquered
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
    and FactionIsLocal
    and Trait Crownholder > 0
    and Trait Crownholder < 2
    and Trait FitForOffice > 1
    and Trait Usurper < 1
    and Trait FactionRegent < 1
    and Attribute Piety > 5
    and Attribute Authority > 5
    and not FactionExcommunicated 
	
 Affects Crownholder 1 Chance 100
 
;-------------------------------------------------------- (C) fit for a specific crown
; hidden to the player as used only for technical reason
; used to enable more than 19 conditions in the EDA
; made in a simple way to limit the number of downgrade triggers: each turn is removed and then added
; (for poor factions threshold 20000 fl may be lowered but this will require making separate descriptions for those factions)
; (> loyalty_disillusioned is lower than noted in the description in EV file (happy))

; the code may be simplified: removal of Fit_Crown_X for each faction without any condition - so 3 triggers instead of 27
; can be done if somebody bothers (and analyses unexpected consequences ;-)


;------------------------------------------- 0->1		Jerusalem for the NE Catholic factions (this is the only trigger for KoJ)
Trigger Crown_Fit_Jerusalem_NE
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementBuildingExists = holy_sepulchre_3_church			; coronation in Jerusalem, already large town level
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4										; if he's got alread a crown, he won't get another one

 Affects Fit_Crown_jerusalem 1 Chance 100	   
 Affects Fit_Crown_france 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_england 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_hre 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_denmark 1 Chance 100	
 Affects Fit_Crown_norway 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 0->1		Jerusalem for the Catholic SE factions
Trigger Crown_Fit_Jerusalem_SE
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementBuildingExists = holy_sepulchre_3_church
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_venice 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_pisa 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_sicily 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_portugal 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_aragon 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_spain 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1		Jerusalem for the Catholic EE factions
Trigger Crown_Fit_Jerusalem_EE
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementBuildingExists = holy_sepulchre_3_church
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4

 Affects Fit_Crown_hungary 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_poland 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 0->1		Constantinople for the Orthodox factions
Trigger Crown_Fit_Constantinople_Orthodox
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementBuildingExists = wonder_hagia_sophia			; coronation in Constantinople, large city level
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_georgia 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_byzantium 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_serbia 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_kievan_rus 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_russia 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 0->1		Baghdad for the Muslim factions 
Trigger Crown_Fit_Baghdad_Islam
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementBuildingExists = education6_house_of_wisdom
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_abbasid 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_rum 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_zengid 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_turks 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_moors 1 Chance 100
 Affects Fit_Crown_egypt 1 Chance 100
 
 
;------------------------------------------- 1->0    ------  CUMANS  ------
Trigger Crown_cumans_UnFit
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Fit_Crown_cumans > 0

 Affects Fit_Crown_cumans -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_cumans_Fit1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal                   
	and FactionType cumans
	and IsFactionLeader                            			; just in case of a bug
	and SettlementName Sharukan								; coronation in Sharukan
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= tengir_sanctuary		; city (large town)
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder < 4                       		; either Legacy (2) or Lands_Conquered (3)
 	and Trait Crownholder > 1                       		; just in case of a bug
 	and Trait Fit_Crown_cumans < 1    
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_cumans 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_cumans_Fit2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal                   
	and FactionType cumans
	and IsFactionLeader                            			; just in case of a bug
	and SettlementName Sharukan								; coronation in Sharukan
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_tengir_altar			; castle - it's a castle at the beginning
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder < 4                       		; either Legacy (2) or Lands_Conquered (3)
 	and Trait Crownholder > 1                       		; just in case of a bug
 	and Trait Fit_Crown_cumans < 1    
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_cumans 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_cumans_Fit_AI
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition not FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType cumans
	and not IsUnderSiege
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_cumans 1 Chance 100  


;------------------------------------------- 1->0    		------ KIEVAN_RUS ------
Trigger Crown_kievan_rus_UnFit
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Fit_Crown_kievan_rus > 0

 Affects Fit_Crown_kievan_rus -1 Chance 100
 

;------------------------------------------- 0->1
Trigger Crown_kievan_rus_Fit_Zoloti_Vorota
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType kievan_rus
	and SettlementName Kiev													; coronation in Kiev
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= wonder_kiev_zoloti_vorota_2middle		; already city level
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_kievan_rus < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_kievan_rus 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_kievan_rus_Fit_AI
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition not FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType kievan_rus
	and not IsUnderSiege
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_kievan_rus 1 Chance 100  


;------------------------------------------- 1->0    ------ NOVGOROD ------ 
Trigger Crown_russia_UnFit
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Fit_Crown_russia > 0

 Affects Fit_Crown_russia -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_russia_Fit_Sofijskij_Sobor
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType russia
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Novgorod											; coronation in Novgorod
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= rus_monastery_6novgorod				; large city level
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Fit_Crown_russia < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_russia 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_russia_Fit_Zoloti_Vorota
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType russia
	and SettlementName Kiev												; coronation also in Kiev
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= wonder_kiev_zoloti_vorota_2middle	; already city level
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_russia < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_russia 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_russia_Fit_AI
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition not FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType russia
	and not IsUnderSiege
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_russia 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Fit_Crown_lithuania > 0

 Affects Fit_Crown_lithuania -1 Chance 100

Trigger Crown_lithuania_Fit_Vilnius
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType lithuania
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Kernave
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= wonder_kernave_vilnius3_tower			; city level
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000	
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_lithuania < 1										; perhaps redundant but just in case
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_lithuania 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition not FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType lithuania
	and not IsUnderSiege
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_lithuania 1 Chance 100  


;------------------------------------------- 1->0    ------ POLAND ------ 
Trigger Crown_poland_UnFit
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Fit_Crown_poland > 0

 Affects Fit_Crown_poland -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_poland_Fit_Cathedral_Krakow
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType poland
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Krakow											; coronation in Krakow
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= cathedral							; large city level
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_poland < 1										; perhaps redundant but just in case
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_poland 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_poland_Fit_Marienkirche
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType poland
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Krakow											; coronation in Krakow
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= wonder_krakow_Marienkirche2			; city level but possible later in the game
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_poland < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_poland 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_poland_Fit_St_Adalbertus
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType poland
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Poznan											; coronation in Poznan
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= wonder_poznan_gniezno3_romanic		; city level
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_poland < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_poland 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_poland_Fit_AI
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition not FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType poland
	and not IsUnderSiege
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_poland 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Affects Fit_Crown_norway -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_norway_Fit_Roskilde
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType norway
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Roskilde						; coronation in Roskilde
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= cathedral		; large city level
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_norway < 1					; redundant but just in case
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_norway 1 Chance 100

;-------------------------------------------
Trigger Crown_norway_Fit_Bergen
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType norway
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Bergen								; coronation in Bergen
	and SettlementBuildingExists = stavkirke4				; city level
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_norway < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_norway 1 Chance 100
	
;------------------------------------------- 0->1

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition not FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType norway
	and not IsUnderSiege
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_norway 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType france
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Rheims									; coronation in Rheims
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= cathedral					; large city level
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_france < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_france 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_france_Fit_Naples
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType france
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Naples												; coronation in Naples
	and SettlementBuildingExists = south_italy_building6_maschioangioino	; much later in the game
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_france < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_france 1 Chance 100

 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition not FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType france
	and not IsUnderSiege
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_france 1 Chance 100  


;------------------------------------------- 1->0  				 	------ ARAGON ------
Trigger Crown_aragon_UnFit
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Fit_Crown_aragon > 0

 Affects Fit_Crown_aragon -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_aragon_Fit_Zaragoza
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType aragon
	and IsFactionLeader									
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= alcazar3_granada_alhambra_gardens	; coronation in Toledo, Granada, Zaragoza
	and not SettlementBuildingExists >= alcazar7_lisbon					; but not in Lisbon, Fes, Tunis
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_aragon < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_aragon 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_aragon_Fit_Palermo
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType aragon
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementBuildingExists = south_italy_building5_palazzodeinormanii		; coronation in Palermo
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_aragon < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_aragon 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_aragon_Fit_AI
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition not FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType aragon
	and not IsUnderSiege
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_aragon 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 1->0  					------ MOORS ------
Trigger Crown_moors_UnFit
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Fit_Crown_moors > 0

 Affects Fit_Crown_moors -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_moors_Fit_Marrakesh
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType moors
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Marrakesh										; coronation in Marrakesh
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= alcazar2_alcazar					; city level (this city is difficult to grow!)
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_moors < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_moors 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 0->1
Trigger Crown_moors_Fit_Cordoba
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType moors
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Cordoba											; coronation in Cordoba
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= wonder_cordoba_mezquita2_mosque
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_moors < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_moors 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------- 0->1
Trigger Crown_moors_Fit_LisbonGranadaFesTunisZaragoza
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType moors
	and IsFactionLeader		
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= alcazar4_granada_alhambra_castle	; coronation in Lisbon Granada Fes Tunis Zaragoza
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	and Trait Fit_Crown_moors < 1
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_moors 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_moors_Fit_AI
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition not FactionIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType moors
	and not IsUnderSiege
	
 Affects Fit_Crown_moors 1 Chance 100  


;------------------------------------------- 1->0   				------ VENICE ------
Trigger Crown_venice_UnFit
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Fit_Crown_venice > 0

 Affects Fit_Crown_venice -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------- 0->1	
Trigger Crown_venice_Fit
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType venice
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Venice										; coronation in Venice
	and SettlementBuildingExists = wonder_st_marks_basilica
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
 
 Affects Fit_Crown_venice 1 Chance 100

	and IsFactionLeader

	and not IsUnderSiege

 Affects Fit_Crown_pisa -1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 
 Condition FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType pisa
	and IsFactionLeader
	and SettlementName Pisa										; coronation in Pisa, City level
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= wonder_pisa_campo5_churchbaptisttower
	and not IsUnderSiege
    and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
	and Treasury > 20000
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
 
 Affects Fit_Crown_pisa 1 Chance 100

	and Trait Crownholder > 4
	   
 Affects Crownholder -1 Chance 100

 Condition HasAncType crown
	and Trait Crownholder > 2
	and Trait Crownholder < 4
	   
 Affects Crownholder 2 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition HasAncType crown
	and Trait Crownholder > 1
	and Trait Crownholder < 3
	   
 Affects Crownholder 3 Chance 100

;=======================================================================
;--------- Clean-up when becomes FL ---------------------
;=======================================================================

;------------------------------------------ loyalty system clean-up
Trigger FL_Cleanup_Disloyal
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait Disloyal > 0
    and IsFactionLeader

 Affects Disloyal -10 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_Cleanup_Loyal
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait Loyal > 0
    and IsFactionLeader

 Affects Loyal -10 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_Cleanup_Obedient
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Obedient > 0

 Affects Obedient -10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_Cleanup_Disobedient
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Disobedient > 0

 Affects Disobedient -10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_Cleanup_ContentGeneral
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait ContentGeneral > 0

 Affects ContentGeneral -10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_Cleanup_DiscontentGeneral
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait DiscontentGeneral > 0

 Affects DiscontentGeneral -10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_Cleanup_Stripped
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Stripped > 0

 Affects Stripped -10 Chance 100

Trigger FL_Cleanup_Titled
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Titled > 0

 Affects Titled -10 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Near_Loyalty > 0

 Affects Near_Loyalty -10 Chance 100

Trigger FL_Cleanup_Far_Loyalty
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Far_Loyalty > 0

 Affects Far_Loyalty -10 Chance 100

Trigger FL_Cleanup_Embezzler
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Embezzler > 0

 Affects Embezzler -10 Chance 100

 Affects ReligionStarter 1 Chance 100

       and Trait FL_diplomatic_skills < 2

;--------- KA Events during rule ------------------------

Trigger King_GovernorDiplomatCreated
 WhenToTest GovernorAgentCreated
 
 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and AgentType = diplomat
       and Attribute Authority < 5
 
 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Marries
 WhenToTest CharacterMarriesPrincess

 Condition IsFactionLeader

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
;Trigger Becomes_King_Married
; WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
;
; Condition IsFactionLeader
;    and IsMarried 
;
; Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Marries_Dom1
 WhenToTest CharacterMarriesPrincess

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WifeIsDomineering = 1

 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Marries_Dom2
 WhenToTest CharacterMarriesPrincess

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WifeIsDomineering = 2

 Affects KingsAuthority -2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Fathers_Children
 WhenToTest CharacterBecomesAFather
 
 Condition IsFactionLeader
 
 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Employs_Bribery
 WhenToTest LeaderOrderedBribery

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 20 
 Affects DeceiverVirtue 1 Chance 10 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Employs_Spies_Success
 WhenToTest LeaderOrderedSpyingMission

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and MissionSuccessLevel >= slightly_successful

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 3
 Affects SpyMaster 1 Chance 25
 Affects DeceiverVirtue 1 Chance 2 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Employs_Spies_Failure
 WhenToTest LeaderOrderedSpyingMission

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and MissionSuccessLevel < slightly_successful

 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 10
 Affects SpyMaster -1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Employes_Assassins_Success
 WhenToTest LeaderOrderedAssassination

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and MissionSuccessLevel >= slightly_successful

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 20
 Affects AssassinMaster 1 Chance 33
 Affects DeceiverVirtue 1 Chance 5 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Employes_Assassins_Failure
 WhenToTest LeaderOrderedAssassination

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and MissionSuccessLevel < slightly_successful

 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 33
 Affects AssassinMaster 1 Chance 5
 Affects DeceiverVirtue 1 Chance 10 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Employes_Sabotage
 WhenToTest LeaderOrderedSabotage

 Condition IsFactionLeader

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 4
 Affects Despoiler 1 Chance 85 
 Affects DeceiverVirtue 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Employs_Diplomacy
 WhenToTest LeaderOrderedDiplomacy

 Condition IsFactionLeader
    and Attribute Authority < 5

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_MissionSuccess
 WhenToTest LeaderMissionSuccess

 Condition IsFactionLeader

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_MissionFailure
 WhenToTest LeaderMissionFailed

 Condition IsFactionLeader

 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Returns_Rome_Success
 WhenToTest LeaderMissionSuccess

 Condition MissionID return_papal_settlement

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100
 Affects AdoredByPope 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Returns_Rome_Failure
 WhenToTest LeaderMissionFailed

 Condition MissionID return_papal_settlement

 Affects KingsAuthority -2 Chance 100
 Affects AdoredByPope -1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger papalmission2
 WhenToTest LeaderMissionSuccess

 Condition PaybackID pope_rome_min_penalty_min_reward

 Affects AdoredByPope 1 Chance 5
 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 4 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest LeaderMissionSuccess

 Condition PaybackID pope_rome_min_penalty_mod_reward

 Affects AdoredByPope 1 Chance 8 
 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 8

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest LeaderMissionSuccess

 Condition PaybackID pope_rome_min_penalty_major_reward

 Affects AdoredByPope 1 Chance 15 
 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 16

;------------------------------------------
Trigger papalmission5
 WhenToTest LeaderMissionSuccess

 Condition MissionID assassinate_cardinal 

 Affects PopesEnforcer 1 Chance 100

Trigger King_OnTheThrone
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital < 10
 
 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 3
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_AwayFromThrone
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital >= 60

 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 10

Trigger King_Excommuinicated
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and FactionIsLocal
       and FactionExcommunicated
       and Attribute Piety < 5

 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 10


;========================================================
;--------- FL giving money looted after battle to soldiers
;
; one may make it more complicated, eg. if the decision is contrary to policies or character (Dread?)
; to be analysed how it would impact on the FL policies
; perhaps not possible to link to particular general, but may be it's possible?
; remember: it's essential the triggers fire in "CharacterTurnStart"

;-------------------------------------------------------- 1-2 battles this turn
Trigger Generous_FL_giving_plunder_after_battle_1
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition IsFactionLeader
		and FactionIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter general_was_generous_to_his_troops_this_turn_1 > 0

 Affects Generous 1 Chance 5
 Affects NonAuthoritarian 1 Chance 5
 Affects ThinksOfHisPeople 1 Chance 5
 Affects GreedyRuler -1 Chance 5

;-------------------------------------------------------- 3-4 battles
Trigger Generous_FL_giving_plunder_after_battle_2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition IsFactionLeader
		and FactionIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter general_was_generous_to_his_troops_this_turn_2 > 0

 Affects Generous 1 Chance 10
 Affects NonAuthoritarian 1 Chance 10
 Affects KindRuler 1 Chance 5
 Affects ThinksOfHisPeople 1 Chance 5
 Affects GreedyRuler -1 Chance 5
 
;-------------------------------------------------------- 5+ battles
Trigger Generous_FL_giving_plunder_after_battle_3
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition IsFactionLeader
		and FactionIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter general_was_generous_to_his_troops_this_turn_3 > 0

 Affects Generous 1 Chance 10
 Affects NonAuthoritarian 1 Chance 10
 Affects KindRuler 1 Chance 10
 Affects ThinksOfHisPeople 1 Chance 10
 Affects GreedyRuler -1 Chance 10
 Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 10
 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 5
 

;========================================================
;----- King selfperpetuation ----------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger good_ruler_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait StrategyChivalry > 0
 and Trait BattleChivalry > 0

 Affects NonAuthoritarian 1 Chance 3 
 Affects KindRuler 1 Chance 3  
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger good_ruler_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait StrategyChivalry > 0
 and Trait HarshRuler > 0

 Affects HarshRuler -1 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger good_ruler_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait BattleChivalry > 0
 and Trait HarshRuler > 0

 Affects HarshRuler -1 Chance 100 


;========================================================
;------------------------------------------
Trigger bad_ruler_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait StrategyDread > 0
 and Trait BattleDread > 0

 Affects Authoritarian 1 Chance 3 
 Affects HarshRuler 1 Chance 3  
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger bad_ruler_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait StrategyDread > 0
 and Trait KindRuler > 0

 Affects KindRuler -1 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger bad_ruler_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait BattleDread > 0
 and Trait KindRuler > 0

 Affects KindRuler -1 Chance 100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger selfperpetuating44
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait NonAuthoritarian >= 1

 Affects NonAuthoritarian 1 Chance 4 
 Affects KindRuler 1 Chance 4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger selfperpetuating47
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait HarshRuler >= 1

 Affects HarshRuler 1 Chance 4

Trigger King_Conquers_Jerusalem
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementName Jerusalem

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementName Cordoba

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementName Rome
       and not CharacterReligion catholic

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100

;========================================================
;----- King in battles ----------------------------------
;========================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Battle_Heroic
 WhenToTest PostBattle
 
 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds < 1.0

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Battle_Useless
 WhenToTest PostBattle
 
 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 1.0
 
 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Battle_RunsAway
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Routs

 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 100

;========================================================
;----- King as governor ---------------------------------
;========================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_City_Riots
 WhenToTest GovernorCityRiots

 Condition IsFactionLeader

 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_City_Rebels
 WhenToTest GovernorCityRebels

 Condition IsFactionLeader

 Affects KingsAuthority -2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Faction_NoCash
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Treasury < 0

 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_building_religionC
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingFinished > church

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 50
 Affects PublicFaith 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_building_religionO
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingFinished > church_o

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 50
 Affects PublicFaith 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_building_religionI
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingFinished > masjid

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 50
 Affects PublicFaith 1 Chance 33
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger governor_has_religious_anc
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition HasAncType Religion
       and IsGeneral

 Affects PublicFaith 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_Diseased
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Diseased = 1 

 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 5 

 
;========================================================
;--------- KA due to education --------------------------
;========================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_MilitaryEducated
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Military_Edu > 2
       and Trait Educated_Authority < 1

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100
 Affects Educated_Authority 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_PaganEducated
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Pagan_Edu > 2
       and Trait Educated_Authority < 1

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100
 Affects Educated_Authority 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_WesternEducated
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Western_Edu > 2
       and Trait Educated_Authority < 1

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100
 Affects Educated_Authority 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_WesternEducated2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Western_Edu > 2
       and Trait Military_Edu > 2
       and Trait Educated_Authority = 1

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100
 Affects Educated_Authority 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_EasternEducated
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Eastern_Edu > 2
       and Trait Educated_Authority < 1

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100
 Affects Educated_Authority 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_EasternEducated2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Eastern_Edu > 2
       and Trait Military_Edu > 2
       and Trait Educated_Authority = 1

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100
 Affects Educated_Authority 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger King_GreekEducated
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Greek_Edu > 2
       and Trait Educated_Authority < 1

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100
 Affects Educated_Authority 1 Chance 100

       and Trait Greek_Edu > 2
       and Trait Military_Edu > 2
       and Trait Educated_Authority = 1

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 100
 Affects Educated_Authority 1 Chance 100

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger King_HigherEducation
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= school
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library
       and Trait Wantschool < 1

 Affects KingsAuthority 1 Chance 3



;=======================================================================
;----- FACTION LEADER EXCLUSIVE TRAITS ------------------
;=======================================================================


;=======================================================================
;--------- Excommunicated  ------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ExcommunicatedProof 
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd 

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and FactionExcommunicated
       and not Trait Excommunication >= 1
       and not Trait ExcommunicationJoke >= 1 

 Affects Excommunication 1 Chance 100
 Affects ExcommunicationJoke 2 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ReconciledProof
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and not FactionExcommunicated
       and Trait Excommunication = 1 

 Affects Reconciliation 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ReconciledtheJokerProof
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and not FactionExcommunicated
       and Trait ExcommunicationJoke = 1 

 Affects Reconciliation 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter Ceased_venice = 1

 Affects FactionKiller 10 Chance 100

;=======================================================================
;========  FACTION LEADER GENERAL POLICY  ==============================
;=======================================================================
 
;=======================================================================
;--------- Strictly Religious ---------------------------
; used in script

;------------------------------------------
Trigger StrictlyReligious_add_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait Genocide = 0
       and Trait Feck = 0
       and Trait Perverted = 0
       and not FactionReligion pagan
       and Attribute Piety > 3

 Affects StrictlyReligious 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger StrictlyReligious_add_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait Genocide = 0
       and Trait Feck = 0
       and Trait Perverted = 0
       and not FactionReligion pagan
       and Attribute Piety > 3
       and Trait ReligiousActivity > 0
       
 Affects StrictlyReligious 1 Chance 4
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger StrictlyReligious_add_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait Genocide = 0
       and Trait Feck = 0
       and Trait Perverted = 0
       and not FactionReligion pagan
       and Attribute Piety > 3  
       and Trait ReligiousActivity > 0

 Affects StrictlyReligious 1 Chance 4
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger StrictlyReligious_add_4
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait Genocide = 0
       and Trait Feck = 0
       and Trait Perverted = 0
       and not FactionReligion pagan
       and Attribute Piety > 3
       and Trait Austere > 1

 Affects StrictlyReligious 1 Chance 4 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger StrictlyReligiousWideSet_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait StrictlyReligious = 1
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects WideTraitSet 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger StrictlyReligiousPriest_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and FactionLeaderTrait StrictlyReligious = 1
       and Trait StrictlyReligiousPriest = 0

 Affects StrictlyReligiousPriest 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger StrictlyReligiousPriest_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and FactionLeaderTrait StrictlyReligious = 0
       and Trait StrictlyReligiousPriest = 1

 Affects StrictlyReligiousPriest -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger StrictlyReligiousGeneral_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionLeaderTrait StrictlyReligious = 1
       and Trait StrictlyReligiousGeneral = 0

 Affects StrictlyReligiousGeneral 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger StrictlyReligiousGeneral_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and FactionLeaderTrait StrictlyReligious = 0
       and Trait StrictlyReligiousGeneral = 1

 Affects StrictlyReligiousGeneral -1 Chance 100
 
;=======================================================================
;--------- Greedy Ruler ---------------------------------
; used in script

;------------------------------------------
Trigger GreedyRuler_add_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait StrategyChivalry < 2
       and Attribute Chivalry < 3
       and Attribute Piety < 5
       and SettlementTaxLevel > tax_normal
       and SettlementLoyaltyLevel  < loyalty_happy 
       
 Affects GreedyRuler 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger GreedyRuler_add_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait StrategyChivalry < 2
       and Attribute Chivalry < 3
       and Attribute Piety < 5
       and Trait Corrupt > 1
       and SettlementTaxLevel > tax_normal 
       
 Affects GreedyRuler 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger GreedyRuler_add_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait StrategyChivalry < 2
       and Attribute Chivalry < 3
       and Attribute Piety < 5
       and Trait Embezzler > 1
       and GovernorTaxLevel > tax_normal 
       
 Affects GreedyRuler 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger GreedyRulerWideSet_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait GreedyRuler = 1
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects WideTraitSet 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger GreedyRulerGeneral_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionLeaderTrait GreedyRuler = 1
       and Trait GreedyRulerGeneral = 0

 Affects GreedyRulerGeneral 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger GreedyRulerGeneral_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and FactionLeaderTrait GreedyRuler = 0
       and Trait GreedyRulerGeneral = 1

 Affects GreedyRulerGeneral -1 Chance 100

 
;=======================================================================
;--------- Thinks Of His People -------------------------
; used in script

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ThinksOfHisPeople_add_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait BadAdministrator < 1
       and Trait StrategyDread < 1
       and Attribute Chivalry > 2

 Affects ThinksOfHisPeople 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ThinksOfHisPeople_add_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait BadAdministrator < 1
       and Trait StrategyDread < 1
       and Attribute Chivalry > 2
       and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 1
       and Trait Gregarious > 1

 Affects ThinksOfHisPeople 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ThinksOfHisPeople_add_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait BadAdministrator < 1
       and Trait StrategyDread < 1
       and Attribute Chivalry > 2
       and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 1
       and Trait KindRuler > 0

 Affects ThinksOfHisPeople 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ThinksOfHisPeopleWideSet_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait ThinksOfHisPeople = 1
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects WideTraitSet 1 Chance 100
 
 
;=======================================================================
;--------- Wise Administrator ---------------------------
; used in script

;------------------------------------------
Trigger WiseAdministrator_add_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and not Trait BadAdministrator > 0
       and Attribute Authority > 2        
       and Trait Rabblerouser < 3			; not really sure if it should prevent
       and Trait GoodBuilder > 0      

 Affects WiseAdministrator 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger WiseAdministrator_add_2a
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and not Trait BadAdministrator > 0
       and Attribute Authority > 2  
       and Trait Rabblerouser < 3
       and Trait LogisticalSkill > 0      

 Affects WiseAdministrator 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger WiseAdministrator_add_2b
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and not Trait BadAdministrator > 0
       and Attribute Authority > 2  
       and Trait Rabblerouser < 3
       and Trait GoodAdministrator > 0

 Affects WiseAdministrator 1 Chance 4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger WiseAdministratorWideSet_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WiseAdministrator = 1
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects WideTraitSet 1 Chance 100

;--------- Protector ------------------------------------
; used in script (and then EDB)

Trigger Protector_add_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Attribute Chivalry > 1
       and Attribute Authority > 3
       and Trait StrategyChivalry > 1

 Affects Protector 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Attribute Chivalry > 1
       and Attribute Authority > 3
       and Trait Vanquisher > 0          

 Affects Protector 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Attribute Chivalry > 1
       and Attribute Authority > 3
       and Trait Brave > 0          

 Affects Protector 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Protector = 1
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects WideTraitSet 1 Chance 100


;=======================================================================
;--------- Passive Ruler --------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PassiveRuler_add_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait Slothful > 0       

 Affects PassiveRuler 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger PassiveRuler_add_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Trait BoringSpeaker > 0       

 Affects PassiveRuler 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger PassiveRuler_add_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 4

 Affects PassiveRuler 1 Chance 3
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger PassiveRuler_remove1
 WhenToTest FactionLeaderPrisonersRansomedCaptor

 Condition NumCapturedSoldiers > 200
       and Trait PassiveRuler = 1
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 1

 Affects PassiveRuler -1 Chance 100         
 Affects WideTraitSet -1 Chance 100  
                                  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger PassiveRulerWideSet_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait PassiveRuler = 1
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects WideTraitSet 1 Chance 100


;=======================================================================
;--------- Absent Minded --------------------------------

;----------------------------------------
Trigger AbsentMinded_add_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 4
       and Attribute Chivalry < 3
       and Attribute Authority < 5
       and Trait Drink > 2
       and Trait Wantschool < 1

Affects AbsentMinded 1 Chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AbsentMinded_add_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 4
       and Attribute Chivalry < 3
       and Attribute Authority < 5
       and Trait Introvert > 0         
       and Trait Wantschool < 1       

 Affects AbsentMinded 1 Chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AbsentMinded_add_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 4
       and Attribute Chivalry < 3
       and Attribute Authority < 5
       and Trait Girls > 1         
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   
 Affects AbsentMinded 1 Chance 3
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger AbsentMindedWideSet_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait AbsentMinded = 1
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects WideTraitSet 1 Chance 100
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger AbsentMindedGeneral_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionLeaderTrait AbsentMinded > 0
       and Trait AbsentMindedGeneral < 1
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   
 Affects AbsentMindedGeneral 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AbsentMindedGeneral_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and FactionLeaderTrait AbsentMinded < 1
       and Trait AbsentMindedGeneral > 0
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   
 Affects AbsentMindedGeneral -1 Chance 100


;=======================================================================
;--------- FL shady connections, spy, assassins ---------
; why??? this is not the general policy of the ruler

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ShadyConnections_add_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Attribute Chivalry < 0
       and Attribute Piety < 2
       and Trait Superstitious > 0

 Affects ShadyConnections 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ShadyConnections_add_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Attribute Chivalry < 0
       and Attribute Piety < 2
       and Trait Gambling > 0
                         
 Affects ShadyConnections 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ShadyConnections_add_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and Attribute Chivalry < 0
       and Attribute Piety < 2
                         
 Affects ShadyConnections 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ShadyConnectionsWideSet_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait ShadyConnections = 1
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects WideTraitSet 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ShadyConnectionsAgentSpy_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and FactionLeaderTrait ShadyConnections = 1
       and Trait ShadyConnectionsAgent = 0

 Affects ShadyConnectionsAgent 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ShadyConnectionsAgentSpy_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and FactionLeaderTrait ShadyConnections = 0
       and Trait ShadyConnectionsAgent = 1

 Affects ShadyConnectionsAgent -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ShadyConnectionsAgentAssassin_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and FactionLeaderTrait ShadyConnections = 1
       and Trait ShadyConnectionsAgent = 0

 Affects ShadyConnectionsAgent 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ShadyConnectionsAgentAssassin_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and FactionLeaderTrait ShadyConnections = 0
       and Trait ShadyConnectionsAgent = 1

 Affects ShadyConnectionsAgent -1 Chance 100


;=======================================================================
;=======================================================================
;========  CHANGE ON THE THRONE  =======================================
;=======================================================================


;=======================================================================
;--------- Faction Leader/Heir/Regent/FutureRegent ------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Factionleaderdies
WhenToTest CeasedFactionLeader 
 
Condition Trait Factionleader = 3 

Affects Factionleader -2 Chance 100				; perhaps -3?
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Factionheirdies
WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir 
 
Condition Trait Factionleader = 2    

Affects Factionleader -1 Chance 100

;-------- SMOOTH SUCCESSION -------
;------------------------------------------ ; if "heir apparent" when become FL, smooth succession
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_1 
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Factionleader = 2 ; is heir apparent
  and not CharFactionType slave
  and not CharFactionType papal_states
    
 Affects Factionleader 1 Chance 100 ; sets to "faction leader"
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_2 ; if "rightful heir" and not a usurper when becoming FL, smooth succession
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Usurper = 0
  and Trait Factionleader = 1 ; rightful heir
  and not CharFactionType slave
  and not CharFactionType papal_states
    
 Affects Factionleader 2 Chance 100 ; sets to "faction leader"

;-------- USURPER_HEIR GETS ON THE THRONE -------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_3 ; if a usurper isn't legitimate enough, their plans will sabotage your country
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Usurper = 2 ; planning to usurp upon succession
	and not Trait WeakClaimant = 1
    and Attribute Authority < 4
    
 Affects Usurper 1 Chance 100 ; sets to weak usurper

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_4 ; ruler is reasonably legitimate, but not enough to trump all concerns about his usurpation
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Usurper = 2 ; planning to usurp upon succession
	and not Trait WeakClaimant = 1
    and Attribute Authority > 3
    and Attribute Authority < 7 
    
 Affects Usurper 2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_5 ; usurpers who have sufficient legitimacy are stronger in their position
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Usurper = 2
    and Attribute Authority > 6 ; 7 or above legitimacy
	and not Trait WeakClaimant = 1
    
 Affects Usurper 3 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_3a ; if a usurper isn't legitimate enough, their plans will sabotage your country
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Usurper = 2 ; planning to usurp upon succession
	and Trait WeakClaimant = 1
    and Attribute Authority < 3
    
 Affects Usurper 1 Chance 100 ; sets to weak usurper

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_4b ; ruler is reasonably legitimate, but not enough to trump all concerns about his usurpation
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Usurper = 2 ; planning to usurp upon succession
	and Trait WeakClaimant = 1
    and Attribute Authority > 2
    and Attribute Authority < 6 
    
 Affects Usurper 2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_5a ; usurpers who have sufficient legitimacy are stronger in their position
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Usurper = 2
	and Trait WeakClaimant = 1
    and Attribute Authority > 5 ; 6 or above legitimacy
    
 Affects Usurper 3 Chance 100 

;-------- POSSIBLE USURPER -------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_55 ; if suddenly the FL without having time to plan, just a weak usurper, as long as they aren't a bastard
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Usurper = 1
  and not Trait BastardSon  = 1
    
 Affects Usurper 2 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_55a ; still a stronger position if a weak claimant
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Usurper = 1
  and Trait WeakClaimant = 1
    
 Affects Usurper 3 Chance 100
 Affects WeakClaimant -1 Chance 100

;========================================================
;--------- Bastard Heirs  -------------------------------
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_6 ; bastard heirs without positive chivalry will automatically try to claim their father's title, become weak usurpers
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait BastardHeir = 1
    and Attribute Chivalry < 0
	and not Attribute Authority > 2
    
 Affects Usurper 3 Chance 100 
 Affects BastardHeir -1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_7 ; same as above, but more legitimate bastards are viewed more positively
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait BastardHeir = 1
    and Attribute Chivalry < 0
    and Attribute Authority > 2
	and Attribute Authority < 6
    
 Affects Usurper 4 Chance 100 
 Affects BastardHeir -1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_8 ; same
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait BastardHeir = 1
    and Attribute Chivalry < 0
	and Attribute Authority > 5
    
  Affects Usurper 5 Chance 100 
 Affects BastardHeir -1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_9 ; bastards with a scrap of honor will not claim the throne, good lads they are
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait BastardHeir = 1
    and Attribute Chivalry >= 0
    
 Affects FactionRegent 2 Chance 100 
 Affects BastardHeir -1 Chance 100 


;========================================================
;--------- Regent  --------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_10 ; most heirs presumptive will just become normal regents to begin with
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait FactionRegent = 1
    and Attribute Chivalry > -4
 
 Affects FactionRegent 1 Chance 100   

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_11 ; dreadful heirs presumptive that have enough backing will automatically become normal usurpers on succession
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait FactionRegent = 1
    and Attribute Chivalry < -3
    and not Attribute Authority > 3
    
 Affects Usurper 4 Chance 100 
 Affects FactionRegent -1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_normalfactions_12 ; same but stronger
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait FactionRegent = 1
    and Attribute Chivalry < -3
	and Attribute Authority > 3
    
 Affects Usurper 5 Chance 100 
 Affects FactionRegent -1 Chance 100 


;========================================================
;--------- No Longer Usurper (Established a New House) --

;------------------------------------------
Trigger new_house_spain1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
  and Trait Usurper > 2
	and I_EventCounter new_house_spain = 1
	and CharFactionType spain
	
 Affects Usurper -5 Chance 100 
 Affects Factionleader 3 Chance 100 
 Affects Royal_Founder 1 Chance 100  
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger new_house_spain2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not IsFactionLeader
  and Trait Usurper = 1
	and I_EventCounter new_house_spain = 1
	and CharFactionType spain
	
 Affects Usurper -1 Chance 100   

;------------------------------------------ this should be multiplied for each faction
Trigger new_house_spain_bloodline_removal_general
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsGeneral
	and CharFactionType spain
	and Trait Royal_Blood_Spanish > 0 
	and FatherTrait Royal_Founder < 1          ; to be analysed if this is needed
	and FactionLeaderTrait Usurper < 1  ; to be analysed if this is needed
	and I_EventCounter new_house_spain = 1
	
 Affects Royal_Blood_Spanish -1 Chance 100 
 Affects OldBlood 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------ this should be multiplied for each faction
Trigger new_house_spain_bloodline_removal_princess
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = princess
	and CharFactionType spain
	and Trait Royal_Blood_Spanish > 0 
	and FatherTrait Royal_Founder < 1          ; to be analysed if this is needed
	and FactionLeaderTrait Usurper < 1  ; to be analysed if this is needed
	and I_EventCounter new_house_spain = 1
	
 Affects Royal_Blood_Spanish -1 Chance 100 
 Affects OldBlood 2 Chance 100
