;--------- Fixes to Usurper -----------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger usurping_fix_1 ; no need to usurp if dad is the FL
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionHeir
  and Trait Usurper = 2
	and FatherTrait Factionleader = 3
  and FactionLeaderTrait Factionleader = 3
  and Trait Factionleader = 0
  and not CharFactionType slave
  and not CharFactionType papal_states
	
 Affects Usurper -2 Chance 100
 Affects Factionleader 2 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger usurping_fix_2 ; if dad is usurping and I'm planning regency then I'll start usurping instead
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait FactionRegent = 1
	and FatherTrait Usurper > 2
  and FactionLeaderTrait Usurper > 2
  and Trait Usurper = 0
  and not CharFactionType slave
  and not CharFactionType papal_states
	
 Affects FactionRegent -1 Chance 100 
 Affects Usurper 2 Chance 100 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger usurping_fix_3 ; 
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait FactionRegent = 1
	and FatherTrait Usurper > 2
  and FactionLeaderTrait Usurper > 2
  and Trait Usurper = 1
  and not CharFactionType slave
  and not CharFactionType papal_states
	
 Affects FactionRegent -1 Chance 100 
 Affects Usurper 1 Chance 100 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger usurping_fix_4 						; usurpers are not heirs presumptive
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait FactionRegent = 1
	and FatherTrait Usurper > 2
  and FactionLeaderTrait Usurper > 2
  and Trait Usurper = 2
  and not CharFactionType slave
  and not CharFactionType papal_states
	
 Affects FactionRegent -1 Chance 100 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger usurping_fix_5 						; I'm rightful heir so I don't need to plan regency
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait FactionRegent = 1
	and Trait Factionleader = 1
  and IsFactionHeir
  and not CharFactionType slave
  and not CharFactionType papal_states
	
 Affects FactionRegent -1 Chance 100
 Affects Factionleader 1 Chance 100
  
;==========================================
;==========================================
;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_pope
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition FactionType papal_states

 Affects IAmPope 1 Chance 100
 Affects RandomPopeName 1 Chance 100
 Affects RandomPopeName 1 Chance 30
 Affects RandomPopeName 1 Chance 30

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_pope_name1
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition FactionType papal_states
       and Trait RandomPopeName = 1

 Affects PopeName1 1 Chance 100
 Affects PopeName1 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName1 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName1 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName1 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName1 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName1 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName1 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName1 1 Chance 40
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_pope_name2
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition FactionType papal_states
       and Trait RandomPopeName = 2

 Affects PopeName2 1 Chance 100
 Affects PopeName2 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName2 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName2 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName2 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName2 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName2 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName2 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName2 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName2 1 Chance 40

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_pope_name3
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition FactionType papal_states
       and Trait RandomPopeName = 3

 Affects PopeName3 1 Chance 100
 Affects PopeName3 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName3 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName3 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName3 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName3 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName3 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName3 1 Chance 40
 Affects PopeName3 1 Chance 40

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_heresyimmunityAI_remove
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition FactionType papal_states
       and Trait Heresy_Immunity_AI = 1

 Affects Heresy_Immunity_AI -1 Chance 100

;==========================================
;========= BEGINNING OF USURPATION ========
;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_am_a_better_king_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Attribute Chivalry < -2
	and not Trait IWantTheCrown > 0
	and not Trait Factionleader > 1
	and FactionLeaderAttribute Chivalry > 5
	
Affects IWantTheCrown 1 Chance 10
;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_am_a_better_king_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Attribute Chivalry > 2
	and not Trait IWantTheCrown > 0
	and not Trait Factionleader > 1
	and FactionLeaderAttribute Chivalry < -3
	
Affects IWantTheCrown 1 Chance 10
;------------------------------------------                            
Trigger I_am_a_better_king_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Attribute Piety > 4
	and not Trait IWantTheCrown > 0
	and not Trait Factionleader > 1
	and FactionLeaderAttribute Piety < 3
	
Affects IWantTheCrown 1 Chance 10
;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_am_no_better_king_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Attribute Chivalry < -2
	and Trait IWantTheCrown > 0
	and not Trait Factionleader > 1
	and FactionLeaderAttribute Chivalry < 4
	
Affects IWantTheCrown -1 Chance 10
;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_am_no_better_king_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Attribute Chivalry > 2
	and Trait IWantTheCrown > 0
	and not Trait Factionleader > 1
	and FactionLeaderAttribute Chivalry > -3
	
Affects IWantTheCrown -1 Chance 10
;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_am_no_better_king_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Trait IWantTheCrown > 0
	and not Trait Factionleader > 1
	and FactionLeaderAttribute Piety > 2
  and Attribute Piety > 4
	
Affects IWantTheCrown -1 Chance 10
;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_am_a_better_king_10
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
 
 Condition Trait IWantTheCrown = 1
	
Affects IWantTheCrown -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_want_to_be_king_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Trait IWantTheCrown = 1
  and Attribute Loyalty < 5
  and Trait Usurper = 0
	and not Trait Factionleader > 0
  and not IsFactionHeir
  and not IsFactionLeader
	
Affects Usurper 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_want_to_be_king_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition not Trait Factionleader > 0
  and Attribute Loyalty < 5
  and Trait Usurper = 0
	and FactionLeaderTrait Offensive_To_Nobles > 0
  and not IsFactionHeir
  and not IsFactionLeader
	
Affects Usurper 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_want_to_be_king_4
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition IsGeneral
	and Trait Factionleader < 1
	and Attribute Loyalty < 3
	and Trait Usurper < 1
	and not IsFactionHeir
	and not IsFactionLeader
	
Affects Usurper 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_dont_want_to_be_king_anymore1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition not Trait Factionleader > 0
  and Attribute Loyalty > 5
  and Trait Usurper = 1
  and not IsFactionHeir
  and not IsFactionLeader
	
Affects Usurper -1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_dont_want_to_be_king_anymore2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition not Trait Factionleader > 0
  and FactionLeaderAttribute Authority > 6
  and FactionLeaderTrait Factionleader = 3
  and Trait Usurper = 1
  and not IsFactionHeir
  and not IsFactionLeader                                                        
	
Affects Usurper -1 Chance 10
;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_dont_want_to_be_king_anymore3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition not Trait Factionleader > 0
  and Trait Near_Loyalty > 0
  and FactionLeaderTrait Factionleader = 3
  and Trait Usurper = 1
  and not IsFactionHeir
  and not IsFactionLeader                                                        
	
Affects Usurper -1 Chance 20
;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_want_to_be_king_42
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Attribute Chivalry < 0
  and Attribute Chivalry > -4
	and Trait FactionRegent = 2
  and IsFactionLeader
	
Affects Usurper 3 Chance 2
;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_want_to_be_king_5
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Attribute Chivalry < -3
    and Attribute Chivalry > -7
	and Trait FactionRegent = 2
  and IsFactionLeader
	
Affects Usurper 4 Chance 5
;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_want_to_be_king_6
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Attribute Chivalry < -3
    and Trait FactionRegent = 2
    and IsFactionLeader
	and not CharFactionType byzantium
	
Affects Usurper 5 Chance 10
;-------------------------------------------
Trigger I_want_to_be_king_6a ; 
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Attribute Chivalry < 3
    and Trait FactionRegent = 2
    and IsFactionLeader
	and CharFactionType byzantium
	
Affects Usurper 5 Chance 10
;------------------------------------------
Trigger I_want_to_be_king_removeregent
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Trait FactionRegent = 2
    and Trait Usurper > 2
    and IsFactionLeader
	
Affects FactionRegent -2 Chance 100


;========================================================
;--------- Valid Heir  ----------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_1 						; Biological son of FL gets automatic claim if not in republic
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition FatherTrait Factionleader = 3
    and Trait BiologicalSon = 1
	and Trait Factionleader = 0
  and not CharFactionType slave
  and not CharFactionType papal_states
  and not CharFactionType venice
  and not CharFactionType pisa
	
Affects Factionleader 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_3 						; Biological son of faction heir gets automatic claim if not in republic
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition FatherTrait Factionleader = 2
    and Trait BiologicalSon = 1
	and Trait Factionleader = 0
  and not CharFactionType slave
  and not CharFactionType papal_states
  and not CharFactionType venice
  and not CharFactionType pisa
	
Affects Factionleader 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_4 						; Biological son of valid claimant gets automatic claim if not in republic
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition FatherTrait Factionleader = 1
    and Trait BiologicalSon = 1
	and Trait Factionleader = 0
  and not CharFactionType slave
  and not CharFactionType papal_states
  and not CharFactionType venice
  and not CharFactionType pisa
	
Affects Factionleader 1 Chance 100 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_401 						; Sufficiently valiant bastards of valid claimants get claims if not in republic
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition FatherTrait Factionleader = 1
    and Trait BastardSon  = 1
	and Trait Factionleader = 0
  and Attribute Chivalry > 2
  and Attribute Command > 2
  and not CharFactionType slave
  and not CharFactionType papal_states
  and not CharFactionType venice
  and not CharFactionType pisa
	
Affects Factionleader 1 Chance 100

;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; THERE IS SOMETHING WRONG WITH TRAIT  WifeIsFactionHeir

;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_41 						; Daughters of claimants give their claims to their children
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition FatherTrait Factionleader > 0
    and AgentType = princess
	and Trait PrincessFactionHeir = 0
	and not CharFactionType venice
    and not CharFactionType pisa
	
Affects PrincessFactionHeir 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_41a						; Daughters of claimants give their claims to their children
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition FatherTrait WeakClaimant > 0
    and AgentType = princess
	and Trait PrincessWeakFactionHeir = 0
	and not CharFactionType venice
    and not CharFactionType pisa
	
Affects PrincessWeakFactionHeir 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_41b						; Daughters of claimants give their claims to their children
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition FatherTrait WifeIsFactionHeir > 0
    and AgentType = princess
	and Trait PrincessWeakFactionHeir = 0
	and not CharFactionType venice
    and not CharFactionType pisa
	
Affects PrincessWeakFactionHeir 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_41c						; Daughters of claimants give their claims to their children (trigger seems to double with 41)
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition FatherTrait Factionleader > 0
    and AgentType = princess
	and Trait PrincessFactionHeir = 0
	and Trait PrincessWeakFactionHeir = 1
	
Affects PrincessWeakFactionHeir -1 Chance 100
Affects PrincessFactionHeir 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_43 ; Characters who marry such daughters are given a trait telling the game they did that
 WhenToTest CharacterMarriesPrincess
 
 Condition SpouseTrait PrincessFactionHeir = 1
    and Trait Factionleader = 0
	and not CharFactionType venice
	and not CharFactionType pisa
	
Affects WifeIsFactionHeir 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_43a ; Characters who marry such daughters are given a trait telling the game they did that
 WhenToTest CharacterMarriesPrincess
 
 Condition SpouseTrait PrincessWeakFactionHeir = 1
    and Trait Factionleader = 0
	and not CharFactionType venice
	and not CharFactionType pisa
	
Affects WifeIsWeakFactionHeir 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_5 ; Biological sons of men married to daughters of valid claimants receive automatic weak claims if not in republic
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
 
 Condition FatherTrait WifeIsFactionHeir = 1
    and Trait Factionleader = 0
     and Trait Usurper = 0
     and Trait BastardSon  = 0
	 and Trait WeakClaimant = 0
	 and not CharFactionType venice
  and not CharFactionType pisa
	
Affects WeakClaimant 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_5a ; Biological sons of men married to daughters of valid claimants receive automatic weak claims if not in republic
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
 
 Condition FatherTrait WifeIsWeakFactionHeir = 1
    and Trait Factionleader = 0
     and Trait Usurper = 0
     and Trait BastardSon  = 0
	 and Trait WeakClaimant = 0
	 and not CharFactionType venice
  and not CharFactionType pisa
	
Affects WeakClaimant 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_5b ; Strong claims override weak ones
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Trait WeakClaimant > 0
    and Trait Factionleader > 0
	
Affects WeakClaimant -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_6 ; Sane patricians can always potentially be valid heirs
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition Trait PossibleCandidate < 1
	and CharFactionType pisa
	and Trait Sane > 0
	and Trait Royal_Blood_Pisan = 1
	
Affects PossibleCandidate 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_7 ; Sane patricians can always potentially be valid heirs
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition Trait PossibleCandidate < 1
	and CharFactionType venice
	and Trait Sane > 0
	and Trait Royal_Blood_Venetian = 1
	
Affects PossibleCandidate 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_8 ; If a character transferred from another faction having acquired a claim, remove it
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition Trait PossibleCandidate > 0
	and Trait Factionleader = 1
	and not CharFactionType venice
	and not CharFactionType pisa
	
Affects Factionleader -1 Chance 100
Affects PossibleCandidate -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_9 ; Remove the claim of the insane
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition Trait PossibleCandidate > 0
	and Trait Factionleader = 1
	and Trait Insane < 1
	
Affects Factionleader -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_9a ; Remove the claim of the deranged
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition Trait PossibleCandidate > 0
	and Trait Factionleader = 1
	and Trait Deranged > 1
	
Affects Factionleader -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_9b ; Remove the candidacy of usurpers
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition Trait PossibleCandidate > 0
	and Trait Usurper > 0
	
Affects PossibleCandidate -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_10 ; Remove the ability to acquire claims from the insane
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition Trait PossibleCandidate > 0
	and Trait Insane > 0
	
Affects PossibleCandidate -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_10a ; Remove the ability to acquire claims from the insane
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition Trait PossibleCandidate > 0
	and Trait Deranged > 1
	
Affects PossibleCandidate -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger valid_heir_10b ; The following are triggers which allow sane patricians to acquire claims
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition Trait PossibleCandidate > 0
	and Trait Factionleader < 1
	and RandomPercent > 50
	
Affects Factionleader 1 Chance 2

    and Trait Usurper = 0
    and not IsFactionLeader
    and not IsFactionHeir
	
Affects Usurper 1 Chance 25
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition FatherTrait Usurper > 0
    and Trait Usurper = 0
    and not IsFactionLeader
    and not IsFactionHeir
	
Affects Usurper 1 Chance 5
;------------------------------------------
Trigger not_valid_usurper_heir_anymore
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition Trait Usurper = 1
	and Trait Factionleader > 0
	
Affects Usurper -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_regent_plotting ; my not-dad is regent, so i'm apparently gonna start plotting to usurp. my recommendation is to slap a dread and loyalty requirement on here
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition FactionLeaderTrait FactionRegent > 1
    and not FatherTrait FactionRegent > 1 
    and Trait Usurper = 0
    and Attribute Chivalry < 1 ; recommendation
    and Attribute Loyalty < 5 ; recommendation
    and Trait Factionleader = 0  
    and not IsFactionLeader
    and not IsFactionHeir
	and RandomPercent > 50
	
Affects Usurper 1 Chance 2 

;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_regent_plotting_disloyal_dread ; my own creation, dreadful and disloyal characters more likely to plot
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition FactionLeaderTrait FactionRegent > 1
    and not FatherTrait FactionRegent > 1 
    and Trait Usurper = 0
    and Attribute Chivalry < -1 ; i try to tie these numbers to the flavour text, in this case "uses less than admirable tactics"
	and Attribute Loyalty < 7 ; "would only disobey if he believed he would be commended"
    and Trait Factionleader = 0  
    and not IsFactionLeader
    and not IsFactionHeir
	and RandomPercent > 50
	
Affects Usurper 1 Chance 2 

;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_regent_plotting_disloyal_chiv ; my own creation, chivalrous and disloyal characters more likely to plot, intentional that it can stack since characters in general are no longer guaranteed to plot during a regency
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
 
 Condition FactionLeaderTrait FactionRegent > 1
    and not FatherTrait FactionRegent > 1 
    and Trait Usurper = 0
	and Attribute Chivalry < 6 ; "few discrepancies, honorable intentions"
	and Attribute Loyalty < 3 ; "loyal only for show"
    and Trait Factionleader = 0  
    and not IsFactionLeader
    and not IsFactionHeir
	and RandomPercent > 50
	
Affects Usurper 1 Chance 2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesheirdaddyheir_2 ; more cleanup stuff
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait Usurper = 2
       and Trait Factionleader > 0  
       
 Affects Usurper -2 Chance 100


;========================================================
;--------- Becoming Heir  -------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger nonvalidheirisheir ; generic character becomes heir, by default is regent
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionHeir 
       and Trait Factionleader = 0
	   and Trait WeakClaimant = 0
       and Trait Usurper = 0
       and Trait BastardSon  = 0
       and Trait FactionRegent = 0
       and not CharFactionType slave
       and not CharFactionType papal_states
	   
 Affects FactionRegent 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger nonvalidleaderisleader ; generic character becomes leader, by default is regent
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Factionleader = 0
	   and Trait WeakClaimant = 0
       and Trait Usurper = 0
       and Trait BastardSon  = 0
       and Trait FactionRegent = 0
       and not CharFactionType slave
       and not CharFactionType papal_states
	   
 Affects FactionRegent 2 Chance 100 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesweakclaimheir_1
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait WeakClaimant > 0
       and Trait Usurper < 1 
	   and Trait Factionleader = 0
       
 Affects Factionleader 2 Chance 100
 Affects WeakClaimant -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesweakclaimheir_2
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait WeakClaimant > 0
       and Trait Usurper < 1 
	   and Trait Factionleader = 1
       
 Affects Factionleader 1 Chance 100
 Affects WeakClaimant -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesweakclaimleader_1
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait WeakClaimant > 0
       and Trait Usurper < 1 
	   and Trait Factionleader = 0
       
 Affects Factionleader 3 Chance 100
 Affects WeakClaimant -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesweakclaimleader_2
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait WeakClaimant > 0
       and Trait Usurper < 1 
	   and Trait Factionleader = 1
       
 Affects Factionleader 2 Chance 100
 Affects WeakClaimant -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesheirdaddyleader_2 ; rightful heir becomes heir apparent
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait Factionleader = 1
      and Trait BastardSon  = 0
	   
 Affects Factionleader 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger bastardbecomesheir ; bastard that has proven themself (remember that other trigger?) is made heir, is legitimised
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait BastardSon  = 1
       and Trait Factionleader = 1
	   
 Affects Factionleader 1 Chance 100
 Affects BastardSon  -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger bastardbecomesbastardheir ; bastard lucks into succession, gains unique trait
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait BastardSon  = 1
       and Trait Factionleader = 0
       
 Affects BastardHeir 1 Chance 100
 Affects BastardSon  -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger bastardbecomesusurper ; bastard heir was already plotting, becomes usurper
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait BastardSon  = 1
       and Trait Factionleader = 0
       and Trait Usurper = 1
       
 Affects Usurper 1 Chance 100
 Affects BastardSon  -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger bastardbecomesfactionleader ; worthy bastard becomes FL, legitimises himself
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait BastardSon  = 1
       and Trait Factionleader = 1
	   
 Affects Factionleader 2 Chance 100
 Affects BastardSon  -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger bastardbecomesfactionregent ; not worthy bastard becomes regent, legitimises himself
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait BastardSon  = 1
       and Trait Factionleader = 0
       and not CharFactionType slave
       and not CharFactionType papal_states
	   
 Affects FactionRegent 2 Chance 100
 Affects BastardSon  -1 Chance 100 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger bastardbecomesusurperleader ; bastard usurper legitimises himself
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait BastardSon  = 1
       and Trait Factionleader = 0
       and Trait Usurper = 1
	   
 Affects Usurper 2 Chance 100
 Affects BastardSon  -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesheirusurperwrongpath1 ; usurpers usurping, nothing to see here
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait Usurper = 1
	  and Trait Factionleader = 0
     
 Affects Usurper 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesheirdaddyusurper ; daddy is such a weird word
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition FatherTrait Usurper > 2
       and Trait Usurper = 0
       and Trait Factionleader = 0
	   
 Affects Usurper 2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesheirdaddyusurper_2 ; usurpers usurping etc
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition FatherTrait Usurper > 2
       and Trait Usurper = 1
       and Trait Factionleader = 0
	   
 Affects Usurper 1 Chance 100

;========================================================
;--------- Usurper in Court  ----------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_an_usurper_1 ; knights of the realm stand up to the usurper, regardless of whether they are strong or not
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Usurper > 2
       and Attribute Chivalry >= 4
       and Trait Usurper = 0
	   and Trait UsurperInCourt = 0
       
 Affects UsurperInCourt 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_an_usurper_2 ; weak usurpers require lower chiv to stand up to, but never as strongly as higher chiv characters will
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Usurper = 3
       and Attribute Chivalry < 4
	   and Attribute Chivalry >= 0
       and Trait Usurper = 0
	   and Trait UsurperInCourt = 0
       
 Affects UsurperInCourt 2 Chance 100 ; higher numbers mean less resistance

;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_an_usurper_3 ; same deal
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Usurper = 4
       and Attribute Chivalry < 4
	   and Attribute Chivalry >= 0
       and Trait Usurper = 0
	   and Trait UsurperInCourt = 0
       
 Affects UsurperInCourt 3 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_an_usurper_4
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Usurper = 5
       and Attribute Chivalry < 4
	   and Attribute Chivalry >= 0
       and Trait Usurper = 0
	   and Trait UsurperInCourt = 0
       
 Affects UsurperInCourt 4 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_rightful_1 ; knights of the realm are recognised for their brave resistance to tyranny, only problem is that this trait appears even when the usurper has just managed to start his own dynasty and hasn't actually been replaced with a legit leader
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Factionleader = 3
	   and not FactionLeaderTrait Royal_Founder > 0 ; to prevent the aforementioned problem
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 1
;       and Trait HeroAndRogue < 1
	   
 Affects UsurperInCourt -1 Chance 100
; Affects HeroAndRogue 3 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_rightful_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Factionleader = 3
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 2
       
 Affects UsurperInCourt -2 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_rightful_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Factionleader = 3
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 3
       
 Affects UsurperInCourt -3 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_rightful_4
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Factionleader = 3
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 4
       
 Affects UsurperInCourt -4 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_rightful_regent_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait FactionRegent = 2
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 1
	   
 Affects UsurperInCourt -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_rightful_regent_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait FactionRegent = 2
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 2
       
 Affects UsurperInCourt -2 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_rightful_regent_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait FactionRegent = 2
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 3
       
 Affects UsurperInCourt -3 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_rightful_regent_4
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait FactionRegent = 2
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 4
       
 Affects UsurperInCourt -4 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger king_is_rightful_8
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Factionleader = 3;	   
 and not FactionLeaderTrait Royal_Founder > 0 ; to prevent the aforementioned problem
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 1
;	   and Trait HeroAndRogue = 2
       
 Affects UsurperInCourt -1 Chance 100
; Affects HeroAndRogue 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger king_is_king_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait UsurperInCourt > 0
       
 Affects UsurperInCourt -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger i_am_rogue_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionType slave
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 1
	
 Affects UsurperInCourt -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger i_am_rogue_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionType slave
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 2
	
 Affects UsurperInCourt -2 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger i_am_rogue_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionType slave
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 3
	
 Affects UsurperInCourt -3 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger i_am_rogue_4
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionType slave
       and Trait UsurperInCourt = 4
	
 Affects UsurperInCourt -4 Chance 100

;       and Trait Vanquisher > 0
;	   and Trait HeroAndRogue = 1
; 
; Affects HeroAndRogue 1 Chance 100

;========================================================
;--------- No Heir Yet ----------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger EnglishKing_NoHeirYet
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType england
       and I_NumberOfHeirs england < 1

 Affects NoHeirYet 1 Chance 10 ; should gain the trait by the tenth year

;------------------------------------------
Trigger FrenchKing_NoHeirYet
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType france
       and I_NumberOfHeirs france < 1

 Affects NoHeirYet 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and FactionType hre
       and I_NumberOfHeirs hre < 1

 Affects NoHeirYet 1 Chance 10

;========================================================
;--------- Bad Blood ------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Badblood_inheritance
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and FatherTrait Disobedient >= 1
       and not Trait Badblood > 0
       and not Trait Disobedient >= 1 ;if already a traitor what is the point?

 Affects Badblood 1 Chance 100
 
;========================================================
;--------- Envious of Heir ------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SonofKing_EnviesHeir
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FatherTrait Factionleader = 3
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Attribute Loyalty <= 4
       and Trait EnviousOfHeir = 0

 Affects EnviousOfHeir 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SonofRegent_EnviesHeir
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FatherTrait FactionRegent = 2
       and not IsFactionHeir
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Attribute Loyalty <= 4
       and Trait EnviousOfHeir = 0

 Affects EnviousOfHeir 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger EnviesHeir_NoMore
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait EnviousOfHeir = 1
       and Attribute Loyalty >= 5

 Affects EnviousOfHeir -1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger EnviesHeir_IsHeir
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition Trait EnviousOfHeir > 0

 Affects EnviousOfHeir -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger EnviesHeir_IsLeader
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait EnviousOfHeir > 0

 Affects EnviousOfHeir -1 Chance 100


;========================================================
;========  LOYALTY SYSTEM ===============================
;========================================================

;========================================================
;-----  Civil strife (OffensiveToNobles, Obedient)  -----
;========================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger low_auth_add_offensive_small_empire
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and SettlementsTaken >= 5
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Authority < 4

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger high_auth_remove_offensive_small_empire
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles > 0
       and SettlementsTaken >= 5
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Authority >= 4

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles -1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger low_auth_add_offensive_medium_empire
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and SettlementsTaken >= 10
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Authority < 5

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger high_auth_remove_offensive_medium_empire
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles > 0
       and SettlementsTaken >= 10
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Authority >= 5

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles -1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger low_auth_add_offensive_large_empire
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and SettlementsTaken >= 20
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Authority < 6

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger high_auth_remove_offensive_large_empire
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles > 0
       and SettlementsTaken >= 20
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Authority >= 6

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles -1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
;Nation in debt!
Trigger Disgust_with_King's_Unreasonable_Finances
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and IsFactionLeader
       and Treasury < 0
       and SettlementsTaken >= 5
       and Attribute Authority <= 5
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
;Excommunication!
Trigger Disgust_with_King's_Religiona
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionExcommunicated
       and IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementsTaken >= 5
       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 0
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and Attribute Authority <= 5 
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger civil_war_or_not_progress
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 1

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 3

;------------------------------------------
;since the king isn't around... let's check again...
Trigger civil_war_or_not_progress_expedite
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital >= 50
       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles = 1
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles 1 Chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Authority_Loss_Over_Time
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles > 1
       and Attribute Authority > 1

 Affects KingsAuthority -1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
;Disobedient = 0 is the initial step- no returning back...
;only really need one level for this
Trigger Civil_War_Loyal_General1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Offensive_To_Nobles = 2
       and IsGeneral
       and Trait Disobedient = 0
       and Trait Obedient = 0
       and Attribute Loyalty >= 5
       and not IsFactionLeader

 Affects Obedient 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Civil_War_Rebel_General1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Offensive_To_Nobles = 2
       and IsGeneral
       and Trait Disobedient = 0
       and Trait Obedient = 0
       and Attribute Loyalty < 5
       and not IsFactionLeader

 Affects Obedient 1 Chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Civil_War_Rebel_General2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Offensive_To_Nobles = 2
       and IsGeneral
       and Trait Far_Loyalty > 1
       and Trait Disobedient = 0
       and not Trait Obedient = 1
       and Attribute Loyalty < 5
       and not IsFactionLeader

 Affects Disobedient 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Civil_War_Rebel_General3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Offensive_To_Nobles = 2
       and IsGeneral
       and Trait Far_Loyalty > 2
       and Trait Disobedient = 0
       and not Trait Obedient = 1
       and Attribute Loyalty < 5
       and not IsFactionLeader

 Affects Disobedient 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Slaves_Cant_Have_Civil_War
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait Disobedient >= 1
       and FactionType slave

 Affects Obedient 1 Chance 100


;========================================================
;-----  Near Capital  -----------------------------------
;========================================================

;--- for crowned Faction Leader ---------- 
Trigger FL_Near_Capital_Crown_Add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital < 50
       and Trait NearCapital < 1
       and Trait Crownholder > 3

 Affects NearCapital 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger FL_Near_Capital_Remove_Crown
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital >= 50
       and Trait NearCapital > 0
       and Trait Crownholder > 3

 Affects NearCapital -1 Chance 100 
 
;--- for uncrowned Faction Leader ---------- 
Trigger FL_Near_Capital_Uncrown_Add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital < 30
       and Trait NearCapital < 1
       and Trait Crownholder < 4

 Affects NearCapital 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger FL_Near_Capital_Remove_Uncrown
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital > 20
       and Trait NearCapital = 1
       and Trait Crownholder < 4

 Affects NearCapital -1 Chance 100 
 
;---------Right hand at court? ------------
Trigger FL_RightHand_Add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter trusted_ally = 1
       and Trait NearCapital = 0

 Affects NearCapital 2 Chance 100 
 
;---------Right hand at court? ------------
Trigger FL_RightHand_Add1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter trusted_ally = 1
       and Trait NearCapital = 1

 Affects NearCapital 1 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_RightHand_Add2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter trusted_ally = 1
       and Trait NearCapital = 0

 Affects NearCapital 2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger FL_RightHand_Remove1Uncrown
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait NearCapital = 2
	   and DistanceCapital < 30
	   and Trait Crownholder < 4
	   and I_EventCounter trusted_ally = 0

 Affects NearCapital -1 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger FL_RightHand_Remove2Uncrown
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait NearCapital = 2
	   and DistanceCapital > 20
	   and Trait Crownholder < 4
	   and I_EventCounter trusted_ally = 0

 Affects NearCapital -2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger FL_RightHand_Remove1Crown
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait NearCapital = 2
	   and DistanceCapital < 50
	   and Trait Crownholder > 3
	   and I_EventCounter trusted_ally = 0

 Affects NearCapital -1 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger FL_RightHand_Remove2Crown
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait NearCapital = 2
	   and DistanceCapital >= 50
	   and Trait Crownholder > 3
	   and I_EventCounter trusted_ally = 0

 Affects NearCapital -1 Chance 100 
 
;-------- for generals ------------------ 
Trigger General_FLNearCapital_Add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
	   and FactionLeaderTrait NearCapital > 0
       and Trait Officeholder < 1
       and DistanceCapital < 30
       and Trait FLNearCapital < 1

 Affects FLNearCapital 1 Chance 100 

;---------------------------------------- 
Trigger General_FLNearCapital_Remove_Away
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Officeholder < 1
       and DistanceCapital > 20
       and Trait FLNearCapital > 0

 Affects FLNearCapital -1 Chance 100 
 
;---------------------------------------- 
Trigger General_FLNearCapital_Remove_FLAway
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and not FactionLeaderTrait NearCapital > 0
       and Trait FLNearCapital > 0

 Affects FLNearCapital -1 Chance 100 

;--- for generals with office ------------
Trigger Office_Near_Capital_Add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
	   and FactionLeaderTrait NearCapital > 0
       and DistanceCapital < 50
       and Trait FLNearCapital < 1
       and Trait Officeholder > 0

 Affects FLNearCapital 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger Office_FLNearCapital_Remove_Away
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital >= 50
       and Trait FLNearCapital > 0
       and Trait Officeholder > 0

 Affects FLNearCapital -1 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger Courtier_Add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
	   and not IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital < 30
       and Trait Courtier < 1
	   
 Affects Courtier 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger Courtier_Remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
       and DistanceCapital > 20
       and Trait Courtier = 1

 Affects Courtier -1 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger EminentCourtier_Add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
       and DistanceCapital < 30
       and Trait Courtier > 0
	   and Trait Courtier < 2
	   and Trait Sane > 0
	   
 Affects Courtier 1 Chance 60

;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger EminentCourtier_Remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition IsGeneral
       and DistanceCapital > 20
       and Trait Courtier >= 2

 Affects Courtier -2 Chance 100 

;======================================================== TO BE FIXED AS IT SEEMS REDUNDANT NOW 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger FLCourtier_Remove1
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

Condition Trait Courtier = 1

 Affects Courtier -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger FLCourtier_Remove2
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

Condition Trait Courtier = 2

 Affects Courtier -2 Chance 100

 ; Affects Courtier -3 Chance 100

; Trigger FLCourtier_Remove4
 ; WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

; Condition Trait Courtier = 4

 ; Affects Courtier -4 Chance 100
 
; ;------------------------------------------ 
; Trigger FLCourtier_Remove5
 ; WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

; Condition Trait Courtier = 5

 ; Affects Courtier -5 Chance 100
 

;========================================================
;-----  Near/Far Loyalty  -------------------------------
;========================================================

;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger Near_Loyalty_Plus_Very_Low_Loyalty
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait Near_Loyalty < 2
       and Trait FLNearCapital > 0
       and Attribute Loyalty < 3
	   and I_EventCounter right_hand < 1

 Affects Near_Loyalty 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger Near_Loyalty_Plus_Not_Discontent
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait Near_Loyalty < 2
       and Trait FLNearCapital > 0
       and Attribute Loyalty < 6
       and not Trait DiscontentGeneral > 0
	   and I_EventCounter right_hand < 1

 Affects Near_Loyalty 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger Near_Loyalty_Plus_Low_Authority
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait FLNearCapital > 0
       and Trait Near_Loyalty < 2
       and Attribute Authority < 3
	   and I_EventCounter right_hand < 1

 Affects Near_Loyalty 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger Near_Loyalty_Plus_Office
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait FLNearCapital > 0
       and Trait Near_Loyalty < 2
       and Trait Officeholder < 2
       and Trait Officeholder > 0
	   and I_EventCounter right_hand < 1

 Affects Near_Loyalty 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger Near_Loyalty_Minus_Distance
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait FLNearCapital < 1
       and Trait Near_Loyalty > 0
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects Near_Loyalty -1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger Near_Loyalty_Minus_FL_Liar
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait Near_Loyalty > 0
       and FactionLeaderTrait Liar > 0
       and FactionLeaderTrait DeceiverVirtue < 1

Affects Near_Loyalty -1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger Near_Loyalty_Minus_FL_AbsentMinded
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Near_Loyalty > 0
       and FactionLeaderTrait AbsentMinded > 0

Affects Near_Loyalty -1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
; Trigger Near_Loyalty_Minus_Change_On_Throne_Big
; WhenToTest CeasedFactionLeader

 ; Condition IsGeneral
       ; and FactionIsLocal
       ; and Trait Near_Loyalty > 3

 ; Affects Near_Loyalty -4 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Near_Loyalty_Minus_Change_On_Throne_Middle
WhenToTest CeasedFactionLeader

 Condition IsGeneral
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Near_Loyalty > 1

 Affects Near_Loyalty -2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Near_Loyalty_Minus_Change_On_Throne_Small
WhenToTest CeasedFactionLeader

 Condition IsGeneral
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Near_Loyalty > 0

 Affects Near_Loyalty -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------ 
;-------- far loyalty -------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Far_Loyalty_Plus_Without_Office
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and DistanceCapital > 60
       and Trait Far_Loyalty < 2
       and FactionIsLocal
       and not InEnemyLands
       and Trait Officeholder < 1

 Affects Far_Loyalty 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Far_Loyalty_Plus_Not_Good_Enought
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and DistanceCapital > 70
       and Trait Far_Loyalty < 2
       and FactionIsLocal
       and not InEnemyLands
       and not Trait Upright > 0
       and not Trait Prim > 0
       and not Trait Stoic > 0
       and not Trait WifeIsNoble > 0

 Affects Far_Loyalty 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Far_Loyalty_Plus_Distance
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and DistanceCapital > 80
       and Trait Far_Loyalty < 2
       and not InEnemyLands

 Affects Far_Loyalty 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Far_Loyalty_Minus_HappyAway
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait Far_Loyalty > 0
       and Trait Xenophilia > 1
       and PopulationOwnReligion < 50
       and not AtSea
       and not Trait DiscontentGeneral > 0
       and not InEnemyLands

 Affects Far_Loyalty -1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Far_Loyalty_Minus_Married
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and DistanceCapital < 50
       and Trait Far_Loyalty > 0
       and IsMarried

 Affects Far_Loyalty -1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Far_Loyalty_Minus_Content
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and DistanceCapital < 50
       and Trait Far_Loyalty > 0
       and not Trait DiscontentGeneral > 0

 Affects Far_Loyalty -1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Far_Loyalty_Minus_Coward
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and DistanceCapital < 50
       and Trait Far_Loyalty > 0
       and not Trait Coward > 0

 Affects Far_Loyalty -1 Chance 10


;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loyalty_Check_LostBattle
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= average
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds > 0.75
       and not Trait Near_Loyalty > 0

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loyalty_Check_Prisoners1
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor

 Condition RansomType execute
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 50
       and Attribute Chivalry >= 4
       and not Trait Near_Loyalty > 0

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loyalty_Check_Prisoners2
 WhenToTest ExterminatePopulation

 Condition Attribute Chivalry >= 4
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and not Trait Near_Loyalty > 0

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loyalty_Check_Piety
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionExcommunicated
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and IsGeneral
       and Attribute Piety >= 4
       and not Trait Near_Loyalty > 0

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loyalty_Check_Buildings1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition not IsFactionLeader
       and not GovernorBuildingExists >= stone_wall
       and not GovernorBuildingExists >= castle
       and Attribute Command > 4
       and DistanceCapital > 75
       and not Trait Near_Loyalty > 0

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loyalty_Check_Adoption
 WhenToTest BrotherAdopted

 Condition not IsFactionHeir
      and not Trait Near_Loyalty > 0

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loyalty_Check_Oppossed_Attributes
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Attribute Chivalry > 2
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Chivalry <= -3
       and not Trait Near_Loyalty > 0

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loyalty_Check_WonBattle
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds < 1.75

 Affects ContentGeneral 1 Chance 75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loyalty_Check_Buildings2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition not IsFactionLeader
       and GovernorBuildingExists >= large_stone_wall
       and Attribute Command < 6
       and not Trait Far_Loyalty > 0

 Affects ContentGeneral 1 Chance 15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loyalty_Check_Buildings3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition not IsFactionLeader
       and GovernorBuildingExists >= fortress
       and Attribute Command < 6
       and not Trait Far_Loyalty > 0

 Affects ContentGeneral 1 Chance 15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Loyalty_Check_Similar_Attributes
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Attribute Chivalry > 2
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Chivalry > 2
       and not Trait Far_Loyalty > 0

 Affects ContentGeneral 1 Chance 5 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger Cleanup_ContentGeneral1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait ContentGeneral > 0
       and Trait Usurper > 0

 Affects ContentGeneral -1 Chance 100

 
 
;=========================================================
;========  FACTION @ GEOGRAPHIC SPECIFIC triggers ========
;=========================================================
 
;=========================================================
;----- Visiting famous cities ----------------------------
;=========================================================
;-- slightly adjusted by JoC

;========================================================
;----- the city - 100% chance of visiting ---------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Jerusalem_catholic_Negative
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 Condition SettlementName Jerusalem
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem > 0
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem2 > 0

 Affects Visit_Jerusalem2 1 Chance 25
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Jerusalem_catholic_Positive
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 Condition SettlementName Jerusalem
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem > 0
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem2 > 0
 
 Affects Visit_Jerusalem 1 Chance 100
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Jerusalem_orthodox
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 Condition SettlementName Jerusalem
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem_orthodox > 0
 
 Affects Visit_Jerusalem_orthodox 1 Chance 100
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Jerusalem_islamic
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 Condition SettlementName Jerusalem
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem_islamic > 0
 
 Affects Visit_Jerusalem_islamic 1 Chance 100
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Rome
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 Condition SettlementName Rome
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Rome > 0
 
 Affects Visit_Rome 1 Chance 100
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Santiago
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 Condition SettlementName Santiago
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Santiago > 0

 Affects Visit_Santiago 1 Chance 100
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Constantinople
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 Condition SettlementName Constantinople
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and not Trait Visit_Constantinople > 0

 Affects Visit_Constantinople 1 Chance 100
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Mecca
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 Condition SettlementName Mecca
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and not Trait Visit_Mecca > 0

 Affects Visit_Mecca 1 Chance 100
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_Medina
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
 Condition SettlementName Medina
       and IsGeneral
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and not Trait Visit_Medina > 0

 Affects Visit_Medina 1 Chance 100
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 
;========================================================
;----- only region - 50% chance of visiting -------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_JerusalemRegion
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 190 Jerusalem_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem >= 1
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem2 >= 1

 Affects Visit_Jerusalem 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_JerusalemRegion2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 190 Jerusalem_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem >= 1
       and not Trait Visit_Jerusalem2 >= 1

 Affects Visit_Jerusalem2 1 Chance 30
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_RomeRegion
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 114 Rome_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Rome >= 1

 Affects Visit_Rome 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_GaliciaRegion
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 108 Santiago_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not Trait Visit_Santiago >= 1

 Affects Visit_Santiago 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_ConstantinopleRegion
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 123 Constantinople_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion orthodox
       and not Trait Visit_Constantinople >= 1

 Affects Visit_Constantinople 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Visit_MeccaRegion
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 Condition IsRegionOneOf 199 Mecca_Province
       and IsGeneral
       and not EndedInEnemyZOC
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and not Trait Visit_Mecca >= 1

 Affects Visit_Mecca 1 Chance 50


;========================================================
;----- Vendetta triggers --------------------------------
;========================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger VendettaAgainstVenice
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > average
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and GeneralFoughtFaction venice
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0

 Affects VendettaVenice 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger VendettaAgainstVeniceForHumiliation
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > clear
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and GeneralFoughtFaction venice
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0

 Affects VendettaVenice 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger VendettaAgainstVeniceSet
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Trait VendettaVenice = 1

 Affects VendettaSet 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger VendettaAgainstSicily
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > average
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and GeneralFoughtFaction sicily
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0

 Affects VendettaSicily 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > clear
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and GeneralFoughtFaction sicily
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0

 Affects VendettaSicily 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Trait VendettaSicily = 1

 Affects VendettaSet 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger VendettaAgainstPolandForHumiliation
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > clear
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and GeneralFoughtFaction poland
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0

 Affects VendettaPoland 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Trait VendettaPoland = 1

 Affects VendettaSet 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DadHasVendettaVenice
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FatherTrait VendettaVenice = 1
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0
       and not I_NumberOfSettlements venice = 0
       and RandomPercent > 44
       and RandomPercent < 51

 Affects VendettaVenice 1 Chance 100
 Affects VendettaSet 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DadHasVendettaVenice_ComeOfAge
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait VendettaVenice = 1
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0
       and not I_NumberOfSettlements venice = 0
       and RandomPercent > 49
       and RandomPercent < 81

 Affects VendettaVenice 1 Chance 100
 Affects VendettaSet 1 Chance 100

       and RandomPercent > 49
       and RandomPercent < 81

 Affects VendettaHungary 1 Chance 100
 Affects VendettaSet 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DadHasVendettaAragon
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FatherTrait VendettaAragon = 1
       and Trait VendettaSet = 0
       and not I_NumberOfSettlements aragon = 0
       and RandomPercent > 44
       and RandomPercent < 51

 Affects VendettaAragon 1 Chance 100
 Affects VendettaSet 1 Chance 100

;=========================================================================================
;----- Great Cities Conquered ----------------------------
;=========================================================
; with own traits: Constantinople, Baghdad, Konya, Antioch, Kiev
; just for Vanquisher and VictorVirtue:
; -- London, Paris, Coellen, Milano, Venice, Rome, Palermo
; -- Corduba, Fes, Tunis, Cairo, Jerusalem, Damascus, Isfahan and Marv

   
;========================================================
;-------- CONSTANTINOPOLE CONQUERED    ------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Islam_Conquer_Constantinople_trigger
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Constantinople
       and FactionReligion islam
	   
 Affects Islam_Conquer_Constantinople 1 Chance 100
 Affects Vanquisher 1 Chance 100
 Affects VictorVirtue 2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Greek_Conquer_Constantinople_trigger
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Constantinople
       and FactionReligion orthodox
	   
 Affects Greek_Conquer_Constantinople 1 Chance 100
 Affects Vanquisher 1 Chance 100
 Affects VictorVirtue 2 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Catholic_Conquer_Constantinople_trigger
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Constantinople
       and FactionReligion catholic
	   
 Affects Catholic_Conquer_Constantinople 1 Chance 100
 Affects Vanquisher 1 Chance 100
 Affects VictorVirtue 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Rus_Conquer_Constantinople_trigger
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Constantinople
       and FactionReligion orthodox
	   
 Affects Rus_Conquer_Constantinople 1 Chance 100
 Affects Vanquisher 1 Chance 100
 Affects VictorVirtue 2 Chance 100


;========================================================
;-------- KIEV CONQUERED  -------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Conqueror_Kiev_Rus_trigger
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Kiev
       and FactionReligion orthodox
	   
 Affects Conqueror_Kiev_Rus 1 Chance 100
 Affects VictorVirtue 2 Chance 100
 Affects Vanquisher 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Conqueror_Kiev_Others_trigger
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Kiev
       and not FactionType russia
       and not FactionType kievan_rus
	   
 Affects Conqueror_Kiev_Others 1 Chance 100
 Affects VictorVirtue 1 Chance 100
 Affects Vanquisher 1 Chance 100
 

;========================================================
;-------- BAGHDAD CONQUERED  ----------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Conqueror_Baghdad_Muslim_trigger
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Baghdad
	   
 Affects Conqueror_Baghdad_Muslim 1 Chance 100
 Affects VictorVirtue 2 Chance 100
 Affects Vanquisher 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Conqueror_Baghdad_Others_trigger
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition SettlementName Baghdad
	   
 Affects Conqueror_Baghdad_Others 1 Chance 100
 Affects VictorVirtue 1 Chance 100
 Affects Vanquisher 1 Chance 100

 Affects VictorVirtue 1 Chance 100
 Affects Vanquisher 1 Chance 100

       and FactionType byzantium

 Affects VictorVirtue 1 Chance 100
 Affects Vanquisher 1 Chance 100

;=========================================================
;----- Fear & Hate (between factions) --------------------
;=========================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_cumans_1
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds <= 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtFaction cumans

 Affects HatesCumans 1 Chance 30

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_cumans_2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.8
       and GeneralFoughtFaction cumans

 Affects HatesCumans 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fear_cumans_1
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess < crushing
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds > 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtFaction cumans

 Affects FearsCumans 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fear_cumans_2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and GeneralFoughtFaction cumans

 Affects FearsCumans 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_byzantium_1
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds <= 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtFaction byzantium

 Affects HatesByzantium 1 Chance 30

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_byzantium_2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.8
       and GeneralFoughtFaction byzantium
       and BattleOdds < 3.0	  
	   
 Affects HatesByzantium 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fear_byzantium_1
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess < crushing
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds > 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtFaction byzantium

 Affects FearsByzantium 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fear_byzantium_2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and GeneralFoughtFaction byzantium

 Affects FearsByzantium 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_denmark_1
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds <= 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtFaction denmark

 Affects HatesDenmark 1 Chance 30

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_denmark_2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.8
       and GeneralFoughtFaction denmark
       and BattleOdds < 3.0	  
	   
 Affects HatesDenmark 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fear_denmark_1
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess < crushing
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds > 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtFaction denmark

 Affects FearsDenmark 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and GeneralFoughtFaction denmark

 Affects FearsDenmark 1 Chance 50

 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess < crushing
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds > 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtFaction france

 Affects FearsFrance 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fear_france_2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and GeneralFoughtFaction france

 Affects FearsFrance 1 Chance 50

Trigger dad_FearsCumans
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition FatherTrait FearsCumans > 0

 Affects HatesCumans 1 Chance 40
 Affects HatesCumans 1 Chance 25
 Affects HatesCumans 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------

 Affects HatesByzantium 1 Chance 40

;------- HATE RELIGIONS ----------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_religion_catholic
 WhenToTest PostBattle
	
 Condition IsGeneral
       and not CharacterReligion catholic
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.6
       and BattleOdds < 3.0	 
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction byzantium
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction russia
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction serbia
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction kievan_rus
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction georgia
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction abbasid
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction egypt
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction turks
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction rum
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction moors
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction zengid
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction lithuania
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction cumans
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction mongols
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction slave
	   
 Affects HatesCatholic 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fear_religion_catholic_1
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not CharacterReligion catholic
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.6
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 1.0
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction byzantium
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction russia
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction serbia
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction kievan_rus
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction georgia
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction abbasid
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction egypt
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction turks
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction rum
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction moors
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction zengid
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction lithuania
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction cumans
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction mongols

 Affects FearsCatholic 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fear_religion_catholic_2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not CharacterReligion catholic
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 1.0
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction byzantium
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction russia
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction serbia
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction kievan_rus
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction georgia
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction abbasid
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction egypt
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction turks
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction rum
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction moors
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction zengid
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction lithuania
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction cumans
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction mongols

 Affects FearsCatholic 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_religion_islam
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not CharacterReligion islam
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.6
       and BattleOdds < 3.0	 
       and GeneralFoughtCulture middle_eastern
	   
 Affects HatesIslam 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger fear_religion_islam_1
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not CharacterReligion islam
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.6
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtCulture middle_eastern
	   
 Affects FearsIslam 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fear_religion_islam_2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not CharacterReligion islam
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtCulture middle_eastern
	   
 Affects FearsIslam 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest PostBattle

       and not CharacterReligion orthodox
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.6
       and BattleOdds < 3.0	 
       and GeneralFoughtCulture greek

 WhenToTest PostBattle

       and not CharacterReligion orthodox
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.6
       and BattleOdds < 3.0	 
       and GeneralFoughtCulture eastern_european
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction poland
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction hungary
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction cumans
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction lithuania

       and not CharacterReligion orthodox

       and GeneralFoughtCulture greek

 WhenToTest PostBattle

       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.6
       and BattleOdds < 3.0	 
       and GeneralFoughtCulture eastern_european
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction poland

       and not GeneralFoughtFaction russia

 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 0.6
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtCulture eastern_european
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction poland
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction hungary
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction kievan_rus
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction russia
