       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 1.0
       and GeneralFoughtCulture eastern_european
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction poland
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction hungary
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction kievan_rus
       and not GeneralFoughtFaction russia

 Affects FearsPagan 1 Chance 20
 
 
;========================================================= 
;----- FL maritime interests -----------------------------
;=========================================================
;- trait important to lower costs while sailing

;--------------------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_MI_Visiting_Shipwright_Milit
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= shipwright
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and Trait Military_Edu > 1
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 33

;-----------------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_MI_Visiting_CastleShipwright_Milit
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_shipwright
       and Trait MilitaryInclination > 0
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 33

;------------- ---------------------------------------
Trigger FL_MI_Visiting_Shipwright_Admin
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= shipwright
       and Trait GovernorInclination > 0
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 10

;-----------------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_MI_Visiting_CastleShipwright_Admin
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_shipwright
       and Trait GovernorInclination > 0
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 10
 
;------------- ---------------------------------------
Trigger FL_MI_Visiting_Warehouse_Admin
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= warehouse
       and Trait GovernorInclination > 0
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 20

;------------- ---------------------------------------
Trigger FL_MI_Visiting_Shipwright_Scholar
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= shipwright
       and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 33

;-----------------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_MI_Visiting_CastleShipwright_Scholar
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_shipwright
       and Trait WantsHigherEd > 0
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 33

;-----------------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_MI_NavalAcademy
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= naval_academy
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 33

;-----------------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_MI_Pisa
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= port
       and FactionType pisa
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 33

;-----------------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_MI_Venice
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= port
       and FactionType venice
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 33

;-----------------------------------------------------
Trigger FL_MI_England
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= port
       and FactionType england
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 33

;-----------------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

       and SettlementBuildingExists >= port
       and FactionType denmark
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0

       and SettlementBuildingExists >= port

	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0

       and SettlementBuildingExists >= port
       and FactionType aragon
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 33

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= port
       and FactionType portugal
	   and not Trait AbsentMinded > 0
	   and not Trait Senile > 0
	   
 Affects MaritimeInterests 1 Chance 33 


;=========================================================
;----- Ruler of Sicily triggers --------------------------
;=========================================================
;-- available for all factions
;-- I'm not sure what is used in the script so I'm leaving everything as it is ---
;=========================================================

;---------- triggers to acquire / lose trait Ruler of Sicily ---
;---------------------------------------------------------------
Trigger RulerOfSicily_venice_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType venice
       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_SettlementOwner Palermo = venice
       and I_SettlementOwner Naples = venice

 Affects RulerOfSicily 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RulerOfSicily_venice_remove_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType venice
       and IsFactionLeader
       and Trait RulerOfSicily = 1
       and not I_SettlementOwner Palermo = venice

 Affects RulerOfSicily -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RulerOfSicily_venice_remove_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType venice
       and IsFactionLeader
       and Trait RulerOfSicily = 1
       and not I_SettlementOwner Naples = venice

 Affects RulerOfSicily -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RulerOfSicily_sicily_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType sicily
       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_SettlementOwner Palermo = sicily
       and I_SettlementOwner Naples = sicily

 Affects RulerOfSicily 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RulerOfSicily_sicily_remove_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType sicily
       and IsFactionLeader
       and Trait RulerOfSicily = 1
       and not I_SettlementOwner Palermo = sicily

 Affects RulerOfSicily -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RulerOfSicily_sicily_remove_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType sicily
       and IsFactionLeader
       and Trait RulerOfSicily = 1
       and not I_SettlementOwner Naples = sicily

 Affects RulerOfSicily -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

 Affects RulerOfSicily -1 Chance 100

Trigger RulerOfSicily_turks_remove_12
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType rum
       and IsFactionLeader
       and Trait RulerOfSicily = 1
       and not I_SettlementOwner Palermo = rum

 Affects RulerOfSicily -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionType turks
       and IsFactionLeader
       and Trait RulerOfSicily = 1
       and not I_SettlementOwner Naples = turks

;========================================================================================= 
;========               ==================================================================
;========  CAMPAIGNING  ==================================================================
;========               ==================================================================
;========================================================================================= 


;=========================================================
;----- Number of battles & Victor Virtue -----------------
;=========================================================

;-------------------------------------------------------- Vanquisher (number of crushing victories)
Trigger Major_Count
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and PercentageEnemyKilled > 50
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 1200 
       and BattleOdds < 1.0

 Affects Vanquisher 1 Chance 100
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 15 

;-------------------------------------------------------- CounterOfBattles (any battle fought - up to 25)
Trigger Counter_Of_Battles
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
        and Trait CounterOfBattlesMany < 1
		and Trait CounterOfBattlesManyMore < 1
		
 Affects CounterOfBattles 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Counter_Of_Battles_Many
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Trait CounterOfBattlesMany > 0
		and Trait CounterOfBattlesManyMore < 1
		
 Affects CounterOfBattlesMany 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Counter_Of_Battles_ManyMore
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Trait CounterOfBattlesMany < 1
		and Trait CounterOfBattlesManyMore > 0
		
 Affects CounterOfBattlesManyMore 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Counter_Of_Battles_Many_Start
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Trait CounterOfBattles > 8
		
 Affects CounterOfBattlesMany 1 Chance 100
 Affects CounterOfBattles -10 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Counter_Of_Battles_ManyMore_Start
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Trait CounterOfBattlesMany > 8
		
 Affects CounterOfBattlesManyMore 1 Chance 100
 Affects CounterOfBattlesMany -10 Chance 100 
 
;-------------------------------------------------------- Victor Virtue (quality of battles won)
;-- points(thresholds): 6,12,18
; triumph in big battles
; and famous cities captured - triggers in relevant setion
; in a battle against the odds victory: standard 2, clear 4, crushing 6
; a city taken: 1-2, famous city: +1/2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger VV_Triumph_In_Battle_Standard_AnyOdds
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess < clear
       and BattleOdds < 2.0
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 750 

 Affects VictorVirtue 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger VV_Triumph_In_Battle_Standard_AgainstOdds
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess < clear
       and BattleOdds < 0.8
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 750 

 Affects VictorVirtue 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger VV_Triumph_In_Battle_Clear_AnyOdds
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = clear
       and BattleOdds < 2.0
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 750 

 Affects VictorVirtue 2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger VV_Triumph_In_Battle_Clear_AgainstOdds
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = clear
       and BattleOdds < 0.8
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 750 

 Affects VictorVirtue 2 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger VV_Triumph_In_Battle_Crushing_AnyOdds
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > clear
       and BattleOdds < 2.0
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 750 

 Affects VictorVirtue 3 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger VV_Triumph_In_Battle_Crushing_AgainstOdds
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > clear
       and BattleOdds < 0.8
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 750 

 Affects VictorVirtue 3 Chance 100

;additional to the previous triggers so only one
;------------------------------------------
Trigger VV_Triumph_In_Siege_AgainstOdds
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= clear
       and I_ConflictType Siege
       and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6
       and BattleOdds <= 0.9
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 500 

 Affects VictorVirtue 1 Chance 100

;additional to the previous triggers so only one
;------------------------------------------
Trigger VV_Triumph_In_Capture
WhenToTest PostBattle

Condition WonBattle
	and I_ConflictType Siege
	
Affects VictorVirtue 1 Chance 100
Affects ArmyCost -5 Chance 100


;=======================================================================
;----- Army Campaign Morale ------------------------------
;--- levels(points): 1(1),2(5) - 3(9) - 4(13),5(17),6(21),7(25),8(29),9(33)
;--- level 9 is not used, it's just a technical maximum
; recovery happens in home lands, with own faith population, with GreatVictor and GoodCommander
; fast recovery from high levels (6,7,8)
; higher starting value (2) for GreatSpeaker and Authority > 5
	
;----------------------------------------------------------------------- ACM safety valves
Trigger ACM_Safety_In_Case_of_Bug_Min_VeryHard
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
	
 Condition I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
	and IsGeneral
	and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale < 1
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale 9 Chance 100

;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Safety_In_Case_of_Bug_Min_Hard
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
	
 Condition I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 3
	and IsGeneral
	and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale < 1
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale 9 Chance 100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Safety_In_Case_of_Bug_Max
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 8 
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -4 Chance 100

;----------------------------------------------------------------------- ACM decrease from high levels (cumulative!)
Trigger ACM_Improve_High_Value_Camping_OwnReligion
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 5
		and Trait ArmyIsCamping > 0
		and Trait ArmyIsCamping < 2
				
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1 Chance 100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Improve_High_Value_AtHome
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 5
		and not InEnemyLands
		and not EndedInEnemyZOC
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Improve_High_Value_AtHome_OwnReligion
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 5
		and not InEnemyLands
		and not EndedInEnemyZOC
		and PopulationOwnReligion > 50
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1 Chance 100
	
;----------------------------------------------------------------------- ACM decrease abroad & home (cumulative!)
Trigger ACM_Improve_Camping_AnyReligion
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 3
		and Trait ArmyIsCamping > 0
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Improve_Camping_OwnReligion
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 3
		and Trait ArmyIsCamping > 0
		and Trait ArmyIsCamping < 2
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1  Chance  100

	
;----------------------------------------------------------------------- ACM decrease home (cumulative!)
Trigger ACM_Home_Improve_In_Settlement_Ended
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition not IsUnderSiege
        and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
		and Treasury > 0                                  ; if the kingdom is not able pay, the morale doesn't improve
		and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 3

    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Home_Improve_In_Settlement_Resting
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition not IsUnderSiege
		and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
		and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
		and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 3

    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Home_Improve_GoodCommander
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not InEnemyLands
		and not IsUnderSiege
		and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 2    ; goes to level "Eager Troops"
		and Trait GoodCommander > 0
		and Trait FitForOffice > 1            ; not insane or ill

    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Home_Improve_GreatVictor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not InEnemyLands
		and not IsUnderSiege
		and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 2
		and Trait VictorVirtue > 1
		and Trait FitForOffice > 1
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Home_Improve_Before_Expedition_Authority
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not InEnemyLands
		and not IsUnderSiege
		and Attribute Authority > 5
		and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 2
		and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale < 3
		and Trait FitForOffice > 1
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Home_Improve_Before_Expedition_GoodSpeaker
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not InEnemyLands
		and not IsUnderSiege
		and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 2
		and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale < 3
		and Trait InspiringSpeaker > 1
		and Trait FitForOffice > 1
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1 Chance 50


;----------------------------------------------------------------------- ACM decrease due to battles won
Trigger ACM_Improve_Clear_Victory
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1.0
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 40
          and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 1            ; may get to Bent on Glory, especially if other triggers fire
          and CharacterIsLocal

    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -2 Chance 100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Improve_Average_Victory
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1.0
          and BattleSuccess >= average
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 40
          and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 1
          and CharacterIsLocal

    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Improve_Close_Victory
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1.4
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 40
          and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 1
          and CharacterIsLocal

    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Improve_Any_Victory
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 40
          and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 1
          and CharacterIsLocal

    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Improve_SettlementCapture
    WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

    Condition CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale > 1

    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale -2 Chance 100

;----------------------------------------------------------------------- ACM increase (cumulative!)
Trigger ACM_Deteriorate_Troops_Moving_Everybody
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ArmyCampaignMorale < 6      ; moving won't make troops mutinous
		and RemainingMPPercentage < 80
		and FactionIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale 1 Chance 66

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Deteriorate_Troops_Moving_No_Disciplinarian
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ArmyCampaignMorale < 6
		and RemainingMPPercentage < 80
		and FactionIsLocal
		and Trait Disciplinarian < 1
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale 1 Chance 33
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Deteriorate_Troops_Moving_BadDisciplinarian
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ArmyCampaignMorale < 6
		and RemainingMPPercentage < 80
		and FactionIsLocal
		and Trait BadDisciplinarian > 0
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Deteriorate_Troops_Abroad
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ArmyCampaignMorale < 8
		and InEnemyLands                         ; also at sea
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4		

    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Deteriorate_BadCommander
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ArmyCampaignMorale < 8
		and InEnemyLands
		and Trait NaturalMilitarySkill < 1
		and Trait BadCommander > 0              ; also low Military / Pagan education is thus taken into account
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale 1 Chance 50
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Deteriorate_EnemyContact
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait ArmyCampaignMorale < 8
		and InEnemyLands
		and EndedInEnemyZOC                  ; also besieging
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Deteriorate_AnyDefeat
    WhenToTest PostBattle
		
    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale < 8
          and CharacterIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale 2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ACM_Deteriorate_Defeat_Woeful
    WhenToTest PostBattle
		
    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds > 1.2
          and Trait ArmyCampaignMorale < 8
          and CharacterIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
    Affects ArmyCampaignMorale 2 Chance 100

	
;========================================================================================= ADDITIONAL COSTS

;======================================================== Supply and Siege Costs
;----- Supply and Siege Costs ---------------------------
;-- used with script
;-- the triggers are ordered in (logically) reverse way but keep this order - this economises on the triggers
;-- it's also easy to add other criteria for moving 1->2 and 2->3
;-- in one of the GeneralCaptureSettlement triggers there's a drop of ArmyCosts to 0
;-- IDEA: introduce at some point criterium related to 1. Embezzler, 2. King having a crown 

;------------------------------------------ 5->0
Trigger ArmyCost_Remove_BackHome
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd      ; it's possible that at the end you're in enemy lands, but after the AI attack you're in home lands - so use End

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and not InEnemyLands
       and Trait ArmyCost > 0
	   
 Affects ArmyCost -5 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------ 5->0
Trigger ArmyCost_Remove_SecondaryGeneral
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and TimeWithArmy > 0         ; the first general in the army doesn't get this attribute
       and Trait ArmyCost > 0
	   
 Affects ArmyCost -5 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------ X->0   (settlement captured event is in another place)
Trigger ArmyCost_Remove_BattleLost         ; this trigger is to avoid having the traits when after the battle the army retreats to home territory
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WonBattle
	and Trait ArmyCost > 0

 Affects ArmyCost -5 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------ 5->1
Trigger ArmyCost_Siege_Remove_Engineer
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and InEnemyLands
       and not IsBesieging
       and Trait ArmyCost > 4

 Affects ArmyCost -4 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------ 4->1
Trigger ArmyCost_Siege_Remove_NoEng
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and InEnemyLands
       and not IsBesieging
       and Trait ArmyCost > 3

 Affects ArmyCost -3 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------ 0->1,  250 fl.
Trigger ArmyCost_Campaign_HighLogistics
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and InEnemyLands
       and TimeWithArmy < 1
       and not AtSea
	   and not IsOnCrusade
	   and not IsOnJihad
       and Trait ArmyCost < 1
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
 Affects ArmyCost 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------ 1->2,  500 fl.
Trigger ArmyCost_Campaign_AverageLogistics
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and InEnemyLands
       and not AtSea
	   and not IsOnCrusade
	   and not IsOnJihad
       and Trait ArmyCost < 2
       and Trait LogisticalSkill < 2
	   and Trait Military_Edu < 4
	   and Trait NaturalMilitarySkill < 4
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
 Affects ArmyCost 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------ 2->3,  1000 fl.
Trigger ArmyCost_Campaign_LowLogistics
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and InEnemyLands
       and not AtSea
	   and not IsOnCrusade
	   and not IsOnJihad
       and Trait ArmyCost < 3
       and Trait LogisticalSkill < 1
	   and Trait Military_Edu < 3
	   and Trait NaturalMilitarySkill < 3
	   and not HasAncType MilitaryEngineer
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
 Affects ArmyCost 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------ just a safety valve if the Med2 engine goes nuts
Trigger ArmyCost_Siege_Started_from_Home
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsBesieging
       and CharacterIsLocal
       and TimeWithArmy < 1
	   and not IsOnCrusade
	   and not IsOnJihad
       and Trait ArmyCost < 1
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
 Affects ArmyCost 4 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------ 1->4
Trigger ArmyCost_Siege_Started_HighLogistics
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsBesieging
       and CharacterIsLocal
	   and not IsOnCrusade
	   and not IsOnJihad
       and Trait ArmyCost < 2
       and Trait ArmyCost > 0
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
 Affects ArmyCost 3 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------ 2->4
Trigger ArmyCost_Siege_Started_AverageLogistics
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsBesieging
       and CharacterIsLocal
	   and not IsOnCrusade
	   and not IsOnJihad
       and Trait ArmyCost < 3
       and Trait ArmyCost > 1
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
 Affects ArmyCost 2 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------ 3->4
Trigger ArmyCost_Siege_Started_LowLogistics
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsBesieging
       and CharacterIsLocal
	   and not IsOnCrusade
	   and not IsOnJihad
       and Trait ArmyCost < 4
       and Trait ArmyCost > 2
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
 Affects ArmyCost 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------ 4->5
Trigger ArmyCost_Siege_NotEngineer
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsBesieging
       and CharacterIsLocal
	   and not IsOnCrusade
	   and not IsOnJihad
       and Trait ArmyCost < 5
	   and Trait Military_Edu < 4
	   and Trait GoodEngineer < 1
	   and not HasAncType SiegeEngineer    
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
 Affects ArmyCost 1 Chance 100


;======================================================== AtSeaCost
;----- At Sea Costs  ------------------------------------
;-- used with script
;-- in the future might be more modded with RulerOfSicily and MaritimeInterests

;------------------------------------------ this trigger should be before the follwing one!
Trigger AtSeaCost_Remove_SecondaryGeneral
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
	   and TimeWithArmy > 0
       and Trait AtSeaCost > 0
	   
 Affects AtSeaCost -2 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger AtSeaCost_Remove_NotAnymore
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not AtSea
       and Trait AtSeaCost > 0
	   
 Affects AtSeaCost -2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AtSeaCost_Start
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
		and CharacterIsLocal
		and TimeWithArmy < 1
		and AtSea
		and not IsOnCrusade
		and not IsOnJihad
		and Trait AtSeaCost < 1
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
 Affects AtSeaCost 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AtSeaCost_BadLogistics
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and CharacterIsLocal
	   and TimeWithArmy < 1
       and AtSea
	   and not IsOnCrusade
	   and not IsOnJihad
       and Trait AtSeaCost < 2
       and Trait LogisticalSkill < 1
       and FactionLeaderTrait MaritimeInterests < 1	
	   and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		
 Affects AtSeaCost 1 Chance 100
 

;=========================================================
;----- Under Siege ---------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger General_Under_Siege_Random
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsUnderSiege
       and IsGeneral
	   and Trait CounterOfBattlesMany < 1   ; experienced generals (9 battles) are immune
	   and Trait CounterOfBattlesManyMore < 1
	   
 Affects Miserly 1 Chance 10 
 Affects Xenophobia 1 Chance 5
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 10 
 Affects Drink 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger General_Under_Siege_Inexperienced
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsUnderSiege
       and IsGeneral
	   and Trait CounterOfBattles < 1
	   and Trait CounterOfBattlesMany < 1
	   and Trait CounterOfBattlesManyMore < 1
	   
 Affects Miserly 1 Chance 10 
 Affects Xenophobia 1 Chance 5
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 10 
 Affects Drink 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger General_Under_Siege_Disciplinarian_Selfperpetuation
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsUnderSiege
       and Trait Disciplinarian > 0

 Affects Disciplinarian 1 Chance 50


;=========================================================
;----- Devastation of a tile -----------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger devastation
 WhenToTest GeneralDevastatesTile

 Affects Despoiler 1 Chance 4 
 Affects Just -1 Chance 4  
 
;=========================================================
;========   CRUSADE/JIHAD traits  ========================
;=========================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Crusades1_Joining
 WhenToTest GeneralJoinCrusade

 Condition IsCrusade
       and Trait CrusaderHistory < 1

 Affects CrusaderHistory 1 Chance 100 
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 30 
 Affects Xenophobia 2 Chance 20 
 Affects Just 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Crusades1_Arriving_To_Target_Region
 WhenToTest GeneralArrivesCrusadeTargetRegion

 Condition IsCrusade

	Affects CrusaderHistory 1 Chance 100
	Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 100  
	Affects Brave 1 Chance 30 
	Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 33
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Crusades3_Assaulting_Target_Settlement
 WhenToTest GeneralAssaultsResidence

 Condition IsOnCrusade
       and IsRegionCrusadeTarget

 Affects CrusaderHistory 1 Chance 100 
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Crusades4_Target_Settlement_Conquered
 WhenToTest GeneralTakesCrusadeTarget

 Condition IsCrusade

 Affects CrusaderHistory 3 Chance 100 
 Affects StrategyChivalry 2 Chance 100 
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 100 
 Affects Just 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Crusades5_Abandoning
 WhenToTest GeneralAbandonCrusade

 Affects CrusaderHistory -3 Chance 100 
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 100 
 Affects PoorLogistics 1 Chance 10
 Affects Just -1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Crusades6_Avoiding_Battle
 WhenToTest PreBattleWithdrawal

 Condition IsOnCrusade
       and IsRegionCrusadeTarget

 Affects CrusaderHistory -1 Chance 100 
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest GeneralJoinCrusade

 Condition IsJihad 
       and Trait JihadHistory < 1

 Affects JihadHistory 1 Chance 100 
 Affects Xenophobia 2 Chance 20 
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 30 
 Affects Just 1 Chance 10

 WhenToTest GeneralArrivesCrusadeTargetRegion

 Condition IsJihad

	Affects JihadHistory 1 Chance 100 
	Affects Brave 1 Chance 30 
	Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 33

 WhenToTest GeneralAssaultsResidence

       and IsRegionJihadTarget

 Affects JihadHistory 1 Chance 100 
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 30 

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest GeneralTakesCrusadeTarget

 Condition IsJihad

 Affects JihadHistory 3 Chance 100 
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 100 
 Affects Just 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest GeneralAbandonCrusade

 Condition IsJihad

	Affects JihadHistory -3 Chance 100 
	Affects Coward 1 Chance 100 
	Affects PoorLogistics 1 Chance 10
 Affects Just -1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------

 Condition IsOnJihad
       and IsRegionJihadTarget

 Affects JihadHistory -2 Chance 100 
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger CrusaderViews
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsOnCrusade 

 Affects HatesOrthodox 1 Chance 3
 Affects HatesIslam 1 Chance 5
 Affects HatesPagan 1 Chance 4
 Affects Corrupt -1 Chance 2
 Affects Embezzler -1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger JihadiViews
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsOnJihad 

 Affects HatesCatholic 1 Chance 5
 Affects HatesOrthodox 1 Chance 4
 Affects HatesPagan 1 Chance 4
 Affects Corrupt -1 Chance 2
 Affects Embezzler -1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
;-------- WILL BE MOVED AWAY FROM HERE -------
Trigger DamnCatholicChurch
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition FactionExcommunicated 

 Affects HatesPapal_States 1 Chance 6
 Affects Just -1 Chance 4
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger ReConsiderCatholicChurch
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition not FactionExcommunicated
       and Trait HatesPapal_States > 0 

 Affects HatesPapal_States -1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DamnCrusaders
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsCrusadeTarget
       and not Religion catholic 

 Affects HatesCatholic 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger DamnJihadis 
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsJihadTarget
       and not Religion islam

 Affects HatesIslam 1 Chance 25

;------ xenophilia and xenophobia effects --------
;-------------------------------------------------
Trigger Crusader_Experience_Effects_Fobia
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait CrusaderHistory > 1
       and Trait Xenophilia < 1
	   
 Affects Xenophobia -1 Chance 2
 
;-------------------------------------------------
Trigger Crusader_Experience_Effects_Filia
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait CrusaderHistory > 1
       and Trait Xenophilia > 0
	   
 Affects Xenophilia 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Jihad_Experience_Effects_Fobia
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait JihadHistory > 1
       and Trait Xenophilia < 1
	   
 Affects Xenophobia -1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Jihad_Experience_Effects_Filia
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait JihadHistory > 1
       and Trait Xenophilia > 0
	   
 Affects Xenophilia 1 Chance 2
  
  

;========================================================================================= 
;========================================================================================= 
;========  BATTLE  ======================================
;========================================================================================= 
;========================================================================================= 

;========================================================================================= Good/Bad Commander
;----- Good/Bad Commander -------------------------------  
;========================================================
;  REVIEW CLEARING HOUSE MECHANISM SO THAT 1. no info for the player on both up and down,
; 2. no Bad and Good Commander at the same time on a general (so clearing house also PostBattle)
; perhaps it's a bad idea to have a clearing house if there're GainMessages esp. in the 1st level

;------------------------------------------
Trigger StandardBattle_AnyVictory_MilitaryInclination
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleOdds < 2.1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 40 
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 33
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger StandardBattle_AnyVictory_NotMilitaryInclination
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleOdds < 2.1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 20 
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger StandardBattle_NonPagan_ClearVictory
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = clear
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds < 1.75
       and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 50 
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 5
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger StandardBattle_Pagan_ClearVictory
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = clear
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds < 1.75
       and FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 50 
 Affects Pagan_Edu 1 Chance 5
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger StandardBattle_NonPagan_CrushingVictory
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds < 1.51
       and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 85 
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 15
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 30

;------------------------------------------
Trigger StandardBattle_Pagan_CrushingVictory
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess = crushing
       and I_ConflictType Normal
       and BattleOdds < 1.51
       and FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 85 
 Affects Pagan_Edu 1 Chance 15
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 30
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_NonPagan_HeroicBattleCommander
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and PercentageEnemyKilled > 25
       and BattleOdds < 0.51
       and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 100
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 75
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 20 
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Pagan_HeroicBattleCommander
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and PercentageEnemyKilled > 25
       and BattleOdds < 0.51
       and FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 100
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 75
 Affects Pagan_Edu 1 Chance 20 
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_HeroicBattleCommander2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait Offensive_To_Nobles > 1
       and WonBattle
       and PercentageEnemyKilled > 25
       and BattleOdds < 0.51

 Affects Offensive_To_Nobles -1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_NonPagan_Ambush
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
       and BattleOdds < 1.51
       and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 25 
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 50
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Pagan_Ambush
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
       and BattleOdds < 1.51
       and FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 25 
 Affects Pagan_Edu 1 Chance 80
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_NonPagan_WiseTacticalCommander
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > close
       and BattleOdds > 0.70
       and BattleOdds < 1.50
       and PercentageOfArmyKilled < 20
       and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 80
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Pagan_WiseTacticalCommander
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > close
       and BattleOdds > 0.70
       and BattleOdds < 1.50
       and PercentageOfArmyKilled < 20
       and FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects Pagan_Edu 1 Chance 80
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_NonPagan_BrilliantTacticalCommander
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > close
       and BattleOdds < 0.70
       and PercentageOfArmyKilled < 20
       and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 80
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 60

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Pagan_BrilliantTacticalCommander
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > close
       and BattleOdds < 0.70
       and PercentageOfArmyKilled < 20
       and FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects Pagan_Edu 1 Chance 80
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 60
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Siege_Won_MilitaryInclination
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > average
       and I_ConflictType Siege
       and BattleOdds < 1.75
       and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 40 
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Siege_Won_NotMilitaryInclination
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > average
       and I_ConflictType Siege
       and BattleOdds < 1.75
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 20 
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 10
 
 
;========================================================
;----- Bad Commander ------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger StandardBattle_AnyLoss_Trigger
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 1.0

 Affects BadCommander 1 Chance 33 
 Affects Anger 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger CrappyBattleCommander
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and PercentageOfArmyKilled < 50
       and BattleOdds > 2.0

 Affects BadCommander 2 Chance 75

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Siege_Lost
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess > average
       and I_ConflictType Siege
       and BattleOdds > 0.8

 Affects BadCommander 1 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Withdraws
 WhenToTest PreBattleWithdrawal

 Condition WasAttacker

 Affects BadCommander 1 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0190_Withdraw_Before_Battle_Even_Odds_VnV_Trigger
 WhenToTest PreBattleWithdrawal

 Condition IsGeneral
       and I_WithdrawsBeforeBattle
       and BattleOdds > 0.5
       and BattleOdds < 1.75

 Affects BadCommander 1 Chance 33 

;========================================================
;----- Good/Bad Commander cohesion triggers ------------- 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger GoodCommander_RenownedVictor_CohesiveCharacter
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait VictorVirtue > 0
       and Trait GoodCommander < 2
	   
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 100
 

;========================================================
;----- Good/Bad Commander Clearing House ----------------  

;------------------------------------------
Trigger GoodBadCommander_ClearingHouse_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait BadCommander > 0
       and Trait GoodCommander > 0
	   
 Affects BadCommander -1 Chance 100
 Affects GoodCommander -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger GoodBadCommander_ClearingHouse_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait BadCommander > 0
       and Trait GoodCommander > 0
	   
 Affects BadCommander -1 Chance 100
 Affects GoodCommander -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger GoodBadCommander_ClearingHouse_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait BadCommander > 0
       and Trait GoodCommander > 0
	   
 Affects BadCommander -1 Chance 100
 Affects GoodCommander -1 Chance 100
 
 
;========================================================================================= Battle Chivalry / Dread
;----- Battle Chivalry / Dread & similar ----------------
;========================================================

;========================================================
;------- Outcome of battles -----------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BattleBloodthirsty
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 10
       and not Trait BattleChivalry >= 1
       and not Trait BattleDread >= 1
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds <= 5

Affects Bloodthirsty 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_Dread_fighting
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 10
       and not Trait BattleChivalry > 0
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds <= 5

 Affects BattleDread 1 Chance 8 
 Affects Bloodthirsty 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_Chivalry_fighting
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 10
       and not Trait BattleDread > 0
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds <= 5

 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_BattleChivalry_Defender
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WasAttacker
       and WonBattle
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds <= 0.5
       and not Trait BattleDread > 0
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 500

 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_BattleDread_Defender
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WasAttacker
       and WonBattle
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds <= 0.5
       and Trait BattleDread > 0
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 350

 Affects BattleDread 1 Chance 75 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_BattleChivalry_SpareRouters
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and PercentageEnemyKilled < 80
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds < 2.5
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 500
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle_BattleChivalry_ChaseRouters
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and PercentageEnemyKilled > 80
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds < 2.5
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 500
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects BattleDread 1 Chance 30 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Chivalry1_FairBattle
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds > 0.65
       and BattleOdds < 1.35
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 750
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 25 
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Chivalry1_UnfairBattle
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds > 1.35
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 500
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects BattleDread 1 Chance 25
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Dread_FightNightBattles
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WasAttacker
       and IsNightBattle
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds < 2.5
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 750
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects BattleDread 1 Chance 15 
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Chivalry_Dread_Not_fightingPL
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WonBattle
       and PercentageEnemyKilled < 10
       and FactionIsLocal
       and IsGeneral

 Affects BattleChivalry -1 Chance 55 
 Affects BattleDread -1 Chance 40 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Chivalry_Dread_Not_fightingAI
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WonBattle
       and PercentageEnemyKilled < 10
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and IsGeneral

 Affects BattleChivalry -1 Chance 25 
 Affects BattleDread -1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Chivalry_Dread_Routing
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Routs
       and PercentageEnemyKilled < 33
       and GeneralNumKillsInBattle < 8
       and IsGeneral

 Affects BattleChivalry -2 Chance 85 
 Affects BattleDread -2 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Chivalry_Dread_Routing2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Routs
       and PercentageEnemyKilled > 23
       and PercentageEnemyKilled <= 66
       and GeneralNumKillsInBattle < 8
       and BattleOdds > 0.75
       and IsGeneral

 Affects BattleChivalry -1 Chance 85 
 Affects BattleDread -1 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3Dread_TotalAnnihilation
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= crushing
       and PercentageEnemyKilled > 90
       and IsGeneral
       and BattleOdds < 0.95
       and not Trait BattleChivalry > 0
       and NumFriendsInBattle > 750

 Affects BattleDread 2 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
;---- sane is already in battles ---
Trigger battle5
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= clear
	   and Trait Intelligent > 5

 Affects InspiringSpeaker 1 Chance 10 
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 


;========================================================
;------- Fate of prisoners ------------------------------

;------- Prisoners Released -------------------------- 
;----------------------------------------------------- 
Trigger Prisoners_Released_Some
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor

 Condition RansomType release
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 200

 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 50 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger prisoners_released2
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor

 Condition RansomType release
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 400

 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 75 

;------- Prisoners Ransomed --------------------------  
;----------------------------------------------------- 
Trigger prisoners_ransomed1PL
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptive

 Condition RansomType ransom
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 200
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 25 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger prisoners_ransomed1AI
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptive

 Condition RansomType ransom
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 200
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and not Trait BattleDread > 0

 Affects BattleChivalry 1 Chance 25 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger prisoners_ransomed2PL
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptive

 Condition RansomType cannot_pay_ransom
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 200
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects BattleDread 1 Chance 25 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger prisoners_ransomed2AI
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptive

 Condition RansomType cannot_pay_ransom
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 200
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and not Trait BattleChivalry > 0

 Affects BattleDread 1 Chance 25

;------- Prisoners Executed --------------------------    
;----------------------------------------------------- 
Trigger prisoners_executed1
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor

 Condition RansomType execute
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 200

 Affects BattleDread 1 Chance 50 
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger prisoners_executed2
 WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor

 Condition RansomType execute
       and NumCapturedSoldiers > 400

 Affects BattleDread 1 Chance 100 


;=====================================================
;------- Battle DreadChivalry ClearingHouse ----------
;----------------------------------------------------- 
;  REVIEW CLEARING HOUSE MECHANISM SO THAT 1. no info for the player on both up and down,
; 2. no Bad and Good Commander at the same time on a general (so clearing house also PostBattle)
; perhaps it's a bad idea to have a clearing house if there're GainMessages esp. in the 1st level

Trigger Battle_DreadChivalry_ClearingHouse_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait BattleDread > 0
       and Trait BattleChivalry > 0
	   
 Affects BattleDread -1 Chance 100
 Affects BattleChivalry -1 Chance 100

;-------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_DreadChivalry_ClearingHouse_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait BattleDread > 0
       and Trait BattleChivalry > 0
	   
 Affects BattleDread -1 Chance 100
 Affects BattleChivalry -1 Chance 100


;========================================================================================= Strategy Chivalry / Dread
;----- Strategy Chivalry/Dread --------------------------
;========================================================================================= 
;- also in many other places, eg. Agents Created


;========================================================================================= 
;------- Fate of city (Occuption, Sacking, Extermination)


;------------------------------------------ Occupation
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Occupation_Settlement
 WhenToTest OccupySettlement

 Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 75
 Affects BadDisciplinarian 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Settlement_Capture_Brave
 WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

 Condition Trait Haemophobic < 1
	   
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 50
 
 
;------------------------------------------ Sacking 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Sacking_Foreign_Religion
 WhenToTest SackSettlement

 Condition PopulationOwnReligion < 30

 Affects Despoiler 1 Chance 40 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Sacking_Own_Religion
 WhenToTest SackSettlement

 Condition PopulationOwnReligion > 50

 Affects Despoiler 1 Chance 40 
 Affects BadDisciplinarian 2 Chance 50
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 85 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Sacking_Very_Own_Religion
 WhenToTest SackSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 75

 Affects PublicAtheism 1 Chance 70
 Affects BadDisciplinarian 1 Chance 50
 

;------------------------------------------ Exterminating 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Exterminating_Foreign_Religion
 WhenToTest ExterminatePopulation

 Condition PopulationOwnReligion < 30

 Affects Despoiler 1 Chance 85 
 Affects Bloodthirsty 1 Chance 10 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 85 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Exterminating_Own_Religion
 WhenToTest ExterminatePopulation

 Condition PopulationOwnReligion > 50

 Affects Genocide 1 Chance 85 
 Affects Bloodthirsty 1 Chance 20 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 85 
 Affects BadDisciplinarian 2 Chance 30
 Affects BadDisciplinarian 2 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Exterminating_Very_Own_Religion
 WhenToTest ExterminatePopulation

 Condition IsGeneral
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 75

 Affects PublicAtheism 2 Chance 90
 Affects Bloodthirsty 1 Chance 30 
 Affects BadDisciplinarian 1 Chance 50

 WhenToTest SackSettlement

 Condition IsRegionOneOf 190 Jerusalem_Province

 Affects Despoiler 1 Chance 40 
 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 30
 Affects BadDisciplinarian 2 Chance 50

;========================================================================================= 
;------- Strategy DreadChivalry Governing ---------------
;------------------------------------------ tax_low tax_normal tax_high tax_extortionate
;------------------------------------------ loyalty_disillusioned loyalty_happy
Trigger governing6
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and GovernorTaxLevel = tax_low
       and GovernorLoyaltyLevel = loyalty_happy
       and TimeInRegion > 4

 Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 6 
 Affects BadDisciplinarian 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger governing7
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and GovernorTaxLevel = tax_low
       and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
       and Treasury < 5000
       and TimeInRegion > 4

 Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger governing8
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and GovernorTaxLevel = tax_extortionate
       and GovernorLoyaltyLevel < loyalty_happy
       and Treasury > 5000
       and TimeInRegion > 4

 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 10 
 Affects Disciplinarian 1 Chance 50


;========================================================
;------- Strategy DreadChivalry ClearingHouse -----------
;--------------------------------------------------------
;  REVIEW CLEARING HOUSE MECHANISM SO THAT 1. no info for the player on both up and down,
; 2. no Bad and Good Commander at the same time on a general (so clearing house also PostBattle)
; perhaps it's a bad idea to have a clearing house if there're GainMessages esp. in the 1st level

Trigger Strategy_DreadChivalry_ClearingHouse_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait StrategyDread > 0
       and Trait StrategyChivalry > 0
	   
 Affects StrategyDread -1 Chance 100
 Affects StrategyChivalry -1 Chance 100

;----------------------------------------------------- 
Trigger Strategy_DreadChivalry_ClearingHouse_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait StrategyDread > 0
       and Trait StrategyChivalry > 0
	   
 Affects StrategyDread -1 Chance 100
 Affects StrategyChivalry -1 Chance 100
 

;=========================================================================================
;----- Impact of battles on psychology -------------------
;=========================================================================================

;=========================================================================================
;------- Humane Hardened ---------------------------------
;=========================================================

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Philosophical_Reflection_On_War_Humane
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and PercentageBodyguardKilled > 40
 	   and Trait Hardened < 1
	   
 Affects Humane 1 Chance 5

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger General_Takes_Life_Loses_Friends_For_Nothing_Humane
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 0
       and PercentageBodyguardKilled > 25
 	   and Trait Hardened < 1
	   
 Affects Humane 1 Chance 10

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Philosophical_Reflection_On_War_Hardened
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and PercentageBodyguardKilled > 40
       and PercentageEnemyKilled > 50
 	   and Trait Humane < 1
	   
 Affects Hardened 1 Chance 10
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 10 
 Affects Anger 1 Chance 5
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger General_Takes_Life_Loses_Friends_For_Nothing_Hardened
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 0
       and PercentageBodyguardKilled > 25
 	   and Trait Humane < 1
	   
 Affects Hardened 1 Chance 10
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 10
 Affects Anger 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Humane_NoGoingBack
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Humane < 3
       and Trait Humane > 1
		
 Affects Humane 10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hardened_NoGoingBack
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Hardened < 3
       and Trait Hardened > 1
	   
 Affects Hardened 10 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Humane_Selfperpetuating
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Humane > 0
		and RandomPercent > 80

 Affects Humane 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hardened_Selfperpetuating
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Hardened > 0
		and RandomPercent > 80
		
 Affects Hardened 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger HumaneHardened_Just_In_Case_Of_Bug
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait Hardened > 0
       and Trait Humane > 0
	   
 Affects Hardened -1 Chance 100
 Affects Humane -1 Chance 100

 
;=========================================================================================
;------- Deranged ----------------------------------------
;=========================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_Under_Siege
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsUnderSiege
       and IsGeneral
       and Trait Military_Edu < 1
	   
 Affects Insane 1 Chance 5
 Affects Hypochondriac 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_SufferAssassinationAttempt_Normal
 WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

 Condition Trait Paranoia < 1
	and IsGeneral

 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 3
 Affects Hypochondriac 1 Chance 3
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_SufferAssassinationAttempt_Paranoia
 WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

 Condition Trait Paranoia > 0

 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 15 
 Affects Hypochondriac 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_Not_Own_Religion
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
	and not AtSea
	and PopulationOwnReligion < 10
	and RandomPercent > 50
	and not FactionIsLocal
	   
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_GovernorCityRiots
 WhenToTest GovernorCityRiots

 Condition Trait Intelligent < 6
       and IsGeneral
       and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 2
 Affects Insane 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_GovernorCityRebels
 WhenToTest GovernorCityRebels

 Condition Trait Intelligent < 6
       and IsGeneral
       and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 2
 Affects Insane 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_From_Wars_Intelligent
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Hardened > 1  
        and Trait Intelligent < 7
		
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_From_Wars_NotIntelligent
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Hardened > 1  
        and Trait Intelligent < 5
		
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_From_Berserker
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Berserker > 1
       and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------ if you're a coward, you're getting crazy if you're leading troops abroad
Trigger Deranged_Coward_Campaining
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Coward > 0
	   and Trait ArmyCost > 0
       and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 4
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_Selfperpetuating_NotIntelligent
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Deranged > 1
		and Trait Intelligent < 5
		
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 3 

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_TooOldToFight
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait TooOldToFight > 0
       and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 2
 Affects Insane 1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_NoGoingBack_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Deranged < 3
       and Trait Deranged > 1
	   
 Affects Deranged 10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_NoGoingBack_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Deranged < 4
       and Trait Deranged > 2
	   
 Affects Deranged 10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_Sane_ClearingHouse_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Deranged > 0
       and Trait Sane > 0
	   
 Affects Deranged -1 Chance 100
 Affects Sane -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Deranged_Sane_ClearingHouse_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Deranged > 0
       and Trait Sane > 0
	   
 Affects Deranged -1 Chance 100
 Affects Sane -1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

		and Trait Intelligent < 5
		
 Affects Insane 1 Chance 3

 Condition Trait Insane < 3
       and Trait Insane > 1
	   
 Affects Insane 10 Chance 100

 Condition Trait Insane < 4
       and Trait Insane > 2
	   
 Affects Insane 10 Chance 100

       and Trait Sane > 0

       and Trait InspiringSpeaker > 1

;=========================================================================================
;------- Hypochondriac -----------------------------------
;=========================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hypochondriac_Selfperpetuating
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Hypochondriac > 0
	and not Trait Hardened > 1
	and not Trait BattleScarred > 0
	
 Affects Hypochondriac 1 Chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hypochondriac_Ill
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait HaleAndHearty < 3
       and RandomPercent > 50
	   and IsGeneral
	   
 Affects Hypochondriac 1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hypochondriac_Diseased
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Diseased > 0
       and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Hypochondriac 1 Chance 2
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hypochondriac_SeverelyWounded
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait SeverelyWounded > 0
       and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Hypochondriac 1 Chance 2
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hypochondriac_BattleScarred
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait BattleScarred > 1
       and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Hypochondriac -1 Chance 20
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hypochondriac_NoGoingBack
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Hypochondriac < 3
       and Trait Hypochondriac > 1
	   
 Affects Hypochondriac 10 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Hypochondriac_Sane_ClearingHouse1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Hypochondriac > 0
       and Trait Sane > 0
	   
 Affects Hypochondriac -1 Chance 100
 Affects Sane -1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Hypochondriac_Sane_ClearingHouse2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Hypochondriac > 0
       and Trait Sane > 0
	   
 Affects Hypochondriac -1 Chance 100
 Affects Sane -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Hypochondriac_InspiringSpeaker_ClearingHouse
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait Hypochondriac > 0
       and Trait InspiringSpeaker > 1
	   
 Affects InspiringSpeaker -1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

       and Trait Bloodthirsty > 1

       and Trait Haemophobic > 1

       and Trait Haemophobic > 0
