;=========================================================
;------- Wounds and Scars --------------------------------
;=========================================================

;--------- WOUNDS TRIGGERS --------------------------
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_Battle_General_Without_Military_Skills
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition PercentageBodyguardKilled > 20 
       and BattleOdds <= 5
       and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
       and Trait Military_Edu < 2
       and Trait SeverelyWounded < 1
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects SeverelyWounded 1 Chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_Battle_General_Took_Heavy_Hits 
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition PercentageBodyguardKilled > 40 
       and BattleOdds <= 5
       and Trait SeverelyWounded < 1

 Affects SeverelyWounded 1 Chance 4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_Battle_General_Took_Severe_Hits
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition PercentageBodyguardKilled > 60 
       and BattleOdds <= 5
       and Trait SeverelyWounded < 1

 Affects SeverelyWounded 1 Chance 8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_Battle_General_Took_Deadly_Hits
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition PercentageBodyguardKilled > 80
       and BattleOdds <= 5
       and Trait SeverelyWounded < 1

 Affects SeverelyWounded 1 Chance 13

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_Battle_General_TooOld
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 1
       and BattleOdds <= 5
       and Trait TooOldToFight > 0
       and Trait SeverelyWounded < 1
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects SeverelyWounded 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_Battle_General_Drunk
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 10
       and BattleOdds <= 5
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Drink > 4
       and Trait SeverelyWounded < 1

 Affects SeverelyWounded 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_Wounds_Scarrs_from_Tourneying
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= jousting_lists
       and Trait FitForOffice > 1
       and Trait TourneyKnight > 0
	   
 Affects SeverelyWounded 1 Chance 2
 Affects BattleScarred 1 Chance 2
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 2

;-------- SCARRS triggers -------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Scarrs_from_Battle
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition PercentageBodyguardKilled > 30
       and IsGeneral

 Affects BattleScarred 1 Chance 30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Scarrs_from_Wounds
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait SeverelyWounded > 0

 Affects BattleScarred 1 Chance 50 
 
;-------- WOUNDS HEALTH CONSEQUENCES -----
;---------------------------------------
Trigger SW_RemoveHealth_Young
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Trait SeverelyWounded > 0
       and Trait HaleAndHearty > 3
       and BattleOdds <= 5
       and not Trait MilitaryInclination > 0

 Affects HaleAndHearty -1 Chance 75
 Affects Sickly 1 Chance 10
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_RemoveHealth_MiddleAged
 WhenToTest PostBattle

Condition Trait SeverelyWounded > 0
       and Trait HaleAndHearty > 3
       and BattleOdds <= 5
       and CharacterAge > 30

 Affects HaleAndHearty -1 Chance 75
 Affects Sickly 1 Chance 10
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 2
 Affects Anger 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_RemoveHealth_Old
 WhenToTest PostBattle

Condition Trait SeverelyWounded > 0
       and Trait HaleAndHearty > 3
       and BattleOdds <= 5
       and CharacterAge > 50

 Affects HaleAndHearty -1 Chance 75
 Affects Sickly 1 Chance 10
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 2
 Affects Anger 1 Chance 2
 
;---- SEVERELY WOUNDED HEALING -----------
;-----------------------------------------
 Trigger SW_HealedInWild_Normal
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait SeverelyWounded > 0
       and not EndedInSettlement 
       and Trait TooOldToFight < 1

 Affects SeverelyWounded -1 Chance 40

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_HealedInWild_Robust
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition Trait SeverelyWounded > 0
       and not EndedInSettlement 
       and Trait Robust > 0

 Affects SeverelyWounded -1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_HealedInTown_Normal
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

Condition Trait SeverelyWounded > 0

 Affects SeverelyWounded -1 Chance 80

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_HealedInTown_Robust
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

Condition Trait SeverelyWounded > 0
       and Trait Robust > 0

 Affects SeverelyWounded -1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger SW_Healed_AI
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition not FactionIsLocal
		and Trait SeverelyWounded > 0
	Affects SeverelyWounded -1 Chance 50

;========================================================================================= Brave and Coward
;------- Brave and Coward  -------------------------------
;=========================================================
;--- BRAVE: levels(points): 1(1),2(3),3(6),4(10),5(15)
;--- COWARD: levels(points): 1(2),2(3),3(4),4(6),5(8)

;--------------------------------------------------------- Brave from Battles

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Brave_Killed_Enemies
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
    and BattleOdds <= 3
    and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 10
	and Trait Haemophobic < 1
	and Trait Coward > 0
	
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Brave_Killed_Enemies_Many
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
    and BattleOdds <= 3
    and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 95
	and Trait Haemophobic < 1
	and Trait Coward > 0
	   
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Brave_Bodyguard_Loss
 WhenToTest PostBattle

Condition IsGeneral
    and BattleOdds <= 3
    and PercentageBodyguardKilled > 40
	and Trait Haemophobic < 1
	and Trait Coward > 0
	
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Brave_Enemy_General_Killed
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
	and BattleOdds <= 3
	and NumKilledGenerals > 0
	and PercentageBodyguardKilled > 10
	and Trait Haemophobic < 1
	and Trait Coward > 0
	
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 15 

;--------------------------------------------------------- Coward from Battles
; the challenge of adjusting parameters in Conditions is:
; they should punish the behaviour of too-safe play by the player:
; - a general is just watching the battle, not participating
; - the player is autoresolving a risky battle (not to mention save-and-reload...)
; - the player is withdrawing having seen the risky odds
; but should not punish autoresolving unimportant battles

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BattleCoward_No_Killed_Enemies
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
	and BattleOdds < 2.0						; 3.0 was too much for autoresolving
	and GeneralNumKillsInBattle < 2
	and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4	; only for VeryHard
	and Trait Brave > 0
	
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 15						; to keep it low... otherwise too many autoresolve give it

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BattleCoward_No_Real_Fight
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
    and BattleOdds < 1.2
    and PercentageBodyguardKilled < 20
    and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4	; only for VeryHard
	and Trait Brave > 0
	
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 33 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger BattleCoward_Loss_Without_Fight
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
    and not WonBattle
    and BattleOdds < 2.0
    and PercentageBodyguardKilled < 50
	and Trait CounterOfBattles < 6			; to avoid a paradox of a coward experienced general
	and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4	; only for VeryHard
	and Trait Brave > 0
	
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------  at some point it was said that BattleGeneralRouted is broken. To be watched.
Trigger BattleCoward_Routed
 WhenToTest BattleGeneralRouted

 Condition IsGeneral
	and Trait CounterOfBattles < 6			; to avoid a paradox of a coward experienced general; one may add more conditions here
	and Trait GoodCommander < 2
	and Trait Brave < 1   

 Affects Coward 1 Chance 66
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BattleCoward_Routed_Teenager
 WhenToTest BattleGeneralRouted

 Condition IsGeneral
	and Trait Wantschool > 0	 
	and Trait Brave > 0
	
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 66
	   
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Coward_Withdraw_Before_Battle_Even_Odds
 WhenToTest PreBattleWithdrawal

 Condition IsGeneral
    and I_WithdrawsBeforeBattle
    and BattleOdds > 0.7
    and BattleOdds < 1.7
	and Trait Brave > 0
	
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 33

 
;--------------------------------------------------------- Brave and Coward - other reasons


;--------------------------------------------------------- Avoiding Contraditions in Character
Trigger BattleCoward_No_Contradiction_CounterOfBattles
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and Trait Coward > 0
	   and Trait CounterOfBattles > 1
	   
 Affects Coward -1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger BattleCoward_No_Contradiction_Vanquisher
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and Trait Coward > 0	   
       and Trait Vanquisher > 0
	   
 Affects Coward -1 Chance 50
 
;--------------------------------------------------------- Conducting a Safe Life
Trigger Coward_In_City
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
    and RemainingMPPercentage > 90
    and SettlementBuildingExists > wooden_wall
	and Trait Wantschool < 1							; to exclude those who're learning	   
    and RandomPercent > 50
	and Trait Brave > 0
	
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Coward_In_City_No_Experience
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral 
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and Trait Wantschool < 1	   
	   and Trait CounterOfBattles < 1	   				; adult but never commanded a battle
       and RandomPercent > 50

 Affects Coward 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------------------- Selfperpetuation
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Brave_Selfperpetuating_OldAge
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Brave > 2
       and Trait Senile > 0 
	   and Trait Haemophobic < 1
	   
 Affects Brave 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Coward_Selfperpetuating
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Coward > 0
       and Trait Wantschool < 1 

 Affects Coward 1 Chance 2

;--------------------------------------------------------- NoGoingBack

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Coward_NoGoingBack
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Trait Coward < 5
       and Trait Coward > 3
	   
 Affects Coward 10 Chance 100 

;--------------------------------------------------------- AI bonuses

;--- AI doesnt know how to deal with this trait -----
Trigger AI_Coward_Normalization
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition not FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Coward > 0

 Affects Coward -1 Chance 10 
 Affects Coward 1 Chance 3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AI_Brave_Normalization
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Condition not FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Brave > 0

 Affects Brave 1 Chance 10 
 Affects Brave -1 Chance 5 

;--------------------------------------------------------- BRAVE, COWARD & Haemophobic CLEARING HOUSE ---
; it's better to disable it in the triggers, here only to ensure no mistake arise

;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger BraveCoward_ClearingHouse
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Brave > 0
       and Trait Coward > 0
	   
 Affects Brave -1 Chance 100
 Affects Coward -1 Chance 100
 
;-------------------------------------------
Trigger BraveHaemophobic_ClearingHouse
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Brave > 0
       and Trait Haemophobic > 0
	   
 Affects Brave -1 Chance 100
 Affects Haemophobic -1 Chance 100
 
 
;=========================================================================================
;----- Other military traits -----------------------------
;=========================================================================================

;========================================================================================= Disciplinarian
;------- Disciplinarian ----------------------------------
;--- levels(points): 1(4),2(8),3(12)
; overall probabilities for this trait have never been calculated
; and seems indeed faulty - given after every lost battle - before disabling that one trigger
 
;--------------------------------------------------------- Disciplinarian post battle
;only the human player as AI won't be able to handle this.
Trigger UndisciplinedArmy_a
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and PercentageRoutedOffField >= 60
       and FactionIsLocal

 Affects BadDisciplinarian 1 Chance 80
 Affects BadDisciplinarian 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------ this look particularly bad
; Trigger UndisciplinedArmy_b
; WhenToTest PostBattle

; Condition WonBattle
;       and IsGeneral
;       and BattleOdds < 0.6
;       and PercentageRoutedOffField < 25

; Affects BadDisciplinarian 2 Chance 80
; Affects BadDisciplinarian 2 Chance 50

;--------------------------------------------------------- Disciplinarian other
;-- triggers for CityRiots or CityUnloyal in another place
;-- triggers for taxes are in the Taxman part

Trigger Disciplinarian_Moving
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition RemainingMPPercentage < 10
	   
 Affects Disciplinarian 1 Chance 5

;--------------------------------------------------------- Disciplinarian impact on other traits
Trigger Disciplinarian_Impact_On_Other_Traits
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Disciplinarian > 0
       and Trait Coward < 1
	   and RandomPercent > 80
	   
 Affects Anger 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------------------- Disciplinarian selfperpertuation
Trigger BadDisciplinarian_Selfperpetuation
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait BadDisciplinarian > 0

 Affects BadDisciplinarian 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Disciplinarian_Selfperpetuation
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Disciplinarian > 0

 Affects Disciplinarian 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Disciplinarian_ClearingHouse
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait Disciplinarian > 0
       and Trait BadDisciplinarian > 0
	   
 Affects Disciplinarian -4 Chance 100
 Affects BadDisciplinarian -4 Chance 100

 
;========================================================================================= Berserker
;------- Berserker ---------------------------------------


;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Berserker_NE_EE
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition PercentageBodyguardKilled > 70
       and IsGeneral
	   and Trait Berserker < 2  ; only level 2 can be achieved by "civilized"
       and not Trait Hypochondriac > 0
       and not Trait Coward > 0
	   and Trait Anger > 0
	   
 Affects Berserker 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Berserker_Actions_denmark
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition PercentageBodyguardKilled > 60
       and FactionType denmark
       and IsGeneral
       and not Trait Hypochondriac > 0
       and not Trait Coward > 0
	   
 Affects Berserker 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Berserker_Actions_norway
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition PercentageBodyguardKilled > 60
       and FactionType norway
       and IsGeneral
       and not Trait Hypochondriac > 0
       and not Trait Coward > 0
	   
 Affects Berserker 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Berserker_Actions_lithuania
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition PercentageBodyguardKilled > 60
       and FactionType lithuania
       and IsGeneral
       and not Trait Hypochondriac > 0
       and not Trait Coward > 0
	   
 Affects Berserker 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Battle_Berserker_Actions_scotland
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition PercentageBodyguardKilled > 60
       and FactionType scotland
       and IsGeneral
       and not Trait Hypochondriac > 0
       and not Trait Coward > 0
	   
 Affects Berserker 1 Chance 10

Trigger Battle_Berserker_Impact_On_Other_Traits
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Berserker > 0
       and not Trait Coward > 0
	   and RandomPercent > 50
	   
 Affects Anger 1 Chance 2
 
;========================================================
;------- Night battles  ---------------------------------
;========================================================
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_victory_attacker
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WasAttacker
       and IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= clear
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and BattleOdds < 2
       and IsNightBattle

 Affects Noctophilia 1 Chance 33 
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_victory_defender
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WasAttacker
       and IsGeneral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= clear
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and BattleOdds < 2
       and IsNightBattle

 Affects Noctophilia 1 Chance 33 
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2
 Affects Sane 1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_loss_attacker
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition WasAttacker
       and IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= clear
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and BattleOdds < 1.5
       and IsNightBattle

 Affects Noctophobia 1 Chance 25 
 Affects Insane 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_loss_defender
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition not WasAttacker
       and IsGeneral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleSuccess >= clear
       and BattleOdds >= 0.5
       and BattleOdds < 1.5
       and IsNightBattle

 Affects Noctophobia 1 Chance 25 
 Affects Insane 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger diet_of_carrots_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait NightBattleCapable = 0
       and IsGeneral
       and Attribute Command >= 5

 Affects NightBattleCapable 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diet_of_carrots_2
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition IsGeneral
       and Attribute Command >= 1
       and IsNightBattle
       and Trait NightBattleCapable = 0
       and WonBattle

 Affects NightBattleCapable 1 Chance 17 


;========================================================
;========  MILITARY BUILDINGS  ==========================
;========================================================

;========================================================
;----- Military Buildings impact on adults --------------
;========================================================

;========================================================
;----- Military Buildings in Castles ------=------------
;- no trigers for the base castle buildings as the other military buildings
;- de facto mean the same: every castle is likely to have them

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_Adult_BARRACKS
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists < barracks ; in higher level castles there'll other buildings
       and Trait Wantschool < 1                ; for Teenagers there're special triggers in other places (education)
       and Trait NaturalMilitarySkill > 0      ; important trait, but many won't have it
       and Trait Intelligent > 4               ; not for stupid
       and Trait FitForOffice > 1              ; depicts physical and psychical health
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_Adult_STABLES
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_Adult_PRACTICE_RANGE
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= practice_range 
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_Adult_CASTLE_SMITH
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_blacksmith
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_Adult_MILITARY_ACADEMY
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= military_academy
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_Adult_CASTLE_SIEGE_WORKS
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_siege_works
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_Adult_CASTLE_TOWER
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_ballista_towers
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_Adult_GUNSMITH
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_gunsmith
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2

;----- Military Buildings in Cities --------=------------

Trigger Sitting_Around_Adult_CITY_WATCH
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists <= city_watch  ; in higher level cities there'll other buildings
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_Adult_LOCAL_GUARD
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= landowners2
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
 Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= blacksmith
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= siege_works
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Sitting_Around_Adult_CITY_TOWER
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition IsGeneral
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and RandomPercent > 50
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= ballista_towers
       and Trait Wantschool < 1
       and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 7
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 2 

 
;========================================================
;----- Military Building Completed - for Milit Traits ---
;========================================================
;- exclusively for military minded, not stupid

;========================================================
;----- City

;------------------------------------------
Trigger GBC_Milit_NonPagan_City_CityWatch
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= city_watch
       and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 4
	   and not FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 25
 Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 10 
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger GBC_Milit_Pagan_City_CityWatch
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= city_watch
       and Trait MilitaryInclination = 1
       and Trait Intelligent < 4
	   and FactionReligion pagan
	   
 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 25
 Affects Pagan_Edu 1 Chance 10 
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger governor_building_smith
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= armourer 

 Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 5
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 10

	   and not FactionReligion pagan

Trigger GovernorBuildingCompleted_Templar_MajorCH
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition IsGeneral
       and SettlementBuildingFinished >= templars_major_ch

	Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 20
	Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 10
	Affects ReligiousActivity 1 Chance 20 
	Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 20
	Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 10
	Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
	
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition IsGeneral
       and SettlementBuildingFinished >= st_johns_major_ch

	Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 20
	Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 10
	Affects ReligiousActivity 1 Chance 20 
	Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 20
	Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 10
	Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition IsGeneral
       and SettlementBuildingFinished >= montesa_major_ch

	Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 20
	Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 10
	Affects ReligiousActivity 1 Chance 20 
	Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 20
	Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 10
	Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger GovernorBuildingCompleted_Teutonic_Knights_MajorCH
 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition IsGeneral
       and SettlementBuildingFinished >= teutonic_knights_major_ch

	Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 20
	Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 10
	Affects ReligiousActivity 1 Chance 20 
	Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 20
	Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 10
	Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

 Condition IsGeneral
       and SettlementBuildingFinished >= knights_of_santiago_major_ch

	Affects Military_Edu 1 Chance 20
	Affects GoodCommander 1 Chance 10
	Affects ReligiousActivity 1 Chance 20 
	Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 20
	Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 10
	Affects LogisticalSkill 1 Chance 2

;========================================================

;========================================================
;=====  triggers to distribute at the end ===============
;========================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents11
 WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

 Condition not IsGeneral

 Affects Introvert 1 Chance 25
 Affects Deranged 1 Chance 3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents21
 WhenToTest AcceptBribe

 Condition not IsGeneral

 Affects Disloyal 1 Chance 33 
 Affects ExRebel 1 Chance 100

 
;========================================================
;=====  ADMIRAL triggers  ===============================
;========================================================

; this part must be re-coded so that the newly-spawned admirals do not have any traits - until eg their first battle

;========================================================
;-------- Admiral's Movement Depending on Technology
; mind that GR, EE, mongol factions do not have triggers for the highest level; cumans also not for the last-but-one

;-------------------------------------------- 0->1	must include this trigger because otherwise spawned admirals would have a very long range
Trigger Admiral_MTP_Spawned
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionIsLocal 
       and Trait Admiral_maritime_technical_progress < 1 
	   
 Affects Admiral_maritime_technical_progress 1 Chance 100

;-------------------------------------------- 0->1	initial malus to movement
Trigger Admiral_MTP_Born_Initial
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionIsLocal
	   
 Affects Admiral_maritime_technical_progress 1 Chance 100

;-------------------------------------------- 1->2	initially the Greeks and Muslims knew the maps
Trigger Admiral_MTP_Born_with_Maps_GRME
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionIsLocal	   
	   and not CultureType northern_european
	   and not CultureType eastern_european
	   and not CultureType southern_european
	   
 Affects Admiral_maritime_technical_progress 1 Chance 100

;-------------------------------------------- 1->2	SE, NE learned the maps during crusades (turn 32)
Trigger Admiral_MTP_Born_with_Maps_SE
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionIsLocal 
       and I_EventCounter SEA1_USE_OF_MAPS > 0
	   and not CultureType greek
	   and not CultureType eastern_european
	   and not CultureType middle_eastern
	   
 Affects Admiral_maritime_technical_progress 1 Chance 100
 
;-------------------------------------------- 2->3, 1->2	compass came from China to both Muslims and Christians (turn 100) - for EE it's about maps
Trigger Admiral_MTP_Born_with_Compass
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionIsLocal 
       and I_EventCounter first_magnetic_compass > 0
	   and not CultureType eastern_european
	   
 Affects Admiral_maritime_technical_progress 1 Chance 100

;-------------------------------------------- 3->4	 SE knowledge from the Marco Polo voyage (turn 290)
Trigger Admiral_MTP_Born_with_GeographicaKnowlege_SE
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionIsLocal 
       and I_EventCounter marco > 0
	   and CultureType southern_european
	   
 Affects Admiral_maritime_technical_progress 1 Chance 100

;-------------------------------------------- 3->4, 2->3	NE knowledge of geography from Hansa(turn 330), while for EE is the use of compass
Trigger Admiral_MTP_Born_with_with_GeographicaKnowlege_NE
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionIsLocal 
       and I_EventCounter HANSEATIC_COG > 0
	   and not CultureType greek
	   and not CultureType southern_european
	   and not CultureType middle_eastern
	   and not CharFactionType cumans

 Affects Admiral_maritime_technical_progress 1 Chance 100

;-------------------------------------------- 3->4	 knowledge from the Ibn Battuta voyage (turn 440)
Trigger Admiral_MTP_Born_with_with_GeographicaKnowlege_ME
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionIsLocal 
       and I_EventCounter battuta > 0
	   and CultureType middle_eastern
	   and not CharFactionType mongols
	   
 Affects Admiral_maritime_technical_progress 1 Chance 100

 
;========================================================
;-------- admiral difficulty bonuses --------
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Starter_Player_LevelEasy
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 1
       and I_TurnNumber < 200
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 100
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 50
 
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Starter_Player_LevelNormal
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 2
       and I_TurnNumber < 200
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 100
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 50
 
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Starter_AI_LevelHard
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and not FactionType slave
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 50
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 33
 
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and not FactionType slave
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
       and I_TurnNumber > 100
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 50
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 33
 
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard_Later
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
       and I_TurnNumber > 300
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 50
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 33 
 

;======================================================== 
;-------- admiral - AI slave starters -----
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Pirate_Starter
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionType slave

 Affects FamousPirate 1 Chance 33
 Affects FamousPirate 1 Chance 33
 Affects FamousPirate 1 Chance 33
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Pirate_Starter_later
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionType slave
	   and I_TurnNumber > 200

 Affects FamousPirate 1 Chance 33
 Affects FamousPirate 1 Chance 33

       and FactionType venice

;========================================================  
;-------- admiral - starters: faction's technology level and FL interest  --------------
;-- < 3 condition because the highest levels should be acquired only through battles
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Faction_Castle_Shipwright
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionBuildingExists >= c_shipwright
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Faction_Naval_Academy
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionBuildingExists >= naval_academy
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Faction_MasterExplorersGuild
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionBuildingExists > explorers_guild
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 33  
	   
;-----------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_FL_Maritime_Interests
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionLeaderTrait MaritimeInterests > 1
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 50

;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Faction__FLinterested_Shipwright
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionLeaderTrait MaritimeInterests > 0
       and FactionBuildingExists >= shipwright
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Faction_FLinterested_Docklands
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionLeaderTrait MaritimeInterests > 0
       and FactionBuildingExists >= docklands
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Faction_FLinterested_University
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionLeaderTrait MaritimeInterests > 0
       and FactionBuildingExists >= university
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Faction_FLinterested_GreatLibrary
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionLeaderTrait MaritimeInterests > 0
       and FactionBuildingExists > library
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 20


;======================================================== Admirals created with buildings

;------------------------------------------ various buildings
Trigger Admiral_Born_with_Naval_Academy
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= naval_academy
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Born_with_Explorers_Guild
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= explorers_guild
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------ HANSA buildings
Trigger Admiral_Born_with_Hansa_Baltic_Trade
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= hansa1_baltic_trade 
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Born_with_Hansa_Factorei
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= hansa2_faktorei 
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 33	

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Born_with_Hansa_Unique_Buildings
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= hansa5_holsteintor 
	   and Trait Sailor < 3
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 33


;======================================================== 
;-------- admiral - buildings in life -----
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Sitting_Around_with_Naval_Academy
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= naval_academy
	   and Trait Sailor < 4
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Sitting_Around_with_Explorers_Guild
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= explorers_guild
	   and Trait Sailor < 4
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 10

 
;-------- admiral - naval battles won -----
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_FoughtBattle_Sailor
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
	   and Trait Landlubber < 1

 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_FoughtBattle_Landlubber
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
	   and Trait Landlubber > 0

 Affects Landlubber -1 Chance 20
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_WonBattle_Sailor
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and WonBattle
	   and Trait Landlubber < 1

 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_WonBattle_Landlubber
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and WonBattle
	   and Trait Landlubber > 0

 Affects Landlubber -1 Chance 33
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_WonBattle_Normal_Sailor
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleOdds < 2.25
	   and Trait Landlubber < 1

 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 66

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_WonBattle_Normal_Landlubber
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleOdds < 2.25
	   and Trait Landlubber > 0

 Affects Landlubber -1 Chance 66
 
;------------------------------------------
 Trigger Admiral_WonBattle_Great_Sailor
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleOdds < 1.25
	   and Trait Landlubber < 1
	   
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 100
 Affects Sailor 1 Chance 33
 
;------------------------------------------
 Trigger Admiral_WonBattle_Great_Landlubber
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleOdds < 1.25
	   and Trait Landlubber > 0
	   
 Affects Landlubber -1 Chance 100

 
;-------- admiral - naval battles lost -----
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_LostBattle_Sailor
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and not WonBattle
	   and Trait Sailor > 0

 Affects Sailor -1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_LostBattle_Landlubber
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and not WonBattle
	   and Trait Sailor < 1

 Affects Landlubber 1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_LostBattle_Normal_Sailor
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 1.2
	   and Trait Sailor > 0

 Affects Sailor -1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_LostBattle_Normal_Landlubber
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 1.2
	   and Trait Sailor < 1

 Affects Landlubber 1 Chance 66

;-------- admiral - pirate naval battles --
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Pirate_WonBattle
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and WonBattle
       and BattleOdds < 2.25

 Affects FamousPirate 1 Chance 33 
 Affects FamousPirate 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Pirate_LostBattle
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and not WonBattle
       and BattleOdds > 0.7
	   
 Affects FamousPirate -1 Chance 33 
 Affects FamousPirate -1 Chance 33 

 
;-------- admiral - wounds and old age -----
;------------------------------------------
;Trigger Admiral_Wounded_Accidentaly
; WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart
;
; Condition AgentType = admiral
;		 
; Affects AdmiralWounded 1 Chance 2
;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Wounded_Battle
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
      and BattleOdds < 2.25
	  
 Affects AdmiralWounded 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Wounded_DifficultBattle
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
      and BattleOdds < 1.0
	   
 Affects AdmiralWounded 2 Chance 10
 Affects AdmiralWounded 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Wounded_Battle_Old
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
         and CharacterAge > 45
		 
 Affects AdmiralWounded 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Wounded_Recovery
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
      and Trait AdmiralWounded > 0
	  
 Affects AdmiralWounded -1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Wounded_Recovery_Port
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and EndedInSettlement
	   and Trait AdmiralWounded > 0
	  
 Affects AdmiralWounded -1 Chance 33 	   
	   
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Heavily_Wounded_Recovering
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition AgentType = admiral
      and Trait AdmiralWounded > 1
	  
 Affects AdmiralWounded -1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Admiral_Aging
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = admiral
         and CharacterAge > 45
		 
 Affects Sailor -1 Chance 5
 
 
;---------- Ruler of Sicily admiral triggers ---
;-----------------------------------------------
Trigger RulerOfSicilyBonus_admiral_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionLeaderTrait RulerOfSicily = 1
       and Trait RulerOfSicilyBonus = 0
       and Attribute Command > 0

 Affects RulerOfSicilyBonus 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RulerOfSicilyBonus_admiral_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = admiral
       and FactionLeaderTrait RulerOfSicily = 0
       and Trait RulerOfSicilyBonus = 1

 Affects RulerOfSicilyBonus -1 Chance 100


 
;========================================================
;=====  PRINCESSES triggers  ============================
;========================================================


;------------------------------------------ Royal Blood assignment

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spawned_Princess_Spanish_Blood ; not necessarily the blood of the factiontype but just of the ruler
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = princess
       and Trait IAmPrincess < 1 
	   and FactionLeaderTrait Royal_Blood_Spanish > 0
	   and Trait OldBlood < 1
	   and not FactionIsLocal

 Affects Princess_Royal_Blood_Spanish 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spawned_Princess_French_Blood ; not necessarily the blood of the factiontype but just of the ruler
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = princess
       and Trait IAmPrincess < 1 
	   and FactionLeaderTrait Royal_Blood_French > 0
	   and Trait OldBlood < 1
	   and not FactionIsLocal

 Affects Princess_Royal_Blood_French 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spawned_Princess_Portugese_Blood ; not necessarily the blood of the factiontype but just of the ruler
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = princess
       and Trait IAmPrincess < 1 
	   and FactionLeaderTrait Royal_Blood_Portuguese > 0
	   and Trait OldBlood < 1
	   and not FactionIsLocal

 Affects Princess_Royal_Blood_Portuguese 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------

 Affects Princess_Royal_Blood_Aragonese 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spawned_Princess_Jerusalem_Blood ; not necessarily the blood of the factiontype but just of the ruler
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = princess
       and Trait IAmPrincess < 1 
	   and FactionLeaderTrait Royal_Blood_Jerusalem > 0
	   and Trait OldBlood < 1
	   and not FactionIsLocal

 Affects Princess_Royal_Blood_Jerusalem 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spawned_Princess_Cuman_Blood ; not necessarily the blood of the factiontype but just of the ruler
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = princess
       and Trait IAmPrincess < 1 
	   and FactionLeaderTrait Royal_Blood_Cumans > 0
	   and Trait OldBlood < 1
	   and not FactionIsLocal

 Affects Princess_Royal_Blood_Cumans 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Princess_Accidental_Lack_of_Religion_fix
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = princess
       and Trait AgentPiety < 1 

 Affects AgentPiety 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Princess_Accidental_Lack_of_Princessness_fix
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = princess
       and Trait IAmPrincess < 1 

 Affects IAmPrincess 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
;-------- princess starters ----------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_base
 WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

 Condition AgentType = princess

 Affects IAmPrincess 1 Chance 100 
 Affects AgentPiety 1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalPrincess 1 Chance 33
 Affects PassionateWoman 1 Chance 15
 Affects PrettyWoman 1 Chance 5
 Affects BraveWoman 1 Chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_base2
WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition AgentType = princess

Affects NaturalPrincess 1 Chance 75
Affects PassionateWoman 1 Chance 50
Affects PrettyWoman 1 Chance 33
Affects BraveWoman 1 Chance 15
Affects DykeWoman 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_base3
WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition AgentType = princess

Affects NaturalPrincess 1 Chance 66
Affects PassionateWoman 1 Chance 33
Affects PrettyWoman 1 Chance 15
Affects BraveWoman 1 Chance 5
Affects DykeWoman 1 Chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_base4
WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition AgentType = princess

Affects NaturalPrincess 1 Chance 33
Affects PassionateWoman 1 Chance 15
Affects PrettyWoman 1 Chance 5
Affects BraveWoman 1 Chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_base5
WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition AgentType = princess
and not Trait PrettyWoman > 0

Affects HumbleWoman 1 Chance 50
Affects UglyWoman 1 Chance 50
Affects SpiritedWoman 1 Chance 10
Affects BraveWoman 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_base5a
WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition AgentType = princess
and Trait PrettyWoman > 0

Affects PretentiousWoman 1 Chance 33
Affects PretentiousWoman 1 Chance 10
Affects HumbleWoman 1 Chance 33
Affects HumbleWoman 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_base6
WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition AgentType = princess

Affects PretentiousWoman 1 Chance 33
Affects UglyWoman 1 Chance 15
Affects SpiritedWoman 1 Chance 15
Affects BraveWoman 1 Chance 5
Affects TimidWoman 1 Chance 5

WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition AgentType = princess

Affects FaithfulWoman 1 Chance 5
Affects FaithfulWoman 1 Chance 5
Affects DesperateWoman 1 Chance 5
Affects DesperateWoman 1 Chance 5

Affects ColdWoman 1 Chance 5
Affects ColdWoman 1 Chance 5

WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition AgentType = princess

Affects BigotWoman 1 Chance 5
Affects TolerantWoman 1 Chance 5
Affects EducatedWoman 1 Chance 5
Affects VapidWoman 1 Chance 10
Affects FairWoman 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_Buildings_Castle
WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

Condition AgentType = princess
and FactionBuildingExists >= wooden_castle

Affects BraveWoman 1 Chance 10
Affects SpiritedWoman 1 Chance 10
Affects UnchasteWoman 1 Chance 10
Affects ColdWoman 1 Chance 5
Affects FairWoman 1 Chance 5
Affects HarshWoman 1 Chance 5

       and AgentType = princess

and AgentType = princess

;------------------------------------------
;-------- princess - buildings in life ---
;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_vnv_trigger2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
	Condition Treasury > 25000
		and AgentType = princess
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= pleasure_palace
		and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	Affects DykeWoman 1 Chance 10

Trigger sitting_around_town_vnv_trigger3
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
	Condition AgentType = princess
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= church
		and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	Affects EducatedWoman 1 Chance 15

Trigger sitting_around_town_vnv_trigger4
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
	Condition AgentType = princess
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= inn
		and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	Affects UnchasteWoman 1 Chance 5

Trigger sitting_around_town_vnv_trigger5
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement
	Condition AgentType = princess
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= cathedral
		and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	Affects FaithfulWoman 1 Chance 20 
;------------------------------------------
;-------- princess - events during life ---
;------------------------------------------
Trigger HowDareThey_a
 WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

 Condition AgentType = princess

 Affects TimidWoman 1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger HowDareThey_b
 WhenToTest ExecutesAnAssassinOnAMission

 Condition AgentType = princess

 Affects BraveWoman 1 Chance 75

;------------------------------------------
;-------- princess - diplomatic missions ---
;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents27
 WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
       and AgentType = princess
	   
 Affects GoodDiplomat 1 Chance 100 
 Affects GoodPrincess 1 Chance 75


;-------- princess - famous regions visited --------
;--------------------------------------------
Trigger Princess_Visit_Paris
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsRegionOneOf 62 ; Paris_Province
       and AgentType = princess
       and Trait Princess_WesternCourt < 1

 Affects Princess_WesternCourt 1 Chance 25

       and AgentType = princess
       and Trait Princess_WesternCourt < 1

;========================================================
;=====  DIPLOMATS trig  =================================
;========================================================

;-------- diplomat AI & difficulty bonuses ---
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_Player_LevelNormal
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		and FactionIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 2
		and I_TurnNumber < 200
	   
	Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 50 
	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 10
	Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 10
	Affects Secretive 1 Chance 20
	Affects ReligiousTolerance 1 Chance 5 
	Affects BraveDiplomat 1 Chance 5
 
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_AI_LevelHard
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		and not FactionIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 3
	   
	Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 50 
	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 10
	Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 10
	Affects Secretive 1 Chance 20
	Affects ReligiousTolerance 1 Chance 5 
	Affects BraveDiplomat 1 Chance 5

;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		and not FactionIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
	   
	Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 50 
	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 10
	Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 10
	Affects Secretive 1 Chance 20
	Affects ReligiousTolerance 1 Chance 5 
	Affects BraveDiplomat 1 Chance 5
 
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard_Later
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		and not FactionIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		and I_TurnNumber > 100
	   
	Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 50 
	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 10
	Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 10
	Affects Secretive 1 Chance 20
	Affects ReligiousTolerance 1 Chance 5 
	Affects BraveDiplomat 1 Chance 5
 
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard_MuchLater
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		and not FactionIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
		and I_TurnNumber > 300
	   
	Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 50 
	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 10
	Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 10
	Affects Secretive 1 Chance 20
	Affects ReligiousTolerance 1 Chance 5 
	Affects BraveDiplomat 1 Chance 5

;-------- diplomat starter for spawned characters 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger spawn_char_trait_boost_diplomat
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		and Trait NaturalDiplomatSkill = 0 

	Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 100
	Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 60
	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 50
	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 20
	Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 50
	Affects Secretive 1 Chance 33
	Affects Secretive 1 Chance 33
	Affects ReligiousTolerance 1 Chance 50
	Affects BraveDiplomat 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Accidental_Lack_of_Religion_fix
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		and Trait AgentPiety < 1 

	Affects AgentPiety 1 Chance 100
 
 
;--------  starters  ---------------------
;-----------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat

	Affects AgentPiety 1 Chance 100 
	Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 100 
	Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 20
	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 10
	Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 10
	Affects Secretive 1 Chance 20
	Affects ReligiousTolerance 1 Chance 5 
	Affects BraveDiplomat 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_Library
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= library
	   
	Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 33
	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 10
	Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 5
	Affects ReligiousTolerance 1 Chance 5 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_Additional		; merge with the rest!
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and Trait NaturalDiplomatSkill > 0
	   
 Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 5
 Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 5
 Affects Secretive 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_Additional_University
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		and Trait NaturalDiplomatSkill > 0
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= university
	   
	Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 10
	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 10
	Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 10
	Affects Secretive -1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_BornFarAway60
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		and DistanceCapital > 60

	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 25
	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 15
	Affects ReligiousTolerance 1 Chance 10
	Affects BraveDiplomat 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_BornFarAway100
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		and DistanceCapital > 100

	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 25
	Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 15
	Affects ReligiousTolerance 1 Chance 10 
	Affects BraveDiplomat 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_DominantPop_Intolerant
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 70
       and not AtSea
	   and Trait ReligiousTolerance < 1
	   
 Affects ReligiousIntolerance 1 Chance 33
 Affects ReligiousIntolerance 1 Chance 15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_DominantPop_Tolerant
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 70
       and not AtSea
	   and Trait ReligiousTolerance > 0
 	   
 Affects ReligiousTolerance -1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_BalancedPop_Intolerant
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and PopulationOwnReligion < 60
       and not AtSea
	   and Trait ReligiousIntolerance < 1
	   
 Affects ReligiousTolerance 1 Chance 33
 Affects ReligiousTolerance 1 Chance 15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_BalancedPopulation_Tolerant
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and PopulationOwnReligion < 60
       and not AtSea
	   and Trait ReligiousIntolerance > 0
	   
 Affects ReligiousIntolerance -1 Chance 33
 Affects ReligiousIntolerance -1 Chance 15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_Single_Secretive
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
	   and Trait Multilingual < 1
	   and Trait Talkative < 1 
	   
 Affects Secretive 1 Chance 50 ; high chance of Multilingual so 50 is not as much as it seems
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_Single_Talkative
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
	   and Trait Multilingual < 1
	   and Trait Talkative > 0 
 
 Affects Talkative -1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_Multi_Talkative
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
	   and Trait Multilingual > 0
	   and Trait Secretive < 1 
 
 Affects Talkative 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_Multi_Secretive
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
	   and Trait Multilingual > 0
	   and Trait Secretive > 0 
	   
 Affects Secretive -1 Chance 50 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_SmoothTalk_Talkative
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
	   and Trait Secretive < 1 
 
 Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Starter_SmoothTalk_Secretive
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = diplomat 
	   and Trait Secretive > 0 
	   
 Affects SmoothTalker -1 Chance 33


;------- actions --------------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Experience_NotSecretive
 WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

 Condition Trait Secretive < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects Talkative 1 Chance 5
 Affects Multilingual 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Experience_Secretive
 WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

 Condition Trait Secretive > 0
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects Secretive -1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_DiplomacyMission_Success_Good
 WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
	   and Trait BadDiplomat < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects GoodDiplomat 1 Chance 50
 Affects GoodDiplomat 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_DiplomacyMission_Success_Bad
 WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
	   and Trait BadDiplomat > 0
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects BadDiplomat -1 Chance 70
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_DiplomacyMission_Failure_Bad
 WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

 Condition not MissionSucceeded
	   and Trait GoodDiplomat < 1
	   
 Affects Intelligent 1 Chance 4 	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects BadDiplomat 1 Chance 2 ; low probabilities as most of the missions in the game is just for talking

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_DiplomacyMission_Failure_Good
 WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

 Condition not MissionSucceeded
	   and Trait GoodDiplomat > 0
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects GoodDiplomat -1 Chance 2 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_BriberyMission_Success_Bad
 WhenToTest BriberyMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
	   and Trait BadDiplomat > 0
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects BadDiplomat -1 Chance 100
 Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_BriberyMission_Success_Good
 WhenToTest BriberyMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
	   and Trait BadDiplomat < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects GoodDiplomat 1 Chance 66
 Affects GoodDiplomat 1 Chance 33
 Affects SmoothTalker 1 Chance 50 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_BriberyMission_Failure_Bad
 WhenToTest BriberyMission

 Condition not MissionSucceeded
	   and Trait GoodDiplomat < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects BadDiplomat 1 Chance 33
 Affects BadDiplomat 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_BriberyMission_Failure_Good
 WhenToTest BriberyMission

 Condition not MissionSucceeded
	   and Trait GoodDiplomat > 0
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects GoodDiplomat -1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Suffers_AssassinationA_Coward
 WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and Trait BraveDiplomat < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects CowardDiplomat 1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Suffers_AssassinationA_Brave
 WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and Trait BraveDiplomat > 0
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2	
 Affects BraveDiplomat -1 Chance 50 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Executes_Assassin_Coward
 WhenToTest ExecutesAnAssassinOnAMission

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and Trait CowardDiplomat > 0
	   
 Affects CowardDiplomat -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Executes_Assassin_Brave
 WhenToTest ExecutesAnAssassinOnAMission

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
	   and Trait CowardDiplomat < 1
	   
 Affects BraveDiplomat 1 Chance 66
 Affects BraveDiplomat 1 Chance 66
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Suffers_AssassinationA_Secretive
 WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and Trait Talkative < 1
	   
 Affects Secretive 1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Suffers_AssassinationA_Talkative
 WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and Trait Talkative > 0
	   
 Affects Talkative -1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Career_Alliance
 WhenToTest DiplomacyMission

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and MissionSuccessLevel > not_successful
       and DiplomaticStanceFactions = Allied

 Affects DiplomatCareer 1 Chance 90

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Visits_Library
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
         and SettlementBuildingExists >= library
	   
 Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill 1 Chance 15 
 
;------- old age & health -----------------
;-----------------------------------------   
Trigger Diplomat_OldAge
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
         and CharacterAge > 50
         and Trait NaturalDiplomatSkill > 0
		 
 Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill -1 Chance 5 
 Affects BraveDiplomat -1 Chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Health_Ill_Accidental
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
         and CharacterAge > 30
		 and Trait AgentHealth < 1
		 and RandomPercent > 50
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Health_SeriouslyIll_Accidental
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
         and CharacterAge > 40
		 and Trait AgentHealth < 1
		 and RandomPercent > 50
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 2 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Health_Ill_Plague
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and SettlementHasPlague
	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Health_Ill_UnderSiege
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart 

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and EndedInSettlement
       and IsUnderSiege
	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Health_Recovers
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
	   and Trait AgentHealth > 0		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth -1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Health_Recovers_Stopped
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and Trait AgentHealth > 0		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth -1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Health_Recovers_InSettlement
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and not SettlementHasPlague
       and not IsUnderSiege
	   and Trait AgentHealth > 0		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth -1 Chance 50

 
;---------- Ruler of Sicily diplomat triggers ---
;-----------------------------------------------
Trigger RulerOfSicilyBonus_diplomat_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and FactionLeaderTrait RulerOfSicily = 1
       and Trait RulerOfSicilyBonus = 0
       and Attribute Command > 0

 Affects RulerOfSicilyBonus 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger RulerOfSicilyBonus_diplomat_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and FactionLeaderTrait RulerOfSicily = 0
       and Trait RulerOfSicilyBonus = 1

 Affects RulerOfSicilyBonus -1 Chance 100
 
 
;---------- diplomat - famous regions visited  ----
;---------------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Visit_Bologna
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and IsRegionOneOf 99 ; Bologna_Province
       and Trait Diplomat_BolognaEdu < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3
	   
 Affects Diplomat_BolognaEdu 1 Chance 25
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Diplomat_Visit_London
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
    and IsRegionOneOf 45 ; London_Province
    and Trait Diplomat_LondonEdu < 1
 	and Trait AgentHealth < 3
	and I_TurnNumber > 50	   
	
 Affects Diplomat_LondonEdu 1 Chance 25
 
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and IsRegionOneOf 126 ; Valladolid_Province
       and Trait Diplomat_SalamancaEdu < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3
	   
 Affects Diplomat_SalamancaEdu 1 Chance 25

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and IsRegionOneOf 168 ; Tunis_Province
       and Trait Diplomat_TunisEdu < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3
	   
 Affects Diplomat_TunisEdu 1 Chance 25

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

  Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and IsRegionOneOf 174 ; Fes_Province
       and Trait Diplomat_FesEdu < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3
	   
 Affects Diplomat_FesEdu 1 Chance 25

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = diplomat
       and IsRegionOneOf 197 ; Cairo_Province 
       and Trait Diplomat_CairoEdu < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3
