;========================================================
;=====  SPY trig  =======================================
;========================================================
; any spy should have NaturalSpySkill so that he gets the malus on LineOfSight

;-------- spy AI & difficulty bonuses --------
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starter_Player_LevelNormal_Enemy
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 2
       and I_TurnNumber < 200
	   
 Affects NaturalSpySkill -1 Chance 50
 
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starter_Player_LevelNormal_Own
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 2
       and I_TurnNumber < 200
	   
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 100

;----------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starter_AI_LevelHard
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 3
	   
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 10
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 10
 Affects ThievesGuildTrained 1 Chance 30
 Affects ThievesGuildMember 1 Chance 10

;----------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
	   
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 10
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 10
 Affects ThievesGuildTrained 1 Chance 30
 Affects ThievesGuildMember 1 Chance 10
 
;----------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard_Later
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
       and I_TurnNumber > 100
	   
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 10
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 10
 Affects ThievesGuildTrained 1 Chance 30
 Affects ThievesGuildMember 1 Chance 10
 
;----------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard_MuchLater
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
       and I_TurnNumber > 300
	   
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 10
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 10
 Affects ThievesGuildTrained 1 Chance 30
 Affects ThievesGuildMember 1 Chance 10

;-------- spy starter for spawned characters 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger spawn_char_trait_boost_spy
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and Trait NaturalSpySkill = 0 

 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 70
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 40
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 80
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 65
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 15
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Accidental_Lack_of_Religion_fix
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and Trait AgentPiety < 1 

 Affects AgentPiety 1 Chance 100	   
 
;-------- spy starters --------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starter
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy

 Affects AgentPiety 1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 33 
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 15
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 15
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starter_Additional
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and Trait NaturalSpySkill > 0

 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 33 
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 15
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 15
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starter_Additional_Library
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and Trait NaturalSpySkill > 0
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= library
	   
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 20 
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starter_Guild
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and SettlementBuildingExists = thieves_guild

 Affects ThievesGuildTrained 1 Chance 100 
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starter_MasterGuild
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and SettlementBuildingExists = m_thieves_guild

 Affects ThievesGuildTrained 1 Chance 100 
 Affects ThievesGuildMember 1 Chance 100 
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 20 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starting_GuildHQ
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and SettlementBuildingExists > m_thieves_guild

 Affects ThievesGuildTrained 1 Chance 100 
 Affects ThievesGuildMember 2 Chance 100 
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 33 
 
 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Starting_GuildHQ_Exists
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and FactionBuildingExists > m_thieves_guild

 Affects ThievesGuildMember 1 Chance 33 
 
 
;------------------------------------------
;------------ spy situations --------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Visiting_MasterGuild
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and SettlementBuildingExists = m_thieves_guild
       and Trait ThievesGuildMember < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects ThievesGuildMember 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Visiting_GuildHQ_NoMembership
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and SettlementBuildingExists = gm_thieves_guild
       and Trait ThievesGuildMember < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects ThievesGuildMember 2 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Visiting_GuildHQ
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and SettlementBuildingExists = gm_thieves_guild
       and Trait ThievesGuildMember > 0
       and Trait ThievesGuildMember < 2
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects ThievesGuildMember 1 Chance 33

 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Visiting_CoachingHouse
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and SettlementBuildingExists > tavern
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 5
 Affects NaturalSpySkill 1 Chance 20
 

;------------------------------------------
;------------ spy missions ----------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Mission_Success_Good
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
       and Trait BadSpy < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2   
 Affects GoodSpy 1 Chance 75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Mission_Success_Bad
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
       and Trait BadSpy > 0
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2  
 Affects BadSpy -1 Chance 75 
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger Spy_Mission_Failed_Bad
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition MissionSuccessLevel = not_successful
       and Trait GoodSpy < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2 
 Affects BadSpy 1 Chance 35 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Mission_Failed_Good
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition MissionSuccessLevel = not_successful
       and Trait GoodSpy > 0
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2 
 Affects GoodSpy -1 Chance 35 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Mission_HighSuccess_Good
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition MissionSuccessLevel = highly_successful
       and Trait BadConspirator < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2 
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Mission_HighSuccess_Bad
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition MissionSuccessLevel = highly_successful
       and Trait BadConspirator > 0
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2 
 Affects BadConspirator -1 Chance 33
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Career_ImprobableSuccess
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and ProbabilitySuccess < 30
       and MissionSuccessLevel = highly_successful
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   	   
 Affects SpyCareer 1 Chance 30

 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Career_HighSuccess
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and MissionSuccessLevel = highly_successful
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects SpyCareer 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Career_PartSuccess
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and MissionSuccessLevel = partly_successful
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects SpyCareer 1 Chance 10
 
 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Career_AverageSuccess
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and ProbabilitySuccess > 30
       and ProbabilitySuccess < 65
       and MissionSuccessLevel = highly_successful
   
 Affects SpyCareer 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Spy_Career_LowSuccess
 WhenToTest SpyMission

 Condition AgentType = spy
       and ProbabilitySuccess > 65
       and MissionSuccessLevel = highly_successful

 Affects SpyCareer 1 Chance 5

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

         and CharacterAge > 45
         and Trait NaturalSpySkill > 0
		 
 Affects NaturalSpySkill -1 Chance 5
 Affects GoodSpy -1 Chance 3

       and Trait BadSpy < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3
	   
 Affects Spy_PirateConnections 1 Chance 25

;========================================================
;=====  ASSASSIN trig  ==================================
;========================================================

;-------- assassin AI & difficulty bonuses ---
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Starter_Player_LevelNormal_Enemy
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 2
       and I_TurnNumber < 200

 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill -1 Chance 50
 
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Starter_Player_LevelNormal_Own
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 2
       and I_TurnNumber < 200

 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 50

;----------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Starter_AI_LevelHard
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 3

 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 10
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 10
 Affects AssassinsGuildTrained 1 Chance 30
 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 1 Chance 10

;----------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4

 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 10
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 10
 Affects AssassinsGuildTrained 1 Chance 30
 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 1 Chance 10
 
;----------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard_Later
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
	   and I_TurnNumber > 100

 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 10
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 10
 Affects AssassinsGuildTrained 1 Chance 30
 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 1 Chance 10
 
;----------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard_MuchLater
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
	   and I_TurnNumber > 300

 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 10
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 10
 Affects AssassinsGuildTrained 1 Chance 30
 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 1 Chance 10
 
 
;-------- assassin starter for spawned characters 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger spawn_char_trait_boost_assassin
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and Trait NaturalAssassinSkill = 0 

 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 60
 Affects AssassinsGuildTrained 1 Chance 50
 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 1 Chance 30
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 80
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 75
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Accidental_Lack_of_Religion_fix
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and Trait AgentPiety < 1 

 Affects AgentPiety 1 Chance 100
 
 ;-------- assassin starters ---------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Starter
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin

 Affects AgentPiety 1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 100 
 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 15
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 5
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 5
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Starter_LevelHard_AIBoost
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 3

 Affects AssassinsGuildTrained 1 Chance 50
 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 1 Chance 30 
 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 10
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 20
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Starter_LevelVeryHard_AIBoost
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4

 Affects AssassinsGuildTrained 1 Chance 80
 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 1 Chance 50 
 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 20
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 30
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 30

 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and Trait NaturalAssassinSkill > 0

 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 5
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 5

 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and SettlementBuildingExists = assassins_guild

 Affects AssassinsGuildTrained 1 Chance 100 
 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 33
 
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and SettlementBuildingExists = m_assassins_guild

 Affects AssassinsGuildTrained 1 Chance 100 
 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 1 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Starter_GuildHQ
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and SettlementBuildingExists > m_assassins_guild

 Affects AssassinsGuildTrained 1 Chance 100  
 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 2 Chance 100 
 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 33

 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Starter_GuildHQ_Exists
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and FactionBuildingExists > m_assassins_guild

 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 2 Chance 50 

 
;-------- assassin situations ------------
;-----------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Visiting_MasterGuild
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and SettlementBuildingExists = m_assassins_guild
       and Trait AssassinsGuildMember < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 1 Chance 20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Visiting_GuildHQ_NoMembership
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and SettlementBuildingExists = gm_assassins_guild
       and Trait AssassinsGuildMember < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 1 Chance 20 

 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Visiting_GuildHQ
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and SettlementBuildingExists = gm_assassins_guild
       and Trait AssassinsGuildMember > 0
       and Trait AssassinsGuildMember < 2
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects AssassinsGuildMember 1 Chance 20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Visiting_CoachingHouse
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and SettlementBuildingExists > tavern
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 5
 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill 1 Chance 20

 
;-------- assassin actions ---------------
;-----------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Career_HighlySuccessful
 WhenToTest AssassinationMission

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and MissionSuccessLevel = highly_successful
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2	
 Affects AssassinCareer 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Career_PartlySuccessful
 WhenToTest AssassinationMission

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and MissionSuccessLevel = partly_successful
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2	
 Affects AssassinCareer 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Kills_Success_Good
 WhenToTest AssassinationMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
       and Trait BadAssassin < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects GoodAssassin 1 Chance 95 

;-----------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Kills_Success_Bad
 WhenToTest AssassinationMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
       and Trait BadAssassin > 0
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects BadAssassin -1 Chance 95 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Kills_Failure_Bad
 WhenToTest AssassinationMission

 Condition not MissionSucceeded
       and Trait GoodAssassin < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects BadAssassin 1 Chance 25

 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Kills_Failure_Good
 WhenToTest AssassinationMission

 Condition not MissionSucceeded
       and Trait GoodAssassin > 0
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects GoodAssassin -1 Chance 25

;-----------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Sabotage_Success_Good
 WhenToTest SabotageMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
       and Trait BadConspirator < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 75 

;-----------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Sabotage_Success_Bad
 WhenToTest SabotageMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
       and Trait BadConspirator > 0
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects BadConspirator -1 Chance 75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Sabotage_Failure_Bad
 WhenToTest SabotageMission

 Condition not MissionSucceeded
       and Trait GoodConspirator < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects BadConspirator 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Sabotage_Failure_Good
 WhenToTest SabotageMission

 Condition not MissionSucceeded
       and Trait GoodConspirator > 0
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects GoodConspirator -1 Chance 33
 
;-----------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Insurrection_Success_Good ; unfortunately the other trigger for failure does not work on the insurrection event, since it doesnt export mission_success_level
 WhenToTest Insurrection

 Condition Trait BadConspirator < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2		   
 Affects GoodConspirator 1 Chance 33 

 
;------- old age decline ----------------
;-----------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_OldAge
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = assassin
         and CharacterAge > 45
         and Trait NaturalAssassinSkill > 0
		 
 Affects NaturalAssassinSkill -1 Chance 5
 Affects GoodAssassin -1 Chance 3

 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Health_Ill_Accidental
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = assassin
         and CharacterAge > 30
		 and Trait AgentHealth < 1		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Health_SeriouslyIll_Accidental
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = assassin
         and CharacterAge > 40
		 and Trait AgentHealth < 1		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 2 Chance 1
 
 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Health_Ill_Plague
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and SettlementHasPlague
	   and Trait AgentHealth < 2		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10
 
 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Health_Ill_UnderSiege
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and IsUnderSiege
	   and Trait AgentHealth < 2		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Health_Recovers
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = assassin
	   and Trait AgentHealth > 0		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth -1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Health_Recovers_Stopped
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and Trait AgentHealth > 0		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth -1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Health_Recovers_InSettlement
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and not SettlementHasPlague
       and not IsUnderSiege
	   and Trait AgentHealth > 0		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth -1 Chance 50

 
;---------- assassin - famous regions visited -------
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Visit_Damascus
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and IsRegionOneOf 179 ; Damascus_Province
       and Trait Assassin_SyrianTraining < 1
       and Trait BadAssassin < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3
	   
 Affects Assassin_SyrianTraining 1 Chance 25
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assassin_Visit_Tripoli
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and IsRegionOneOf 178 ; Tripoli_Province
       and Trait Assassin_SyrianTraining < 1
       and Trait BadAssassin < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3
	   
 Affects Assassin_SyrianTraining 1 Chance 25
 
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and IsRegionOneOf 167 ; Alamut_Province
       and Trait Assassin_PersianTraining < 1
       and Trait BadAssassin < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3
	   
 Affects Assassin_PersianTraining 1 Chance 25

 Condition AgentType = assassin
       and IsRegionOneOf 160 ; Ray_Province
       and Trait Assassin_PersianTraining < 1
       and Trait BadAssassin < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3
	   
 Affects Assassin_PersianTraining 1 Chance 25

       and IsRegionOneOf 168 ; Tunis_Province
       and Trait Assassin_PirateTraining < 1
       and Trait BadAssassin < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3

       and Trait BadAssassin < 1

       and IsRegionOneOf 153 ; Merv

 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 3

;========================================================
;=====  MERCHANT trig  ==================================

;------------------------------------------
;-------- merchant AI bonuses
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Starter_LevelHard_AIBoost
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and not FactionIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 3

	Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 10 
	Affects MerchantsGuildMember 1 Chance 30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Starter_LevelVeryHard_AIBoost
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and not FactionIsLocal
		and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4

	Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 20 
	Affects MerchantsGuildMember 1 Chance 40 

;-------- merchant starter for spawned characters  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger spawn_char_trait_boost_merchantA
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and Trait NaturalMerchantSkill = 0

	Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 100
	Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 50
	Affects MerchantCompetence 7 Chance 100
	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 70
	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 35
	Affects MerchantLegality 5 Chance 35
	Affects SecureMerchant 1 Chance 25
	Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spawn_char_trait_boost_merchantB
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and Trait NaturalMerchantSkill = 0

	Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 100
	Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 50
	Affects MerchantCompetence 7 Chance 100
	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 70
	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 35
	Affects MerchantLegality 5 Chance 35
	Affects SecureMerchant 1 Chance 25
	Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Accidental_Lack_of_Religion_fix
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and Trait AgentPiety < 1 

	Affects AgentPiety 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
;-------- merchant starters ---------------
;------------------------------------------
 
;-------- merchant basic starters
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Starter
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant

	Affects AgentPiety 1 Chance 100
	Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 100 
	Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 33 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedSkillIncrease2
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and Trait NaturalMerchantSkill = 2

	Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 33

		and FactionType venice
		; and Trait NaturalMerchantSkill = 1

	Affects NaturalMerchantSkill 1 Chance 33

;-------- legal and shady dealer -----------
;-------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedTownHallExists
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= town_hall

	Affects MerchantLegality 5 Chance 20 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedNoLawBuildingExists
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and not SettlementBuildingExists >= town_hall

	Affects MerchantLegality 3 Chance 20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedBrothelExists
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= brothel

	Affects MerchantLegality 3 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedMerchantLegalityIncrease
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and Trait MerchantLegality = 4

	Affects MerchantLegality 1 Chance 33

		and Trait MerchantLegality = 2

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant

	Affects Merchantfamily 1 Chance 10

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= merchants_quarter

	Affects Merchantfamily 1 Chance 50

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= warehouse

	Affects Merchantfamily 1 Chance 25

 
;-------- religious and wordly merchant ---
;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedReligionVeryHighCathedral
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= cathedral
		and PopulationOwnReligion > 80
		and not AtSea

	Affects ReligiousMerchant 1 Chance 90

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedReligionVeryHigh
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
       and SettlementBuildingExists < cathedral
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 80
       and not AtSea
	   
	Affects ReligiousMerchant 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedReligionHighCathedral
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= cathedral
		and PopulationOwnReligion < 81
		and PopulationOwnReligion > 50
		and not AtSea
	   
	Affects ReligiousMerchant 1 Chance 60

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedReligionHigh
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists < cathedral
		and PopulationOwnReligion < 81
		and PopulationOwnReligion > 50
		and not AtSea
	   
	Affects ReligiousMerchant 1 Chance 40

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedReligionMediumCathedral
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= cathedral
		and PopulationOwnReligion < 51
		and PopulationOwnReligion > 35
		and not AtSea
	   
	Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 10
	Affects ReligiousMerchant 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedReligionMedium
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists < cathedral
		and PopulationOwnReligion < 51
		and PopulationOwnReligion > 35
		and not AtSea
	   
	Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 50
	Affects ReligiousMerchant 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedReligionLowCathedral
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= cathedral
		and PopulationOwnReligion < 36
		and PopulationOwnReligion > 10 
		and not AtSea
	   
	Affects ReligiousMerchant 1 Chance 30
	Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 60

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedReligionLow
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists < cathedral
		and PopulationOwnReligion < 36
		and PopulationOwnReligion > 10
		and not AtSea
	   
	Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 75

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedReligionVeryLow
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and PopulationOwnReligion < 11
		and not AtSea

	Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedReligiousMerchantIncrease
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and Trait ReligiousMerchant = 1

	Affects ReligiousMerchant 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedWorldlyMerchantIncrease
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and Trait WorldlyMerchant = 1

	Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= thieves_guild
		and Trait MerchantLegality > 0

	Affects MerchantLegality -1 Chance 20

 ;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists >= assassins_guild
		and Trait MerchantLegality > 0

	Affects MerchantLegality 1 Chance 33 
 
 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedGuildExists
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists = merchants_guild

	Affects MerchantsGuildMember 1 Chance 100
	Affects MerchantCompetence 7 Chance 100
	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 90

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedMasterGuildExists
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists = m_merchants_guild

	Affects MerchantsGuildMember 2 Chance 100 
	Affects MerchantCompetence 8 Chance 100
	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedHQGuildExists
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists = gm_merchants_guild

	Affects MerchantsGuildMember 3 Chance 100 
	Affects MerchantCompetence 8 Chance 100
	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 70

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantCreatedHQGuildExistsFaction
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and FactionBuildingExists = gm_merchants_guild
		and not SettlementBuildingExists = gm_merchants_guild

	Affects MerchantsGuildMember 1 Chance 100 
	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 90

;-------- merchant life -------------------------
;-----------------------------------------------


;------- merchant - buildings in life ----------
;-----------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_CityTrade
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementBuildingExists > merchants_guild

	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 10 

;------- merchant - events ----------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Acquition_Success
	WhenToTest AcquisitionMission

	Condition MissionSucceeded

	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 85 
	Affects MerchantEnemies 1 Chance 25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Acquition_Fail
	WhenToTest AcquisitionMission

	Condition not MissionSucceeded
		and FactionIsLocal

	Affects MerchantCompetence -1 Chance 33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Acquition_Attempt
	WhenToTest SufferAcquisitionAttempt

	Affects SecureMerchant 1 Chance 60

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Assassination_Attempt
	WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

	Condition AgentType = merchant

	Affects SecurityMerchant 1 Chance 45 

 
;------------------------------------------ 
;-------- merchant trading resource -------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantTradingMerchantCompetenceIncrease
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and OnResource
		and Trait MerchantLegality = 4

	Affects MerchantLegality 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantTradingMerchantCompetenceDecrease
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and OnResource
		and Trait MerchantLegality = 2

	Affects MerchantLegality -1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantTradingBadMerchantIdleLong
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 5
		and OnResource
		and DistanceCapital < 60 

	Affects MerchantCompetence -1 Chance 10 

;	merged with trigger below --- belovese
; ;------------------------------------------
; Trigger Merchant_Trading1
	; WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	; Condition AgentType = merchant 
		; and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 5
		; and OnResource
		; and DistanceCapital >= 75

	; Affects ServesSelfMerchant 1 Chance 3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Trading2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant 
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 5
		and OnResource
		and DistanceCapital >= 60
		and DistanceCapital < 120

	Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 10
	Affects ServesSelfMerchant 1 Chance 3 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Trading3
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant 
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 5
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle < 30
		and OnResource
		and DistanceCapital >= 120

	Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Trading4
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant 
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 30
		and OnResource
		and DistanceCapital >= 60

	Affects MerchantCompetence -1 Chance 20
	Affects ServesSelfMerchant 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Trading5
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle = 10
		and TradingExotic
		and Trait MerchantExotics = 0

	Affects MerchantExotics 1 Chance 100
	Affects MerchantExotics 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Trading6
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 5
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle < 30
		and OnResource 
		and not TradingExotic

	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Trading7
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 5
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle < 30
		and OnResource 
		and TradingExotic

	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Trading8
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle = 15
		and OnResource 
		and TradingExotic

	Affects Merchantfamily 1 Chance 100

;	same as the trigger just above!

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 15
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle < 30
		and OnResource 
		and TradingExotic

Trigger Merchant_Trading11
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle = 20
		and OnResource 
 
	Affects Merchantfamily 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Trading12
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant 
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 5
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle < 30
		and OnResource
		and DistanceCapital >= 150

	Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Trading13
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant 
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle > 5
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle < 30
		and OnResource
		and DistanceCapital > 50
		and DistanceCapital < 150

	Affects WorldlyMerchant 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Trading14
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant 
		and CharacterNumTurnsIdle = 20
		and OnResource
		; and CharacterNumTurnsIdle < 30

	Affects SecureMerchant 1 Chance 50
	Affects SecurityMerchant 1 Chance 100

 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Security
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant 
		and DistanceCapital > 99 
		and not OnResource

	Affects SecurityMerchant 1 Chance 15 

;-------- local merchant -----------------
;-----------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantLocalMerchant_add
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant 
		and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
		and OnResource

	Affects LocalMerchant 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantLocalMerchant_remove
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant 
		and RemainingMPPercentage < 75

	Affects LocalMerchant -7 Chance 100
 
;------- merchant monopoly ----------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Monopoly_Far
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and TradingMonopoly
		and DistanceCapital >= 100

	Affects Monopolist 1 Chance 50
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Monopoly_Near
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and TradingMonopoly
		and DistanceCapital < 100

	Affects Monopolist 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
;-------- merchant old age & health
;------------------------------------------
;---- 1(1), 2(20), 3(30), ..., 6(60)
;-- age: 45, 50, 55, 60, 65, 70, 75
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Old_Age
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and CharacterAge > 50
		and not CharFactionType slave

	Affects OldMerchant 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Aging_From_Illness
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and CharacterAge > 45
		and Trait AgentHealth > 0

	Affects OldMerchant 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Aging_Acquition_Attempt
	WhenToTest SufferAcquisitionAttempt

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and CharacterAge > 45

	Affects OldMerchant 1 Chance 50
 
 
;-------- health problems  ----------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Health_Ill_Accidental
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and CharacterAge > 30
		and Trait AgentHealth < 1		 

	Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Health_SeriouslyIll_Accidental
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and CharacterAge > 40
		and Trait AgentHealth < 1

	Affects AgentHealth 2 Chance 1
 
 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Health_Ill_Plague
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and SettlementHasPlague
		and Trait AgentHealth < 2

	Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10
 
 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Health_Ill_UnderSiege
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and EndedInSettlement
		and IsUnderSiege
		and Trait AgentHealth < 2

	Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Health_Recovers
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and Trait AgentHealth > 0		 

	Affects AgentHealth -1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Health_Recovers_Stopped
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
		and Trait AgentHealth > 0		 

	Affects AgentHealth -1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Merchant_Health_Recovers_InSettlement
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and not SettlementHasPlague
		and not IsUnderSiege
		and Trait AgentHealth > 0		 

	Affects AgentHealth -1 Chance 50
 
 
;-----------------------------------------------------
;------- merchant - might be related to script -------
;-----------------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantSlaveNoMovement_add
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and OnResource
		and FactionType slave
		and Trait SlaveMerchantNoMovement < 1

	Affects SlaveMerchantNoMovement 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantSlaveNoMovement_remove
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and not OnResource
		and FactionType slave
		and Trait SlaveMerchantNoMovement > 0

	Affects SlaveMerchantNoMovement -1 Chance 20

;----------------------------------------------------
;-------- merchant and FL (MerchantSkills triggers) -
;--- perhaps related to an interactive event --------
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantSkills_add_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and FactionIncome > 1500
       and Attribute Authority > 2
       and not Trait Epicurean > 1
       and not Trait ExpensiveTastes > 1

 Affects MerchantSkills 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantSkills_add_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and FactionIncome > 1000
       and Attribute Authority > 2
       and not Trait Epicurean > 1
       and not Trait ExpensiveTastes > 1
       and Trait MathematicsSkill > 0

 Affects MerchantSkills 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantSkills_add_3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0
       and FactionIncome > 1000
       and Attribute Authority > 2
       and not Trait Epicurean > 1
       and not Trait ExpensiveTastes > 1
       and Trait GoodTrader > 0

 Affects MerchantSkills 1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantSkillsWideSet_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait MerchantSkills = 1
       and Trait WideTraitSet = 0

 Affects WideTraitSet 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantSkillsBonus_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = merchant
       and FactionLeaderTrait MerchantSkills = 1
       and Trait MerchantSkillsBonus = 0

 Affects MerchantSkillsBonus 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger MerchantSkillsBonus_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = merchant
       and FactionLeaderTrait MerchantSkills = 0
       and Trait MerchantSkillsBonus = 1

 Affects MerchantSkillsBonus -1 Chance 100
 
 ;---------------------------------------------
 ; CLearing house triggers to simulate antitraits
 ;---------------------------------------------
 
 Trigger ClearingHouse_ReligiousAndIllegal
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	
	Condition AgentType = merchant
		and Trait MerchantLegality > 0
		and Trait MerchantLegality < 3
		and Trait ReligiousMerchant > 0

	Affects MerchantLegality 1 Chance 100
	Affects ReligiousMerchant -1 Chance 100

;========================================================
;=====  PRIEST triggers  ================================
;========================================================

;---------------------------------------------
;-------- priest difficulty ------------------
;---------------------------------------------

;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Starter_Player_LevelNormal
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and FactionIsLocal
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 2
       and I_TurnNumber < 200
	   
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 40 
 Affects GoodDenouncer 1 Chance 20
 Affects Dogmatic 1 Chance 20
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 20
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 10
 Affects Purifier 1 Chance 10

;----------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Starter_AI_LevelHard
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 3
	   
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 20 
 Affects GoodDenouncer 1 Chance 20
 Affects Dogmatic 1 Chance 20
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 20
 Affects TheologiansGuildTrained 1 Chance 20
 Affects TheologiansGuildMember 1 Chance 20
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 10
 Affects Purifier 1 Chance 10

;----------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
	   
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 20 
 Affects GoodDenouncer 1 Chance 20
 Affects Dogmatic 1 Chance 20
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 20
 Affects TheologiansGuildTrained 1 Chance 20
 Affects TheologiansGuildMember 1 Chance 20
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 10
 Affects Purifier 1 Chance 10
 
;----------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard_Later
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
       and I_TurnNumber > 100
	   
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 20 
 Affects GoodDenouncer 1 Chance 20
 Affects Dogmatic 1 Chance 20
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 20
 Affects TheologiansGuildTrained 1 Chance 20
 Affects TheologiansGuildMember 1 Chance 20
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 10
 Affects Purifier 1 Chance 10

;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Starter_AI_LevelVeryHard_MuchLater
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
       and I_TurnNumber > 300
	   
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 20 
 Affects GoodDenouncer 1 Chance 20
 Affects Dogmatic 1 Chance 20
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 20
 Affects TheologiansGuildTrained 1 Chance 20
 Affects TheologiansGuildMember 1 Chance 20
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 10
 Affects Purifier 1 Chance 10

;---------------------------------------------
;-------- priest AI bonuses ------------------
;---------------------------------------------
 
;--- AI spawn priests boost --------
;- after recruitment priest will certainly have NaturalPriestSkill > 0
;------------------------------------------
Trigger spawn_char_trait_boost_priest
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and Trait NaturalPriestSkill < 1 
       and not CharacterReligion pagan

 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 100
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 70
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 20
 Affects Peaceful 1 Chance 50
 Affects Peaceful 1 Chance 35
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 65
 Affects Dogmatic 1 Chance 85
 Affects DivineProtection 1 Chance 45
 Affects Heresy_Immunity_AI 1 Chance 80

;------------------------------------------
;- this is needed because the AI doesn't know he should visit cathedrals (to get Dogmatic)
;- but is likely to stay in the wilderness (getting constantly OpenMinded and Missionary)
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_AutoProgression_AI_Dogmatic
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and Trait OpenMinded < 1
	   
 Affects Dogmatic 1 Chance 5
 Affects TheologiansGuildTrained 1 Chance 2
 Affects TheologiansGuildMember 1 Chance 2
 Affects Missionary -1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_AutoProgression_AI_Open
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and Trait OpenMinded > 0
	   
 Affects OpenMinded -1 Chance 5
 Affects TheologiansGuildTrained 1 Chance 2
 Affects TheologiansGuildMember 1 Chance 2
 Affects Missionary -1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_AutoProgression_AI_Wavering
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and Trait WaveringFaith > 0
	   
 Affects WaveringFaith -1 Chance 2

 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   
 Affects Unorthodoxy_Bonus_AI 1 Chance 100

Trigger Priest_Starter_Immune_to_Heresy_AI
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and CharacterReligion catholic

 Affects Heresy_Immunity_AI 1 Chance 20
 
 
;---------------------------------------------------------
;-------- AI priests anti_heretic boost mechanism  -------
;---------------------------------------------------------
Trigger AI_anti_heretic_boost
 WhenToTest CharacterNearHeretic

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and Trait AI_anti_heretic_boost < 1  ; not necessary but just for safety
	   
 Affects AI_anti_heretic_boost 1 Chance 60

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AI_anti_heretic_boost_remove
 WhenToTest DenouncementMission

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Trait AI_anti_heretic_boost > 0

 Affects AI_anti_heretic_boost -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AI_anti_heretic_boost_remove_2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Trait AI_anti_heretic_boost > 0

 Affects AI_anti_heretic_boost -1 Chance 100

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 50

 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and Trait NaturalPriestSkill > 1

 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 33
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 10
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 5

 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not CultureType middle_eastern
       and not FactionReligion pagan

 Affects SecretlyFemale 1 Chance 3

       and not CharacterReligion catholic
       and not CharacterReligion pagan

       and not CharacterReligion pagan

 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 3
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 2

       and FactionBuildingExists = gm_theologians_guild
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and Trait TheologiansGuildMember < 2
	   and Trait TheologiansGuildMember > 0
	   
 Affects TheologiansGuildMember 1 Chance 33
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 3
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
;-------- priest - visiting ---------------
;------------------------------------------

;-------- visiting wilderness -------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_InWild_Open
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not EndedInSettlement
       and not AtSea
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and Trait Dogmatic < 2
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and RandomPercent > 50
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2
 Affects OpenMinded 1 Chance 10
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 4
 Affects Purifier 1 Chance 2
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 4
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_InWild_Dogmatic
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not EndedInSettlement
       and not AtSea
       and TimeInRegion > 2
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and Trait Dogmatic > 0
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and RandomPercent > 50
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2   
 Affects Dogmatic -1 Chance 10
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 4 
 Affects Purifier 1 Chance 2
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill 1 Chance 4
 
 
;-------- visiting guilds -----------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Visiting_Guild
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= theologians_guild
       and Trait TheologiansGuildMember < 1
	   and RandomPercent > 50
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2
 Affects TheologiansGuildMember 1 Chance 10
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 4

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= m_theologians_guild

 Affects TheologiansGuildMember 1 Chance 5
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 2

;------------------------------------------
;-------- priest - preaching --------------
;------------------------------------------

;------- preaching at home ----------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Preaching_Basic_Wavering
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea                     ; might be needed because sea has no religion ReligionShift and the condition fails altogether (is ignored as a condition) and he therefore gets the trait when at sea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and ReligionShift > 5
       and TimeInRegion < 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait WaveringFaith > 0
	   
 Affects WaveringFaith -1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Preaching_Basic_Strong
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and ReligionShift > 5
       and TimeInRegion < 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait WaveringFaith < 1
	   and Trait StrongFaith < 2
	   
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Preaching_Good_Results_Strong
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and ReligionShift > 10
       and TimeInRegion < 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait WaveringFaith < 1
	   and Trait StrongFaith < 3
	   
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and ReligionShift > 10
       and TimeInRegion < 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait WaveringFaith > 0
	   
 Affects WaveringFaith -1 Chance 33

       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and ReligionShift > 15
       and TimeInRegion < 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait WaveringFaith < 1
	   and Trait StrongFaith < 3
	   
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 20

       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and ReligionShift > 15
       and TimeInRegion < 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait WaveringFaith > 0
	   
 Affects WaveringFaith -1 Chance 33

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and PopulationOwnReligion < 60
       and ReligionShift < 8
       and TimeInRegion > 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait StrongFaith < 1
	   and Trait WaveringFaith < 4

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and PopulationOwnReligion < 60
       and ReligionShift < 8
       and TimeInRegion > 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait StrongFaith > 0
	   
 Affects StrongFaith -1 Chance 33
  

;------- preaching in enemy lands ----------------
;-------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Preaching_No_Results_Wavering_Abroad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and InEnemyLands
       and PopulationOwnReligion < 50
       and ReligionShift < 8
       and TimeInRegion > 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait StrongFaith < 1
	   and Trait WaveringFaith < 4
	   
 Affects WaveringFaith 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Preaching_No_Results_Strong_Abroad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and InEnemyLands
       and PopulationOwnReligion < 50
       and ReligionShift < 8
       and TimeInRegion > 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait StrongFaith > 0
	   
 Affects StrongFaith -1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Preaching_Good_Results_Strong_Abroad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and InEnemyLands
       and ReligionShift > 10
       and TimeInRegion < 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait WaveringFaith < 1
	   and Trait StrongFaith < 4
	   
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Preaching_Good_Results_Wavering_Abroad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and InEnemyLands
       and ReligionShift > 10
       and TimeInRegion < 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait WaveringFaith > 0
	   
 Affects WaveringFaith -1 Chance 66
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Preaching_VeryGood_Results_Strong_Abroad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and InEnemyLands
       and ReligionShift > 15
       and TimeInRegion < 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait WaveringFaith < 1
	   and Trait StrongFaith < 4
	   
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and InEnemyLands
       and ReligionShift > 15
       and TimeInRegion < 5
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait WaveringFaith > 0
	   
 Affects WaveringFaith -1 Chance 66
 
 
;------- open minded and dogmatic ----------------
;-------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Little_Supporters_Open
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and PopulationOwnReligion <= 40
       and TimeInRegion > 3
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait Dogmatic < 1
	   and Trait OpenMinded < 3
	   
 Affects OpenMinded 1 Chance 5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Little_Supporters_Dogmatic
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and PopulationOwnReligion <= 40
       and TimeInRegion > 3
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait Dogmatic > 0
	   
 Affects Dogmatic -1 Chance 5
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Too_Many_Supporters_Dogmatic
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 85
       and TimeInRegion > 3
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait OpenMinded < 1
	   and Trait Dogmatic < 3
	   
 Affects Dogmatic 1 Chance 5 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Too_Many_Supporters_Open
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 85
       and TimeInRegion > 3
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait OpenMinded > 0
	   
 Affects OpenMinded -1 Chance 5

 
;------- corrupt and righteous -----------------
;-----------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Corrupt_Corrupt
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and not InEnemyLands
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 80
       and TimeInRegion > 3
       and Treasury > 30000
	   and Trait OpenMinded > 0
	   and Trait Righteous < 1
	   and Trait Corrupted < 3
	   
 Affects Corrupted 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Corrupt_Righteous
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and not InEnemyLands
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 80
       and TimeInRegion > 3
       and Treasury > 30000
	   and Trait OpenMinded > 0
	   and Trait Righteous > 0
	   
 Affects Righteous -1 Chance 15
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Righteous_Corrupt
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and not InEnemyLands
       and PopulationOwnReligion < 50
       and TimeInRegion > 3
       and Treasury < 5000
	   and Trait StrongFaith > 0 
	   and Trait Peaceful > 0
	   and Trait Corrupted < 1
	   and Trait Righteous < 3
	   
 Affects Righteous 1 Chance 10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Righteous_Righteous
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and not InEnemyLands
       and PopulationOwnReligion < 50
       and TimeInRegion > 3
       and Treasury < 5000
	   and Trait StrongFaith > 0 
	   and Trait Peaceful > 0
	   and Trait Corrupted > 0
	   
 Affects Corrupted -1 Chance 15 
 
 
;------- purifier  ----------------------------------------------
;--- difficult to predict how the triggers will work in practice
;---------------------------------------------------------------- 
Trigger Priest_Purifier_Strong
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
	   and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion < 12
       and TimeInRegion > 5
       and TimeSinceHeresy < 5 >= 5
       and PopulationHeretic < 5
       and ReligionShift > 10
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects Purifier 1 Chance 66 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Purifier_Normal
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
	   and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion < 12
       and TimeInRegion > 6
       and TimeSinceHeresy < 10 >= 6
       and PopulationHeretic < 10
       and ReligionShift > 10
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and not Trait Purifier > 2
	   
 Affects Purifier 1 Chance 50 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Purifier_Fast
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
	   and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion < 12
       and TimeInRegion > 6
       and TimeSinceHeresy < 10 >= 6
       and PopulationHeretic < 10
       and ReligionShift > 20
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects Purifier 1 Chance 66
 
 
;------- missions at home --------------------------------------
;--- difficult to predict how the triggers will work in practice
;---------------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Missionary_Strong
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
	   and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion < 12
       and TimeInRegion > 5
       and TimeSinceReligion > 90 > 5
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 95
       and ReligionShift > 10
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait Missionary < 3
	   
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 66

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Missionary_Normal
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
	   and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion < 12
       and TimeInRegion > 5
       and TimeSinceReligion > 80 >= 5
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 85
       and ReligionShift > 10
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait Missionary < 3
	   
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 66

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Missionary_Fast
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
	   and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion < 12
       and TimeInRegion > 6
       and TimeSinceReligion > 90 > 6
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 95
       and ReligionShift > 20
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and Trait Missionary < 3
	   
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 66
 
;------- missions abroad -----------------------------
;-----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Missionary_Abroad_Strong
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
	   and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion < 12
       and TimeInRegion > 5
       and TimeSinceReligion > 70 > 5
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 70
       and ReligionShift > 10
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and InEnemyLands
	   and Trait Missionary < 3
	   
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 66

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Missionary_Abroad_Normal
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
	   and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion < 12
       and TimeInRegion > 5
       and TimeSinceReligion > 60 >= 5
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 60
       and ReligionShift > 10
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and InEnemyLands
	   and Trait Missionary < 3
	   
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 66

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Missionary_Abroad_Fast
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not AtSea
	   and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion < 12
       and TimeInRegion > 6
       and TimeSinceReligion > 60 > 6
       and PopulationOwnReligion > 60
       and ReligionShift > 15
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   and InEnemyLands
	   and Trait Missionary < 3
	   
 Affects Missionary 1 Chance 85

;-----------------------------------------------------
;-------- priest - events in life --------------------
;-----------------------------------------------------

;------- heretic and witch standing near -------------
;-----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Near_Heretic_OpenMinded
 WhenToTest CharacterNearHeretic

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and Trait Dogmatic < 1
	   
 Affects OpenMinded 1 Chance 40

;-----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Near_Heretic_Dogmatic
 WhenToTest CharacterNearHeretic

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and Trait Dogmatic > 0
	   
 Affects Dogmatic -1 Chance 30

;-----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Near_Witch_Strong
 WhenToTest CharacterNearWitch

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and Trait StrongFaith < 1
	   
 Affects WaveringFaith -1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Near_Witch_Wavering
 WhenToTest CharacterNearWitch

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   and Trait StrongFaith > 0
	   
 Affects StrongFaith -1 Chance 40
 
 
;------- assassination attempts -----------------------
;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Assassination_Attempt_Doomsayer
 WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

 Condition AgentType = priest
	   and Trait DivineProtection < 1
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   
 Affects Doomsayer 1 Chance 85 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Assassination_Attempt_DivineProtection
 WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

 Condition AgentType = priest
 	   and Trait Doomsayer < 1
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
	   
 Affects DivineProtection 1 Chance 50 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_ExecutesAssassin_Doomsayer
 WhenToTest ExecutesAnAssassinOnAMission

 Condition AgentType = priest
 	   and Trait DivineProtection < 1
       and not CharacterReligion pagan

 Affects Doomsayer 1 Chance 50
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_ExecutesAssassin_DivineProtection
 WhenToTest ExecutesAnAssassinOnAMission

 Condition AgentType = priest
 	   and Trait Doomsayer < 1
       and not CharacterReligion pagan

 Affects DivineProtection 1 Chance 85 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10

 
;-----------------------------------------------------------
;-------- priest - old age & health ------------------------
;-----------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_OldAge
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = priest
         and CharacterAge > 55
		 
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill -1 Chance 10
 Affects GoodDenouncer -1 Chance 10
 Affects Missionary -1 Chance 10
 Affects Purifier -1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_OldAge_Dogmatic
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = priest
         and CharacterAge > 50
		 and not Trait OpenMinded > 0
		 
 Affects Dogmatic 1 Chance 5 
 Affects NaturalPriestSkill -1 Chance 5
 Affects GoodDenouncer -1 Chance 5
 Affects Missionary -1 Chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Health_Ill_Accidental
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = priest
         and CharacterAge > 30
		 and Trait AgentHealth < 1		 
	   and RandomPercent > 50
 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Health_SeriouslyIll_Accidental
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = priest
         and CharacterAge > 40
		 and Trait AgentHealth < 1		 
	   and RandomPercent > 50
 
 Affects AgentHealth 2 Chance 2
 
 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Health_Ill_Plague
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and SettlementHasPlague
	   and Trait AgentHealth < 2		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10
 
 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Health_Ill_UnderSiege
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and EndedInSettlement		; is it necessary, does not IsUnderSiege test if already?	--- Belovese
       and IsUnderSiege
	   and Trait AgentHealth < 2		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Health_Recovers
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
	   and Trait AgentHealth > 0		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth -1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Health_Recovers_Stopped
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
     and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
     and Trait AgentHealth > 0		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth -1 Chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Health_Recovers_InSettlement
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not SettlementHasPlague
       and not IsUnderSiege
	   and Trait AgentHealth > 0		 
		 
 Affects AgentHealth -1 Chance 50
 
 
;----------------------------------------------------------
;-------- priest - famous regions visited -----------------
;----------------------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Visit_Rome_Doctrine_player
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and AgentType = priest
       and IsRegionOneOf 114 ; Rome_Province
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and FactionIsLocal
       and Trait PriestCatholicDoctrine = 0
	   and Trait AgentHealth < 2
	   
 Affects PriestCatholicDoctrine 1 Chance 66 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Visit_Rome_Doctrine_AI
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterReligion catholic
       and AgentType = priest
       and IsRegionOneOf 114 ; Rome_Province
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and Trait PriestCatholicDoctrine = 0
	   
 Affects PriestCatholicDoctrine 1 Chance 66
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 66

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Visit_Constantinople_Doctrine
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterReligion orthodox
       and AgentType = priest
       and IsRegionOneOf 123 ; Constantinople_Province
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and Trait PriestOrthodoxDoctrine = 0
	   and Trait AgentHealth < 2
	   
 Affects PriestOrthodoxDoctrine 1 Chance 66

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Visit_Mecca_Doctrine
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsRegionOneOf 199 ; Mecca_Province
       and AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and Trait PriestIslamicDoctrine = 0
	   and Trait AgentHealth < 2
	   
 Affects PriestIslamicDoctrine 1 Chance 66

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsRegionOneOf 190 ; Jerusalem_Province
       and AgentType = priest
       and not CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and Trait StrongFaith < 3
	   and Trait AgentHealth < 2
	   
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Visit_Jerusalem_CatholicAI
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsRegionOneOf 190 ; Jerusalem_Province
       and AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion catholic
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and TimeInRegion > 1
       and Trait StrongFaith <= 4
	   
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsRegionOneOf 30 ; Aktobe_Province
       and AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion > 3
       and Trait StrongFaith < 3
	   and Trait AgentHealth < 2
	   
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 40
