 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd 

 Condition IsRegionOneOf 199 ; Mecca_Province 
       and AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion islam
       and TimeInRegion > 3
       and Trait StrongFaith < 3
	   and Trait AgentHealth < 2
	   
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 50


;---------------------------------------------------------
;-------- priest promoted to cardinal
;---------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Cardinal_Bishop
 WhenToTest CardinalPromoted

 Condition Trait PriestLevel > 0
       and Trait PriestLevel < 2
	   
 Affects PriestLevel 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Cardinal_Priest
 WhenToTest CardinalPromoted

 Condition Trait PriestLevel < 1

 Affects PriestLevel 2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Cardinal_Initial_WarmongerCorrupted
 WhenToTest CardinalPromoted

 Affects Warmonger 1 Chance 20 
 Affects Warmonger 1 Chance 20 
 Affects Corrupted 1 Chance 20 
 Affects Corrupted 1 Chance 20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Cardinal_Initial_Peaceful
 WhenToTest CardinalPromoted

 Condition Trait Warmonger < 1
 
 Affects Peaceful 1 Chance 33  
 Affects Peaceful 1 Chance 33  

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Cardinal_Initial_Righteous
 WhenToTest CardinalPromoted

 Condition Trait Corrupted < 1
	   
 Affects Righteous 1 Chance 33  
 Affects Righteous 1 Chance 33  
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Cardinal_Initial_Warmonger_Buff
 WhenToTest CardinalPromoted
 
  Condition Trait Warmonger > 1
	   and Trait OpenMinded < 1  

 Affects Warmonger 1 Chance 50  

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Cardinal_Initial_Corrupted_Buff
 WhenToTest CardinalPromoted
 
  Condition Trait Corrupted > 1
 	   and Trait Dogmatic < 1 
	   
 Affects Corrupted 1 Chance 50  

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Cardinal_Initial_Purifier_Buff
 WhenToTest CardinalPromoted
 
  Condition Trait Peaceful > 1
	   and Trait Purifier < 1 
	   
 Affects Peaceful 1 Chance 50  

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Cardinal_Initial_Righteous_Buff
 WhenToTest CardinalPromoted
 
  Condition Trait Righteous > 1
 	   and Trait WaveringFaith < 1 
	   
 Affects Righteous 1 Chance 50

 
;-------------------------------------------------------
;-------- Patriarch and Antipope 
;-----(not reviewed in 2018, some additions made in 2019)----

;-------------------------------------------------------
Trigger priest_patriarch_0
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Attribute Piety > 4
       and I_EventCounter Patriarch < 1
       and Trait PriestLevel = 0
       and FactionReligion orthodox

 Affects PriestLevel 3 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger priest_patriarch_1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Attribute Piety > 4
       and I_EventCounter Patriarch < 1
       and Trait PriestLevel = 1
       and FactionReligion orthodox

 Affects PriestLevel 2 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger priest_antipope_priest0
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Attribute Piety > 4
       and I_EventCounter Antipope = 0
       and Trait PriestLevel = 0
       and FactionReligion catholic

 Affects PriestLevel 4 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger priest_antipope_priest1
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Attribute Piety > 4
       and I_EventCounter Antipope = 0
       and Trait PriestLevel = 1
       and FactionReligion catholic

 Affects PriestLevel 3 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger priest_antipope_priest2
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Attribute Piety > 4
       and I_EventCounter Antipope = 0
       and Trait PriestLevel = 2
       and FactionReligion catholic

 Affects PriestLevel 2 Chance 100
 Affects WasCardinal 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger priest_antipope_cardinalpromo
 WhenToTest CardinalPromoted

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and Trait PriestLevel = 4
       and FactionReligion catholic

 Affects WasCardinal 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger antipope_remove_priest
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait PriestLevel = 4
       and not FactionExcommunicated
       and Trait WasCardinal = 0
  
 Affects PriestLevel -4 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger antipope_remove_cardinal
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait PriestLevel = 4
       and not FactionExcommunicated
       and Trait WasCardinal = 1
 
 Affects PriestLevel -2 Chance 100
 Affects WasCardinal -1 Chance 100

 
;-------- Priest and Bishop  ------------------------
;--------(not reviewed in 2018)
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_to_Bishop
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition AgentType = priest
       and I_EventCounter AppointBishop = 1
       and Trait PriestLevel = 0
       and not FactionReligion islam
       and not FactionReligion pagan
       
 Affects PriestLevel 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_stripped_Bishop
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
 
 Condition AgentType = priest
       and I_EventCounter StripBishop = 1
       and Trait PriestLevel = 1
       and not FactionReligion islam
       and not FactionReligion pagan
 
 Affects PriestLevel -1 Chance 100


;========================================================
;=====  PAGAN PRIEST triggers ===========================
;========================================================

;-------- definitions ---------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Mongol_PaganPriest_Recruitment_Description
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
	and CharFactionType mongols
	and CharacterReligion pagan 

 Affects PaganPriestMongols 1 Chance 100

;--- unknown reason for this trigger -----
;-----------------------------------------
Trigger Mongol_PaganPriest_Turn1_Description
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition AgentType = priest
 and CharFactionType mongols
 and Trait PaganPriestMongols < 1
 and Trait PaganPriest < 1
 
 Affects PaganPriestMongols 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Cuman_PaganPriest_Recruitment_Description
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and FactionType cumans
       and CharacterReligion pagan 
	   
 Affects PaganPriestMongols 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lithuanian_PaganPriest_Recruitment
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and FactionType lithuania
	   and CharacterReligion pagan
	
 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 100
 
 
;---------------------------------------------
;-------- pagan priest difficulty ------------
;---------------------------------------------

;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Starter_Pagan_Player_LevelNormal
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and FactionIsLocal
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 2
       and I_TurnNumber < 200
	   
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 50
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 50
 
;----------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Starter_Pagan_AI_LevelHard
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 3
	   
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 33
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 33
 
;----------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Starter_Pagan_AI_LevelVeryHard
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
	   
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 50
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 50

;----------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Starter_Pagan_AI_LevelVeryHard_Later
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
       and I_TurnNumber > 100
	   
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 50
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 50
  
;----------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Starter_Pagan_AI_LevelVeryHard_MuchLater
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
       and I_TurnNumber > 300
	   
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 50
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------------------
Trigger PaganPriest_AutoProgression_AI
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and CharacterReligion pagan
	   
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 10
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 10


;-------------------------------------------------
;-------- pagan priest - starters ----------------
;------------------------------------------------- 

;------- lithuanian starters ---------------------
;-------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Pagan_Dievas
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and FactionType lithuania
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= dievas_sanctuary

 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 10	   
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 50
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 10
 
 ;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Pagan_Dievas_Temple
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and FactionType lithuania
       and SettlementBuildingExists > dievas_sanctuary

 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 33	   
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 50
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and FactionType lithuania
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= perkunas_sanctuary
	   
 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 10	
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 10
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and FactionType lithuania
       and SettlementBuildingExists > perkunas_sanctuary
	   
 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 33	
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 10
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 50

 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and FactionType lithuania
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= giltine_sanctuary
	   
 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 10	
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 33
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest AgentCreated

       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and FactionType lithuania
       and SettlementBuildingExists > giltine_sanctuary
	   
 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 33	
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 33
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 33

 
;-------- cumans and mongols starters ---------------
;----------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Pagan_Tengir_Cumans
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and FactionType cumans
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= tengir_sanctuary

 Affects PaganPriestMongols 1 Chance 10
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 20
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Pagan_Tengir_Temple_Cumans
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and FactionType cumans
       and SettlementBuildingExists > tengir_sanctuary
	   
 Affects PaganPriestMongols 1 Chance 33
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 50
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Pagan_Tengir_Mongols
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= tengir_sanctuary
       and FactionType mongols

 Affects PaganPriestMongols 1 Chance 10
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 20
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 20
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Pagan_Tengir_Temple_Mongols
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= tengir_sanctuary
       and FactionType mongols
       and not Trait PaganPriest > 0
	   
 Affects PaganPriestMongols 1 Chance 33
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 50
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 50


;---------------------------------------------
;-------- pagan priest - visiting ------------ 
;---------------------------------------------

;-------- pagan priest visiting wilderness ----
;----------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_InWild_Short
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not EndedInSettlement
       and not AtSea
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and TimeInRegion > 3
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_InWild_Long
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and not EndedInSettlement
       and not AtSea
       and TimeInRegion > 8
       and CharacterReligion pagan
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	     	   
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 10

;--------------------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and SettlementBuildingExists >= perkunas_sanctuary
       and CharacterReligion pagan
       and FactionType lithuania
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	     
 Affects PaganPriest 1 Chance 5	
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 5

;------- visiting holy provinces ----------------
;------------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Visit_Kernave_Doctrine
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition AgentType = priest
	   and CharacterReligion pagan
       and IsRegionOneOf 21 ; Kernave_Province
       and TimeInRegion > 2
	   
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 33
 
;-----------------------------------------------
Trigger Priest_Visit_Aktobe_Doctrine
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition IsRegionOneOf 30 ; Aktobe_Province
    and AgentType = priest
    and TimeInRegion > 2
    and CharacterReligion pagan
	   
 Affects PriestPaganDoctrine 1 Chance 33
 

;------- assassination attempts - pagans ---
;-------------------------------------------
Trigger PriestPagan_Assassination_Attempt_Healthy
 WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects Doomsayer 1 Chance 50 
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 50 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 33
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger PriestPagan_Assassination_Attempt_Ill
 WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1

 Affects Doomsayer 1 Chance 85 
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 33 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger PriestPagan_ExecutesAssassin_Healthy
 WhenToTest ExecutesAnAssassinOnAMission

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
 	   and Trait DivineProtectionPagan < 1

 Affects Doomsayer 1 Chance 80
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 80 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 33
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger PriestPagan_ExecutesAssassin_Ill
 WhenToTest ExecutesAnAssassinOnAMission

 Condition AgentType = priest
       and CharacterReligion pagan
 	   and Trait Doomsayer < 1

 Affects Doomsayer 1 Chance 100
 Affects Doomsayer 1 Chance 33
 Affects DivineProtectionPagan 1 Chance 33 
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 10
 

;========================================================
;=====  INQUISITOR PRIEST triggers ======================
;========================================================
	   
;-------- inquisitor difficulty effects ------
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Inquisitor_Starter_LevelNormal
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = inquisitor
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 2
	   and I_EventCounter inquisition = 0			; around turn 200

 Affects NaturalInquisitorSkill -1 Chance 33 
 Affects FairProsecutor 1 Chance 33
 Affects BadDenouncer 1 Chance 20
 Affects WaningConviction 1 Chance 20

;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Inquisitor_Starter_LevelHard
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = inquisitor
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 3
	   
 Affects NaturalInquisitorSkill 1 Chance 33 
 Affects FairProsecutor 1 Chance 33
 Affects BadDenouncer 1 Chance 20
 Affects GrowingConviction 1 Chance 20

;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Inquisitor_Starter_LevelHard_MuchLater
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = inquisitor
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 3
	   and I_EventCounter inquisition = 1			; around turn 200
	   
 Affects NaturalInquisitorSkill 1 Chance 33 
 Affects FairProsecutor 1 Chance 33
 Affects BadDenouncer 1 Chance 20
 Affects GrowingConviction 1 Chance 20

;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Inquisitor_Starter_LevelVeryHard
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = inquisitor
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
	   
 Affects NaturalInquisitorSkill 1 Chance 33 
 Affects FairProsecutor 1 Chance 33
 Affects BadDenouncer 1 Chance 20
 Affects GrowingConviction 1 Chance 20
 
;---------------------------------------------
Trigger Inquisitor_Starter_LevelVeryHard_Later
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = inquisitor
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
	   and I_EventCounter ad_abolendam = 1			; around turn 100
	   
 Affects NaturalInquisitorSkill 1 Chance 33 
 Affects FairProsecutor 1 Chance 33
 Affects BadDenouncer 1 Chance 20
 Affects GrowingConviction 1 Chance 20

       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
	   and I_EventCounter inquisition = 1			; around turn 200
	   
 Affects NaturalInquisitorSkill 1 Chance 33 
 Affects FairProsecutor 1 Chance 33
 Affects BadDenouncer 1 Chance 20
 Affects GrowingConviction 1 Chance 20

 
;-------- inquisitor starters -------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Inquisitor_Starter
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = inquisitor

 Affects NaturalInquisitorSkill 1 Chance 100 
 Affects NaturalInquisitorSkill 1 Chance 70
 Affects NaturalInquisitorSkill 1 Chance 30

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Inquisitor_Starter_Pure
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = inquisitor
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Purity > 0

 Affects FairProsecutor 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Inquisitor_Starter_Violent
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = inquisitor
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Violence > 0

 Affects FairProsecutor 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Inquisitor_Starter_NotPure
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = inquisitor
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Purity < 1

 Affects UnfairProsecutor 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Inquisitor_Starter_NotViolent
 WhenToTest AgentCreated

 Condition AgentType = inquisitor
       and FactionLeaderAttribute Violence < 1

 Affects UnfairProsecutor 1 Chance 100 
 
 
;-------- inquisitor denoucements --------------
;-----------------------------------------------
Trigger Denouncement_Success_Good
 WhenToTest DenouncementMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
       and Trait BadDenouncer < 1
 	   and Trait AgentHealth < 1
	   
 Affects AgentHealth 1 Chance 2	   
 Affects GoodDenouncer 1 Chance 100 
 Affects GoodDenouncer 1 Chance 50
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Denouncement_Success_Bad
 WhenToTest DenouncementMission

 Condition MissionSucceeded
       and Trait BadDenouncer > 0

 Affects BadDenouncer -1 Chance 100 
 Affects BadDenouncer -1 Chance 50 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Denouncement_Failure_Bad
 WhenToTest DenouncementMission

 Condition not MissionSucceeded
       and Trait GoodDenouncer < 1

 Affects BadDenouncer -1 Chance 85 
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Denouncement_Failure_Good
 WhenToTest DenouncementMission

 Condition not MissionSucceeded
       and Trait GoodDenouncer > 0

 Affects GoodDenouncer -1 Chance 85
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Inquisitor_Failure
 WhenToTest DenouncementMission

 Condition not MissionSucceeded
       and AgentType = inquisitor
       and Trait BadDenouncer > 1

 Affects InquisitorFailure 1 Chance 100

         and CharacterAge > 55
         and Trait NaturalInquisitorSkill > 0

         and CharacterAge > 30
		 and Trait AgentHealth < 1

         and CharacterAge > 50
		 and Trait AgentHealth < 1

	   and Trait AgentHealth > 0

;========    FUNCTIONAL TRAITS  =========================

;=========================================================================================

;========================================================
;----- AI boost triggers --------------------------------
;========================================================

;------------------------------------------ AI difficulty levels boost
Trigger AI_Boost_Difficulty_MarriedBribed_Remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and Trait AI_Boost_Difficulty > 0

 Affects AI_Boost_Difficulty -3 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger Ai_Boost_Diff_Normal
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait AI_Boost_Difficulty < 1
       and IsGeneral
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 2

 Affects AI_Boost_Difficulty 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Ai_Boost_Diff_Hard
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait AI_Boost_Difficulty < 1
       and IsGeneral
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 3
	   
 Affects AI_Boost_Difficulty 2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Ai_Boost_Diff_VeryHard
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition Trait AI_Boost_Difficulty < 1
       and IsGeneral
       and not FactionIsLocal
       and I_EventCounter DifficultyLevel = 4
	   
 Affects AI_Boost_Difficulty 3 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------ AI FL and FH boost
Trigger AIb_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and Trait NaturalAiBoost > 1

 Affects NaturalAiBoost -3 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------ 
Trigger AIb_general_boost
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsGeneral
       and not CharacterIsLocal
       and Trait NaturalAiBoost < 1

 Affects NaturalAiBoost 1 Chance 100
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger AIb_heir_boost
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionHeir
       and Trait NaturalAiBoost > 0
       and Trait NaturalAiBoost < 2
	   
 Affects NaturalAiBoost 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AI_leader_boost
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsFactionLeader
       and Trait NaturalAiBoost > 1
       and Trait NaturalAiBoost < 3

 Affects NaturalAiBoost 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------ AI move boost
; 1 - immobile, 2 - very slow, 3 - no change, 4 - faster, 5 - fast

;------------------------------------------ 5->0
Trigger Ai_MoveFix_Remove_Human
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix > 0

 Affects Ai_MoveFix -5 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 0->3
Trigger Ai_MoveFix_Starter
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not FactionIsLocal
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix < 1
	   and IsGeneral

 Affects Ai_MoveFix 3 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 5->3, 4->2
Trigger Ai_Besieging5
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsBesieging
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix > 3
	   
 Affects Ai_MoveFix -2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 3->2
Trigger Ai_Besieging3
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition IsBesieging
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix > 2
	   
 Affects Ai_MoveFix -1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 1->3, 2->4
Trigger Ai_MoveFix_MoveYourAss_InWild
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not EndedInSettlement
	   and not FactionIsLocal
	   and IsGeneral
       and not IsBesieging
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix < 3
	   
 Affects Ai_MoveFix 2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 3->1, 4->2, 5->3
Trigger Ai_MoveFix_StayInSettlement_AdminMind
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition EndedInSettlement
	   and not FactionIsLocal
	   and IsGeneral
	   and Trait MilitaryInclination < 1
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix < 4
	   
 Affects Ai_MoveFix -2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 3->1, 4->2, 5->3
Trigger Ai_MoveFix_StayInSettlement_MilMind
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition EndedInSettlement
	   and not FactionIsLocal
	   and IsGeneral
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix < 4
	   and CharacterAge > 50
	   
 Affects Ai_MoveFix -2 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 1->2, 2->3
Trigger Ai_MoveFix_MoveYourAss
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not IsBesieging
	   and not FactionIsLocal
	   and IsGeneral
       and TimeInRegion > 5
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix < 3
	   and Trait Wantschool < 1
	   and CharacterAge < 50
	   
 Affects Ai_MoveFix 1 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------ 3->4
Trigger Ai_MoveFix_Faster_Abroad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition InEnemyLands
	   and not FactionIsLocal
	   and IsGeneral
       and not IsBesieging
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix < 4
	   
 Affects Ai_MoveFix 1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 4->3
Trigger Ai_MoveFix_Slower_Abroad
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition InEnemyLands
       and not IsBesieging
       and RemainingMPPercentage < 50
       and TimeInRegion < 3
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix > 3
	   
 Affects Ai_MoveFix -1 Chance 100 

;------------------------------------------ 5->3, 4->2, 3->1
Trigger Ai_MoveFix_Rest_After_Battle_Abroad
 WhenToTest PostBattle

 Condition Trait Ai_MoveFix > 2
	   and InEnemyLands
	   
 Affects Ai_MoveFix -2 Chance 100 
 
;------------------------------------------ 4->3
Trigger Ai_MoveFix_Slower_If_Home
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition not InEnemyLands
       and Trait Ai_MoveFix > 3
	   
 Affects Ai_MoveFix -1 Chance 100 


;========================================================
;----- Interactive events -------------------------------
;========================================================


;--------------------------------------------------------
;------------ Trade_Fairs -----------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger great_fair_accepted
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition CharacterIsLocal
		and DistanceCapital <= 50
		and I_EventCounter great_fair_true > 0

	Affects GoodTrader 12 Chance 33
	Affects MerchantCompetence 1 Chance 33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger great_fair_refused
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition CharacterIsLocal
		and DistanceCapital <= 50
		and I_EventCounter great_fair_false > 0

	Affects BadTrader 1 Chance 33
	Affects ServesSelfMerchant 1 Chance 33


;------------ Tourneys ------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger great_tourney_accepted_leader
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter great_tourney_true > 0

 Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 50
 Affects Energetic 1 Chance 25

;---------------------------------------
Trigger great_tourney_accepted_general
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and DistanceCapital <= 50
       and I_EventCounter great_tourney_true > 0
       and not Trait Far_Loyalty > 0

 Affects HaleAndHearty 3 Chance 50
 Affects ContentGeneral 1 Chance 100
 Affects Energetic 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger great_tourney_accepted_princess
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and AgentType = princess
       and DistanceCapital <= 50
       and I_EventCounter great_tourney_true > 0

 Affects FairWoman 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger great_tourney_refused_leader
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter great_tourney_false > 0

 Affects Slothful 1 Chance 50


;------------------------------------------
Trigger great_tourney_refused_general
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsGeneral
       and not IsFactionLeader
       and Attribute Chivalry > 3
       and I_EventCounter great_tourney_false > 0
       and not Trait Near_Loyalty > 0

 Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 50

;------------ Great Councils ------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger great_council_accepted_leader
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter great_council_true > 0

 Affects ReligiousActivity 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger great_council_accepted_priest
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and AgentType = priest
       and DistanceCapital <= 60
       and I_EventCounter great_council_true > 0

 Affects Dogmatic 1 Chance 100
 Affects StrongFaith 1 Chance 25

;------------ Troubadours ------------------
;------------------------------------------
Trigger troubadours_accepted_leader
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter troubadours_event_true > 0

 Affects StrategyChivalry 1 Chance 10
 Affects Poet 1 Chance 25
 Affects Cultured 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger troubadours_accepted_princess
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and AgentType = princess
       and DistanceCapital <= 50
       and I_EventCounter troubadours_event_true > 0

 Affects FairWoman 1 Chance 50
 Affects FaithfulWoman 1 Chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger troubadours_refused_leader
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and IsFactionLeader
       and I_EventCounter troubadours_event_false > 0

 Affects StrategyDread 1 Chance 5
 Affects Miserly 1 Chance 25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger troubadours_refused_princess
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
       and AgentType = princess
       and DistanceCapital <= 50
       and I_EventCounter troubadours_event_false > 0

 Affects VapidWoman 1 Chance 25
 Affects BadPrincess 1 Chance 25


;========================================================
;----- Aggressors ---------------------------------------
;========================================================
 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Faction_Leader_Aggressor_Venice
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition I_EventCounter aggvenice > 0
       and IsFactionLeader

 Affects Aggressor_Venice 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Faction_Heir_Aggressor_Venice
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition I_EventCounter aggvenice > 0
		and IsFactionHeir

 Affects Aggressor_Venice 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger New_Faction_Heir_Aggressor_Venice
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Aggressor_Venice > 0
		and not Trait Aggressor_Venice > 0

 Affects Aggressor_Venice 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger NonAggressor_Venice
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Aggressor_Venice > 0
		and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter venice AtWar

 Affects Aggressor_Venice -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger New_Faction_Heir_Aggressor_Jerusalem
 WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

 Condition FactionLeaderTrait Aggressor_Jerusalem > 0
		and not Trait Aggressor_Jerusalem > 0

 Affects Aggressor_Jerusalem 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger NonAggressor_Jerusalem
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition Trait Aggressor_Jerusalem > 0
		and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter jerusalem AtWar

 Affects Aggressor_Jerusalem -1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Faction_Leader_Aggressor_Zengid
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition I_EventCounter aggzengid > 0
       and IsFactionLeader

 Affects Aggressor_Zengid 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

		and IsFactionHeir

;========================================================
;----- Next Heir (triggers)
;========================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Heir_excandidate
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition Trait HeirCandidate > 0

    Affects HeirCandidate  -1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Leader_excandidate
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition Trait HeirCandidate > 0

    Affects HeirCandidate  -1  Chance  100 
;------------------------------------------

;========    FEATURES  =================================================== AGENTS
;==== IMPROVE RELATIONS ------------------------------ Feudalic

;----------------------------------------
Trigger In_Foreign_Country_remove
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
	   and AgentType = diplomat
	   and RemainingMPPercentage < 95
	   and Trait InForeignCountry > 0

Affects InForeignCountry -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger In_Foreign_Country_add
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
	   and AgentType = diplomat
	   and InEnemyLands
	   and RemainingMPPercentage > 95
	   and Trait InForeignCountry = 0

Affects InForeignCountry 1 Chance 100

;----------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InAbbasidFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 129
     and I_SettlementOwner Adrianople = abbasid

Affects InAbbasidFaction 1 Chance 100

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InDenmarkFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 8
     and I_SettlementOwner Aberdeen = denmark

Affects InDenmarkFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger In_Egypt_Faction_Nuremburg
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InEgyptFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 56
     and I_SettlementOwner Nuremburg = egypt

Affects InEgyptFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InCumansFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 59
     and I_SettlementOwner Olomoc = cumans

Affects InCumansFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InCumansFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 139
     and I_SettlementOwner Erzurum = cumans

Affects InCumansFaction 1 Chance 100

Trigger In_Turks_Faction_Tayma
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InTurksFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 185
     and I_SettlementOwner Tayma = turks

Trigger In_hre_Faction_Caernarvon
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InHreFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 40
     and I_SettlementOwner Caernarvon = hre

Affects InHreFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InHreFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 122
     and I_SettlementOwner Durazzo = hre

Affects InHreFaction 1 Chance 100

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InPortugalFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 140
     and I_SettlementOwner Smyrna = portugal

Affects InPortugalFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger In_poland_Faction_Pisa
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InPolandFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 105
     and I_SettlementOwner Pisa = poland

Affects InPolandFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InPolandFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 187
     and I_SettlementOwner Marrakesh = poland

Affects InPolandFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InMoorsFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 20
     and I_SettlementOwner Ryazan = moors

Affects InMoorsFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InHungaryFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 7
     and I_SettlementOwner Bulgar = hungary

Affects InHungaryFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InAragonFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 137
     and I_SettlementOwner Sives = aragon

Affects InAragonFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InLithuaniaFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 19
     and I_SettlementOwner Edinburgh = lithuania

Affects InLithuaniaFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InKievanRusFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 48
     and I_SettlementOwner Bristol = kievan_rus

Trigger In_Georgia_Faction_Sinop
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InGeorgiaFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 124
     and I_SettlementOwner Sinop = georgia

 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InNorwayFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 171
     and I_SettlementOwner Tlemcen = norway

Affects InNorwayFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InZengidFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 19
     and I_SettlementOwner Edinburgh = zengid

Affects InZengidFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger In_Zengid_Faction_Genoa

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InZengidFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 98
     and I_SettlementOwner Genoa = zengid

Affects InZengidFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InPapalStatesFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 144
     and I_SettlementOwner Lisbon = papal_states

Affects InPapalStatesFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------

     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InMongolsFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 181
     and I_SettlementOwner Isfahan = mongols

Affects InMongolsFaction 1 Chance 100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger In_Mongols_Faction_Acre
 WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

 Condition CharacterIsLocal
     and AgentType = diplomat
     and InEnemyLands 
     and Trait InMongolsFaction = 0
     and IsRegionOneOf 182
     and I_SettlementOwner Acre = mongols

Affects InMongolsFaction 1 Chance 100
